Flare Snare.name: 焰火圈套 Flare Snare
Flare Snare.description: 利用一些生物发光材料或炼金试剂，你将一种暂效焰火和拌绳或压力板连在一起。当一个小体型或更大的生物进入方格，焰火发射到空中。对于能清晰看到天空的生物来说，在晴朗的白天，焰火的可视距离是2英里；在晴朗的晚上，焰火的可视距离是5英里。

Flask of Fellowship.name: 联谊酒壶 Flask of Fellowship
Flask of Fellowship.description:
这个金属酒壶直径4英寸，高10英寸。它的顶部是四个互相嵌套在一起的金属杯拧在壶嘴上。

启动 建立印象（Make an Impression）

效果 如果你将分享饮料作为你建立印象动作的一部分，那么从酒壶里倾倒而出的饮料一定是对方此刻最想喝上一杯的东西——红酒、烈酒、热姜茶、冻柠茶，诸如此类。你在交涉检定上获得+1物品加值。

如果GM认为你把酒壶拿出来出来没有意义，或者该饮料不适合在这种场合饮用，或者交涉的对象根本就不想和你一起喝，那么他可以不允许你使用。友谊酒壶里流出来的饮料完全是社交性质的，它不会让任何人喝醉，也无法缓解严重的口渴。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.cjQHrvoXDCGOsptN]{装备效果：联谊酒壶}

Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind.name: Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind
Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind.description:
Each of the legendary Orbs of Dragonkind contains the essence and personality of a powerful dragon. The Orb of Gold Dragonkind was the most powerful of them all, until it was shattered by Mengkare's draconic breath. Reconstructed at great expense by enslaved spellcasters toiling under the Scarlet Triad's watch, the Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind is a shadow of its prior self, yet it remains a potent weapon against dragons of all types.

While carried, the Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind grants its owner resistance 30 to the Breath Weapons of gold dragons. The owner also can sense if there are any dragons within 10f gold dragons. The owner also can sense if there are any dragons within 10 miles, or any gold dragons within 100 miles. When within 1 mile of a dragon, they can determine the direction to the dragon and the dragon's age category (such as young, ancient, or wyrm).

Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency Three times per day

Effect You attempt to overwhelm a dragon's mind-while you cannot control the dragon, you can render it immobile for a short time. Choose a dragon within 60 feet; the dragon can attempt to resist the orb with a @Check[type:will|dc:30] saving throw (or higher with orb shards). Gold dragons take a -4 circumstance penalty to this saving throw. Any stun from this activation ends if the dragon is attacked or otherwise subject to a hostile act other than that of the orb.

Critical Success The dragon is unaffected.

Success The dragon is stunned 3.

Failure The dragon is stunned for as long as the orb's wielder Sustains the Activation.

Critical Failure As failure, but hostile actions don't end the dragon's stun.

Destruction The Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind is resilient, but its imperfect nature leaves it vulnerable. It can be damaged or even destroyed by mundane attacks (Hardness 40, HP 200, BT 100). It has weakness 30 to the Breath Weapons and Strikes of gold dragons.

Flayleaf.name: 剥皮烟 Flayleaf
Flayleaf.description:
剥皮烟草是比较常见的植物，将其叶子干燥后当成烟来抽就能略微让人感到愉悦。人们为了这种效果会专门种植它们。

启动 A 交互(摄入, 吸入)

豁免 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:12]

潜伏期 10 分钟

最大持续时间 4 小时

阶段1 对抗心灵效果时豁免鉴定有+1物品加值（1小时）

阶段2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}，并且对抗心灵效果时豁免鉴定有+1物品加值 （1小时）

阶段3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}且@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1 小时)

阶段4 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1 小时)

Fleshgem (Combat).name: 战斗血肉宝石 Fleshgem (Combat)
Fleshgem (Combat).description:
血肉宝石最初是土元素裔（oreads）为了修饰身体而发明的，它是一种能嵌入任何族裔皮肤中的水晶。虽然血肉宝石可以嵌入身体的任何部位以达到装饰的目的，但冒险者最爱的用法是将它们嵌入指关节根部，将其作为黄铜指虎那样使用。

这些镶嵌在你指节中的尖锐水晶能让你的拳击打击造成[[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害}，属于搏击武器组，并拥有魔法和非武装特征。战斗血肉宝石可以通过重拳缠手带（handwraps of mighty blows）获得增强，就像通常的非武装攻击一样。

Fleshgem (Earthspeaker).name: 地语者血肉宝石 Fleshgem (Earthspeaker)
Fleshgem (Earthspeaker).description:
血肉宝石最初是土元素裔（oreads）为了修饰身体而发明的，它是一种能嵌入任何族裔皮肤中的水晶。虽然血肉宝石可以嵌入身体的任何部位以达到装饰的目的，但冒险者最爱的用法是将它们嵌入指关节根部，将其作为黄铜指虎那样使用。

你汲取血肉宝石的力量，你周围的大地会喷发出水晶石笋。

启动 1 to 2 命令

频率 每天一次

需求 你站立在地面

效果 你周围@Template[type:burst|distance:10]范围内的地面会喷出及膝盖那么高的水晶碎片，存在1轮。如果你使用两个动作来启动，则持续1分钟。对于除你之外的其他生物来说，该区域为困难地形，也是危险地形。生物在水晶碎片的区域内移动时将会受到[[/r {2}[piercing]]]{2点穿刺伤害}。

Flingflenser.name: 碎肉枪 Flingflenser
Flingflenser.description: 这是一种地精设计的武器，以带舱口的卵型管（ovoid tube with a hatch ）为形状，其尖端处则有一个把手。一个簇拥在一起的圆刀片安装在有着细皮表带的黑火药包作为弹药，在利用燧发或是任何其他的外部的发火方式开火前从卵型管的舱口填装。这种武器坚实的设计使得比起其他的地精武器来比要更加可靠。

Flint and Steel.name: 燧石和铁片 Flint and Steel
Flint and Steel.description: 如果你有时间捕捉火花，燧石和铁片可以用来生火，尽管在遭遇过程中使用它们通常太费时间。即使在理想的条件下，使用燧石和铁片来生火也需要至少3次动作，并且通常要更长。

Flintlock Musket.name: 燧发滑膛枪 Flintlock Musket
Flintlock Musket.description: 阿肯斯塔最常见使用的火器。燧发滑膛枪外部的发火装置使其具有高效并相对紧凑的外观。虽然对阿肯斯塔和顿加堡的军事人员来说，燧发滑膛枪比起重型火绳枪缺少了射程和火力，但是就平民的使用案例来说，依然很受欢迎。

Flintlock Pistol.name: 燧发手枪 Flintlock Pistol
Flintlock Pistol.description: 尽管比起燧发滑膛枪来说较为不准确和没那么大威力，燧发手枪因为其更紧凑的体积得到了私掠者的喜爱。海盗船长为了不需要停下来装填，经常会穿装有燧发手枪的武装带用以拔枪开火。

Floating Shield.name: 浮空盾 Floating Shield
Floating Shield.description:
浮空盾上通常画有翅膀图案。这面小圆盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）能够自动对你展开保护。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 盾牌用魔法飞离你的手臂，在你四周空中环绕飞行，自动为你提供其加值，如同你已举起盾牌一般。

因你没有持握盾牌，因此你无法用该盾牌使用盾牌格挡反应动作，不过你能在两手皆用的情况下获得其常规效果。

1分钟后，浮空盾掉落在地，浮空效果结束。当浮空盾浮空邻接你时，你可用交互动作抓住它，提前结束浮空效果。

Floating Shield (Greater).name: 高等浮空盾 Floating Shield (Greater)
Floating Shield (Greater).description:
浮空盾上通常画有翅膀图案。这面小圆盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）能够自动对你展开保护。

启动 A 交互

频率 不限

效果 盾牌用魔法飞离你的手臂，在你四周空中环绕飞行，自动为你提供其加值，如同你已举起盾牌一般。因你没有持握盾牌，因此你无法用该盾牌使用盾牌格挡反应动作，不过你能在两手皆用的情况下获得其常规效果。1分钟后，浮空盾掉落在地，浮空效果结束。当浮空盾浮空邻接你时，你可用交互动作抓住它，提前结束浮空效果。

Floorbell.name: 地板铃 Floorbell
Floorbell.description:
这种 3 尺见方的黏土砖非常结实，就如同一块厚压力板。在它被摧毁之前它能承受最多500 磅重的重量。地板铃的特性显而易见，但是通过一般的或魔法的手段可以让地板隐蔽或伪装起来（比如用散落的树叶复盖它，或用@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{幻象物品 Illusory Object}法术），使它更难被发现。

启动2命令, 交互;效果 地板铃必须放置在平整地面上启动。当你这样做的时候，需要设定一个能触发地板铃警报的具体重量。当地板铃感应到等同于（或超过）指定重量的目标位于其上时，它会发出刺耳的哀号声，在 150 尺范围内都能清晰地听见。地板铃也可以设定成上面指定的重量被减少时引发警报，例如当一件很重的袋子放在地板铃上面然后被人拿走的时候。

Flying Blade Wheel Snare.name: 飞刃轮圈套 Flying Blade Wheel Snare
Flying Blade Wheel Snare.description: 当一个生物进入该方格，一个布满旋转利刃的致命飞轮从中射出，以+33的攻击调整值进行一次打击Strike，并造成8d8点挥砍伤害。你的每个回合一次，你可以在距离飞轮120尺内的位置使用一个交互Interact动作，令飞轮向该生物飞行Fly最多60尺，如果飞轮移动后距离该生物的距离不大于5尺，那飞轮还能对该生物进行一次打击Strike。1分钟后，飞轮停止旋转并落在地上。生物可以试图摧毁飞轮（AC 37，强韧+29，反射+20，HP 200，硬度 10，物品免疫）。

Focus Cathartic (Greater).name: 高等精神涤清剂 Focus Cathartic (Greater)
Focus Cathartic (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

精神涤清剂能安抚你的神经，帮你舒缓紧张的精神。当你喝下这瓶灵药，灵药进行一次调整值为[[/r 1d20+19]]的反制检定来移除单一来源的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}状态。反制等级和DC需根据状态的来源来确定。

Focus Cathartic (Lesser).name: 次等精神涤清剂 Focus Cathartic (Lesser)
Focus Cathartic (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

精神涤清剂能安抚你的神经，帮你舒缓紧张的精神。当你喝下这瓶灵药，灵药进行一次调整值为[[/r 1d20+6]]的反制检定来移除单一来源的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}状态。反制等级和DC需根据状态的来源来确定。

Focus Cathartic (Major).name: 上等精神涤清剂 Focus Cathartic (Major)
Focus Cathartic (Major).description:
启动 A 交互

精神涤清剂能安抚你的神经，帮你舒缓紧张的精神。当你喝下这瓶灵药，灵药进行一次调整值为[[/r 1d20+28]]的反制检定来移除单一来源的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}状态。反制等级和DC需根据状态的来源来确定。

Focus Cathartic (Moderate).name: 中等精神涤清剂 Focus Cathartic (Moderate)
Focus Cathartic (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

精神涤清剂能安抚你的神经，帮你舒缓紧张的精神。当你喝下这瓶灵药，灵药进行一次调整值为[[/r 1d20+8]]的反制检定来移除单一来源的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}状态。反制等级和DC需根据状态的来源来确定。

Folding Boat.name: Folding Boat
Folding Boat.description:
This simple carved box can fold or unfold into a boat when activated.

启动 2 命令, 交互

Effect The folding boat can take two shapes. The first is a wooden box that's 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 4 inches high; it weighs 1 Bulk and can store up to 1 Bulk of items. The other form is a @Compendium[pf2e.vehicles.l0RfYgabnbNoHnkS]{Rowboat}. If the chosen form can't fit in the space, it takes the largest shape that does fit. You can activate the boat again to revert it to its original shape. If the boat is occupied, the item can't be activated. Much like a magical structure, a folding boat can't harm creatures when it unfolds and creatures within it are set aside harmlessly when it folds.

Any items that were stored inside the box appear in the boat or ship. Items stored on the boat or ship form that are too large to fit inside the box form are ejected from the vehicle and appear on the ground adjacent to the box. A folding boat with the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition must be repaired before it can change form again.

Folding Boat (Greater).name: Folding Boat (Greater)
Folding Boat (Greater).description:
This simple carved box can fold or unfold into a boat when activated.

启动 2 命令, 交互

Effect The folding boat can take two shapes. The first is a wooden box that's 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 4 inches high; it weighs 1 Bulk and can store up to 1 Bulk of items. The other form is a @Compendium[pf2e.vehicles.Qlvei5jjRXdsXUPo]{Cutter}, piloted and crewed by ethereal sailors. The ethereal sailors don't prevent you from activating the boat to return it to a box. If the chosen form can't fit in the space, it takes the largest shape that does fit. You can activate the boat again to revert it to its original shape. If the boat is occupied, the item can't be activated. Much like a magical structure, a folding boat can't harm creatures when it unfolds and creatures within it are set aside harmlessly when it folds.

Any items that were stored inside the box appear in the boat or ship. Items stored on the boat or ship form that are too large to fit inside the box form are ejected from the vehicle and appear on the ground adjacent to the box. A folding boat with the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition must be repaired before it can change form again.

Folding Drums.name: Folding Drums
Folding Drums.description:
You can unfold this @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.yw1kPxsdCoDUzOaE]{Musical Instrument (virtuoso percussion instrument)} into a hand drum (1 Bulk), a marching drum set with a shoulder harness and back brace (3 Bulk), or a large standing drum set with a built-in stool (16 Bulk). Changing the folding drum's size is a 3-action Interact activity, and the drums must have sufficient open space to accommodate their new size.

Activate 1 Interact (concentrate)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You play a pounding rhythm on the drum. If the next action you use is to cast a composition cantrip that has an emanation, increase the area of the emanation by 30 feet.

Folding Ladder.name: Folding Ladder
Folding Ladder.description:
Bulk 1 (3 unfolded)

This multi-hinged, 10-foot ladder is useful for climbing upward or across dangerous pits. You can fold or unfold the ladder with two total Interact actions, which don't need to consecutive.

Follypops.name: 愚人点心 Follypops
Follypops.description:
启动 1 交互

这些美味的面包点心里塞满了奶酪、辣椒或源自龙或恶魔的“神秘馅料”，通常作为餐厅里的挑战项目——全部吃完一份可以获得免费的饮料。在吃下愚人点心之后的1个小时内，你的胃会咕咕作响，充满魔法潜能。在此期间，你以单动作将胃里的魔法能量释放出来，最多三次，该动作具有专注特征，范围和伤害取决于具体的点心种类；当你释放三次之后，愚人点心的效果就结束了。每当你释放时，区域内的所有生物都必须尝试DC 27基础豁免，具体详见不同类型。

类型 热辣点心

吃完后你全身大汗淋漓。当你释放魔法能量时，会喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:15]火焰。范围内的生物第一次受到[[/r {4d6}[fire] #first blast]]{4d6火焰伤害}，第二次受到[[/r {2d6}[fire] #second blast]]{2d6火焰伤害}，最后一次受到[[/r {1d6}[fire] #third blast]]{1d6火焰伤害}。生物每次都必须尝试@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Hotpops Follypop|traits:uncommon,fire|showDC:all]豁免。

类型 腐烂点心

吃完后你嘴里会充斥着垃圾的腐臭。当你释放魔法能量时，会喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:15]毒气。范围内的生物第一次受到[[/r {4d6}[poison] #first blast]]{4d6毒素伤害}，第二次受到[[/r {2d6}[poison] #second blast]]{2d6毒素伤害}，最后一次受到[[/r {1d6}[poison] #third blast]]{1d6毒素伤害}。生物每次都必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|basic:true|name:RottersFollypop|traits:uncommon,poison|showDC:all]豁免。

类型 呲电点心

吃完之后，你浑身起鸡皮疙瘩，头发也根根竖起。当你释放魔法能量时，你的指尖会放出@Template[type:line|distance:30]闪电。范围内的生物第一次受到[[/r {2d12}[electricity] #first jolt]]{2d12电击伤害}，第二次受到[[/r {1d12}[electricity] #second jolt]]{1d12电击伤害}，最后一次受到[[/r {1d6}[electricity] #third jolt]]{1d6电击伤害}。生物每次都必须尝试@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Sizzlers Follypop|traits:uncommon,electricity|showDC:all]豁免。

Force Shield.name: 力能盾 Force Shield
Force Shield.description:
这面精心锻造的铁盾（硬度8，HP32，BT16）边缘镶嵌有彩色式样的小玻璃块。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 力能盾在你周围张开一层力场泡来保护你，在1分钟内提供5点物理伤害抗力。力场泡在你不再手持力能盾后消失。

Force Tiles.name: 力场砖块 Force Tiles
Force Tiles.description:
启动 施放法术

光线通过这些精细打磨的玻璃块时会发生奇妙的折射，这会延长被折射的力场，并令其产生反推的力。以力场砖块强化@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Iela4GgVeO3LfAo]{力墙术 Wall of Force}法术，形成的力场墙最大长度增加到80尺，最大高度增加到40尺，并且会让那些试图进入力场墙所在空间的生物（包括被推撞进入的生物）受到[[/r {2d6}[force]]]{2d6力场伤害}。

Forensic Dye.name: 法医染料 Forensic Dye
Forensic Dye.description:
启动 1 交互

要启动这瓶无色液体，需要将其注射到一小份其他化学品或材料中，例如血液或淤泥。液体会迅速发生反应，转变为一种浑浊的红棕色物质。

启动后，染料会在接下来的10分钟内保持活性，在这段时间内你都可以将其刷到一件最大负载1B的物体上，或是布满一个5尺方格的地表。如果染料接触到和启动化学物完全匹配的物质，它会变成亮蓝色；如果没有接触到启动物质，则染料保持透明状态。

Forge Warden.name: 熔炉守卫 Forge Warden
Forge Warden.description:
锻造之神托拉格的印记——一柄矮人式样战锤——雕刻在这面铁盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）正面。这面盾是托拉格的圣徽。

当你举起该盾时，你和邻接你的盟友获得5点火焰抗力。当你使用盾牌格挡时，熔炉守卫发出如同锤打在铁毡上的声音，圣徽如同点燃的火炉般闪亮。

启动 F 命令 (火)

触发 你用熔炉守卫盾牌格挡了邻接敌人的攻击且盾受到了伤害

效果 攻击者受到2d6点火焰伤害。

Forgetful Ink.name: Forgetful Ink
Forgetful Ink.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Used to write secret messages, a single dose of forgetful ink is enough to pen a page of text, often with flourishes extending to the page's edges. Anyone handling the page is exposed to the poison. This includes casual reading, unless the reader specifically takes precautions not to physically touch it. Unlike other poisons, forgetful ink retains its potency for one year, regardless of the number of victims exposed.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:secret] (secret)

Onset 1 minute

Stage 1 The reader forgets the contents of the writing, recalling it as blank or as inconsequential text.

Forked Bipod.name: 叉型脚架 Forked Bipod
Forked Bipod.description: 由在法力废墟被混沌的变异怪物袭击而没时间拆卸三角架的阿肯斯塔斥候研发。这种双叉武器可以用作脚架来稳定具有反冲特征的火器。叉型脚架可以用一个交互动作来部署或是收回作为近战武器使用。

Formula Book (Blank).name: 公式手册 Formula Book (Blank)
Formula Book (Blank).description: 公式手册中包含制作本章中除常用装备以外的物品所必需的公式，炼金术士通常能够免费得到一本。每个公式手册可以容纳最多100个不同物品的公式。公式也可以出现在羊皮纸、黑板和几乎任何其他介质上，只要你可以参阅它们就不需要将它们抄写到特定的书中。

Formulated Sunlight.name: Formulated Sunlight
Formulated Sunlight.description: A leshy can derive nourishment from specially formulated bottles of sunlight instead of natural sunlight.

Fortification.name: 护命 Fortification
Fortification.description: 护命符文对最致命的攻击提供防护。你在穿戴该护甲时每次被重击，都可进行一次@Check[type:flat|dc:17]检定。若成功，该次攻击变为普通命中。该性能会加厚护甲，增加护甲的负载1点，克服减值所需的力量增加2点。

Fortification (Greater).name: 高等护命 Fortification (Greater)
Fortification (Greater).description: 护命符文对最致命的攻击提供防护。你在穿戴该护甲时每次被重击，都可进行一次@Check[type:flat|dc:17]检定。若成功，该次攻击变为普通命中。该性能会加厚护甲，增加护甲的负载1点，克服减值所需的力量增加2点。

Fortifying Pebble.name: Fortifying Pebble
Fortifying Pebble.description:
Usage affixed to armor, shield, or weapon

Activate F envision

Trigger The affixed object would take damage

This small pebble is strangely dense and surprisingly durable, affixed to an object by a sturdy steel chain. When you activate the pebble, the affixed object takes 10 less damage.

Four-Ways Dogslicer.name: 四式屠狗刀 Four-Ways Dogslicer
Four-Ways Dogslicer.description:
这把+2强击屠狗刀显然是由一名聪慧但散漫的工匠造出来的，其重视多功能性重于安全性。4颗尖牙一般的宝石镶嵌在屠狗刀的刃部，其中三颗闪闪发光：一颗闪着激烈的红光、一颗闪着刺骨的蓝光、一颗噼里啪啦发出电光；而剩下那颗宝石黑的透亮。每颗宝石都体现为一种武器性能符文，但同一时间只能有一颗生效。

启动 1 交互

效果 你扭一扭想要使用的符文宝石：红色代表炽焰符文，蓝色代表冻寒符文，黄色代表电击符文。你承受1d6点所选符文宝石造成的伤害。你也可以扭动黑色宝石来终止激活的性能符文，此时不会承受伤害。

Fox Marble.name: Fox Marble
Fox Marble.description:
A gumiho wears a strange green amulet around its neck. This fox marble stores all of the gumiho's knowledge. By focusing on the marble, a gumiho can perfectly recall anything it has experienced in its lifetime. A creature who manages to steal a gumiho's fox marble is lucky indeed, for they can also use it to access the gumiho's memories. However, if the gumiho still lives, the vengeful fox will stop at nothing to recover its marble.

Whoever wears a fox marble gains a +2 item bonus to all checks to Recall Knowledge.

Freezing Ammunition.name: 冰冻弹药 Freezing Ammunition
Freezing Ammunition.description:
启动 1 交互

这种冰冷的弹药是深蓝色的，而且摸起来感觉很冷。当启动的冰冻弹药命中了一个目标，目标必须通过一个@Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]豁免，否则陷入缓慢1，持续1轮（在大失败时则陷入缓慢1，持续1分钟）。

Frenzy Oil.name: Frenzy Oil
Frenzy Oil.description:
This oil, which is pressed from vrock spores and mixed with a combination of acacia ash and thistle seeds, seeps into the skin of living creatures, initially inspiring irritability that unpredictably manifests as berserk rage.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37]

Onset [[/r 1d6]] minutes

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6 mental damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1}, attack nearby creatures as if @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {6d6}[mental]]]{6d6 mental damage}, attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {8d6}[mental]]]{8d6 mental damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)

Frog Chair.name: Frog Chair
Frog Chair.description:
This clockwork traveler's chair is shaped like a wheeled frog, with springs attached to the bottom and an extensible tongue on the front.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You activate the wheelchair's springs to make hopping leaps. For 1 minute, whenever you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} with the wheelchair, you can jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency Once per minute

Effect You activate the wheelchair's tongue to grab a nearby object and bring it to you. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to pick up an unattended object within 15 feet and bring it to your empty hand. If you don't have a hand to take the object, it falls in your space instead.

Frost.name: 冻寒 Frost
Frost.description: 该武器用冻结的冰霜增强了威力。该武器成功的打击命中额外造成1d6点寒冷伤害，若重击，目标还需进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|name:Frost Rune|showDC:all]豁免检定，失败则直到你下一回合结束为止获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Frost (Greater).name: 高等冻寒 Frost (Greater)
Frost (Greater).description:
该武器用冻结的冰霜增强了威力。该武器成功的打击命中额外造成1d6点寒冷伤害，

若重击，目标还需进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|name:Frost Rune|showDC:all]豁免检定，失败则直到你下一回合结束为止获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

该武器造成的寒冷伤害忽略目标的寒冷抗力。

Frost Brand.name: 霜烙 Frost Brand
Frost Brand.description:
这柄+2高等强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sexud7FdxIrg50vU]{高等冻寒 Frost (Greater)} 巨剑简单得像冰之碎片。霜烙会自动熄灭 @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]范围内所有非魔法火焰。持握它时，你获得火焰抗力5。

启动 D 命令, 交互

效果 你将霜烙插入正持续的魔法火焰区域中欧，坚韧会以+27反制调整值尝试反制该火焰。若失败，它无法再次尝试反制同一火焰。

Frost Vial (Greater).name: 高等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Greater)
Frost Vial (Greater).description:
这瓶试剂中的液体在接触空气时会迅速吸收周围的热量。一旦命中，目标直到它的下一回合结束为止，都会在它的速度（Speed）上承受状态减值（status penalty）。

你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成3d6点寒冷伤害和3点寒冷溅射伤害，目标承受-10尺的减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.nJRoiSyd67eQ1dYj]{效果:高等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial}

Frost Vial (Lesser).name: 次等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Lesser)
Frost Vial (Lesser).description:
这瓶试剂中的液体在接触空气时会迅速吸收周围的热量。一旦命中，目标直到它的下一回合结束为止，都会在它的速度（Speed）上承受状态减值（status penalty）。

这枚炸弹造成1d6点寒冷伤害和1点寒冷溅射伤害，目标承受-5尺的减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.RLsdvhmTh64Mmty9]{效果:次等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial}

Frost Vial (Major).name: 上等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Major)
Frost Vial (Major).description:
这瓶试剂中的液体在接触空气时会迅速吸收周围的热量。一旦命中，目标直到它的下一回合结束为止，都会在它的速度（Speed）上承受状态减值（status penalty）。

你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成4d6点寒冷伤害和4点寒冷溅射伤害，目标承受-15尺的减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.4G9qnI0oRyL6eKFQ]{效果:上等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial}

Frost Vial (Moderate).name: 中等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Moderate)
Frost Vial (Moderate).description:
这瓶试剂中的液体在接触空气时会迅速吸收周围的热量。一旦命中，目标直到它的下一回合结束为止，都会在它的速度（Speed）上承受状态减值（status penalty）。

你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成2d6点寒冷伤害和2点寒冷溅射伤害，目标承受-10尺的减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.dv0IKm5syOdP759w]{效果:中等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial}

Frost Worm Snare.name: Frost Worm Snare
Frost Worm Snare.description: The snare takes the form of a Tiny frost worm clockwork toy. When a creature enters its square, the snare activates, causing the worm to let loose a @Template[type:line|distance:30]{30‑foot line} of frost in the direction from which the creature entered the square. For instance, if a creature entered the square coming from the south, the worm would shoot the line south, to hit any allies of the triggering creature. Those within the line must succeed a basic @Check[type:reflex|dc:25] save or take [[/r 10d6[cold]]]{10d6 cold damage}. After spitting its frost, the snare falls apart.

Fu Water.name: 符水 Fu Water
Fu Water.description:
符箓烧成的灰漂浮在这种液体上，赋予它一种独特的红色，让它产生各种净化效果。与许多符箓关联物品不同，符水必须用神术魔法来制作。

启动 1 交互

效果 这种药水的功能如同圣水（holy water）一般。与圣水一样，你能够以一次打击（Strike）投掷它。这属于简易投掷武器（simple thrown weapon），射程增量为20尺。和炼金炸弹不同的是，它不会为用它作出的攻击附加操作（manipulate）特征。

启动 1 交互

效果 你喝下符水来抵御体内的疾病。尝试一次反制检定，以+9的反制调整值且反制等级为3对抗一个会带来@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied} 状态的效果。之后你会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

Fulcrum Lattice.name: Fulcrum Lattice
Fulcrum Lattice.description:
This silver and copper framework is shaped to hold four focusing lenses, one behind the other, from smallest to largest. It has a socketed base to be mounted into a stand, such as that found in a lighthouse lantern. The Fulcrum Lattice was specifically designed to hold the four fulcrum lenses from smallest to largest (ebon, crimson, ochre, emerald), and it hums slightly while within 10 feet of any fulcrum lens. A fulcrum lens slotted into the Fulcrum Lattice has no Bulk; the lattice remains at 1 Bulk and can be carried easily. Inserting or removing a lens from the Fulcrum Lattice requires a single Interact action.

The Fulcrum Lattice channels the power of fulcrum lenses joined with it. While you hold the Fulcrum Lattice, lenses socketed into it are considered to be in your hand for the purpose of activating their abilities. When you make a melee spell attack with a lens in the Fulcrum Lattice, you use the highest melee spell attack modifier of any lens in the lattice, or you can use your melee attack modifier with simple weapons if it's greater.

Full Plate.name: 全身甲 Full Plate
Full Plate.description: 全身甲由连锁的板件组成，几乎将整个身体包裹在一个钢壳中。它既昂贵又沉重，使用者通常需要帮助才能正确穿戴，但它是最好的防御盔甲之一。这种盔甲包含一套内衬的布甲和一双手套。

Fulminating Spear.name: Fulminating Spear
Fulminating Spear.description:
This +1 striking returning spear is warm to the touch. The head of the spear is crafted from gold with ivory inlay and has a ruby set into the shaft. You can make the spear glow like a torch or suppress its light by using an action, which has the concentrate trait.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch the ruby and hurl the spear at a square within 40 feet. When the spear lands, it detonates, dealing [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Fulminating Spear Explosion|traits:uncommon|showDC:all]) to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. It then flies back to your hand.

Fulu Compendium.name: 符箓大全 Fulu Compendium
Fulu Compendium.description:
这本小型宣传册大小的书本上记录着符箓上能看到的各种符号，部分页面会包含一些现成的魔法，而且这些魔法会在每日日出时恢复。使用这本书作为参考的话，用于判断符箓功能或可靠性的任何技能检定均会获得+2物品加值。

启动 2 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你从符箓大全中撕下一页将书页投掷出去；它会在沿着弧线飞行的过程中增殖为一场符箓风暴。位于@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的所有不死生物均会受到@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9FiSGqe8s8531Tyh]{缚尸符箓 Spirit-Sealing Fulu}的影响，豁免为@Check[type:will|dc:25|name:spirit-sealing fulu|traits:fulu|showDC:all]。

Fulu of Concealment.name: 避妖符箓 Fulu of Concealment
Fulu of Concealment.description:
用法 沿着10尺半径的圆边将符箓附着至地面上四个方位

持续时间 1小时

此符箓分为4张，要分别贴在东西南北的方向上。启动符箓时从后述特征中选择其一：动物（animal），魔兽（beast），天族（celestial），精类（fey），魔族（fiend），类人（humanoid），观察者（monitor），植物（plant）或不死（undead）。位于符箓圈内的存在（包括符箓本身）会在启动后获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.I0j56TNRmGcTyoqJ]{隐形法球 Invisibility Sphere}的效果，但是仅对具有上文选取的特征的生物有效。若有在符箓生效后，任何一张符箓被移除或者被破坏，该效果便会结束。

Fulu of Fire Suppression.name: 辟火符箓 Fulu of Fire Suppression
Fulu of Fire Suppression.description:
这张黑色符咒上的银色字迹若隐若现，当你用眼角观察时尤甚。这种符箓通常会放置在厨房内，它能够让半径30尺内火焰的蔓延速度减缓一半。

若符箓自身被点燃，那么随着它燃烧殆尽，一股@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围的水流会从符箓中释放出来，自动熄灭此区域内的非魔法火焰，并且尝试反制此区域内的任何魔法火焰，其反制调整值为+7且反制等级为2；在此情况发生时，符箓的持续时间会提前结束。

Fulu of Flood Suppression.name: 辟水符箓 Fulu of Flood Suppression
Fulu of Flood Suppression.description:
这张蓝色符箓上的暗色墨迹会缓慢地旋转扭曲，每日都随着潮汐的时间在纸上膨胀收缩。这种符箓对于建筑最底层的区域、或者靠近有价值或者防水能力很差的物品时十分有用。在雨季即将来临或者巨大的风暴即将到来之前，对这种符箓的需求会激增。

此符箓会将半径30尺区域内洪水蔓延的速度降低一半，并将残留于此区域的水驱离。当此符箓被淹没时，随着符箓上的墨水融入水中，它会释放出一股@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围的高温，无害地将此区域内的非魔法水蒸发成蒸气，并且尝试反制任何区域内的魔法水，其反制调整值为+7且反制等级为2；在此情况发生时，符箓的持续时间会提前结束。

Fulu of the Drunken Monkey.name: 醉猿符箓 Fulu of the Drunken Monkey
Fulu of the Drunken Monkey.description:
用法 附着至护甲

启动 f 想象

触发 你尝试强韧豁免对抗摄入毒素（ingested poison）

这张符箓上的猿猴贴在护甲上的位置刚好盖过穿戴者的胃部，猿猴被描绘的样子仿佛正高兴地喝着从上方流下来的酒精饮料。当你启动符箓时，你会在触发的强韧豁免中以及接下来1分钟内对抗相同毒素的强韧豁免中，获得+2状态加值。若触发毒素是普通的@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UMAXLDpI6YLSfYX1]{酒精 Alcohol}，你会立刻自动成功通过触发豁免作为替代，并且在后续1分钟内对抗酒精饮料的豁免中获得+4状态加值。

Fulu of the Stoic Ox.name: 青牛符箓 Fulu of the Stoic Ox
Fulu of the Stoic Ox.description:
用法 附着至护甲

启动 f 想象

触发 你尝试强韧豁免对抗疾病（disease）

这张符箓上的公牛贴在护甲上的位置刚好盖过穿戴者的心口，图中的公牛正在警惕地休息，它会在穿戴者对抗疾病（diseases）时提供保护，并捍卫他们的健康。当你启动符箓时，你会在触发的强韧豁免，以及在接下来的1个月内对抗相同疾病的强韧豁免中，获得+2状态加值。

Fungal Armor.name: Fungal Armor
Fungal Armor.description:
This +2 greater resilient @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ewQZ0VeL38v3qFnN]{Studded Leather Armor} is made of hardened fungus. Every day the armor grows dozens of unusual mushrooms that can be used for cooking, infused reagents, or common spell material components.

Activate r or a Envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are hit by a melee, ranged, or spell attack

Effect The attack misses you, dealing no damage as you transform into a cloud of spores. You gain the benefits of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form} spell for 1 minute.

For the duration, a cloud of deadly spores surrounds you. Each breathing creature that begins its turn within 10 feet of you takes [[/r {6d8}[poison]]]{6d8 poison damage} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|basic:true|name:Fungal Armor Spores]).

You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the cloud form.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Cloudkill} and gaseous form.

Gadget Skates.name: 小装置旱冰鞋 Gadget Skates
Gadget Skates.description:
启动 1 交互（移动）

小装置旱冰鞋是一种金属装置，成对使用，安装在现成的鞋子（或生物的脚部）上。

当你启动旱冰鞋时，发条齿轮会伸出来，推动你在地面上滑行，使你的速度达到原来的两倍。在此行动中，你必须通过一次@Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20|name:Control]检定才能转向90度，并且不能转向一次以上或转向超过90度。在启动期间和启动完成后，你无法行走、快步或进行其他类型的地面移动，直到你的下个回合结束。不过，在启动效果结束后，你能以@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}的方式代替行走来进行移动，但方向必须为你之前使用旱冰鞋时最后一个移动动作的方向。

你可以持续启动旱冰鞋最多1分钟。从你启动旱冰鞋后的那回合开始，每回合你第一次维持启动时，你会再次获得启动效果：你将沿着你上一次以旱冰鞋进行移动的方向再次以两倍速度进行移动，上述限制继续生效，直到你选择终止维持启动，或达到最大持续时间。一旦效果结束，旱冰鞋就会脱落，你就可以正常移动了。

Gaff.name: Gaff
Gaff.description: Many marsh giants fight with oversized gaffs-lengths of wood with a single metal spike affixed to the tip. Used often by fisherfolk to land fish, marsh giants use their gaffs as weapons.

Gallows Tooth.name: 绞架之齿 Gallows Tooth
Gallows Tooth.description:
用法 附着到一件武器

启动 F 交互

触发 你攻击一个邻接的目标，但尚未投掷攻击骰

需求 你在威吓Intimidation上达到大师

这颗可怕的臼齿挂在一根粗线上，线穿过其干枯的齿根上的一个小洞。当你启动这个护符，你攻击的生物在当前回合结束之前都陷入措手不及Flat-footed。

Galvanic Mortal Coil.name: 电激复生线圈 Galvanic Mortal Coil
Galvanic Mortal Coil.description:
这个多孔的钢制线圈包围着一块玛瑙碎片，为受到严密监管的电激球（galvaspheres）相关的科学提供了一点来自死灵系魔法的补充。当线圈嵌入一具肉体时，血液和其他体液会激发线圈的电流脉冲，从而激活死灵能量。对于活着的生物来说，这将导致危险的颤动，损害生物的心脏。然而，对于死尸来说，这将创造一个有限的窗口，可以让人一窥尸体最后的记忆。电激复生线圈比电激球更加稀有，大部分人都认为它只存在于构想中。

启动 d 交互

频率 每小时一次

效果 你将线圈插入一个生命值为0的活物，另一端则连接到自己身上，伤害它的心脏，并由一定概率将其生命虹吸出来。电激复生线圈对该生物施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dLdRqT6UxTKlsPgp]{死亡丧钟 Death Knell}法术，DC@Check[type:will|dc:27]。

启动 (10 分钟) 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你将线圈植入一具尸体里。线圈对尸体施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{死者交谈 Talking Corpse}法术。

Galvasphere.name: 电激球 Galvasphere
Galvasphere.description:
启动 D 交互

电激球通过电流而非死灵系法术来让尸体活过来。当你通过将其嵌入一个相邻的、完好无损的、中型或小型的类人生物尸体的方式来启动电激球，该尸体将复活为一个电激丧尸（galvaheart zombie），持续1分钟。电激丧尸使用@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.0plBflWwrCWQO2RO]{蹒跚丧尸 Zombie Shambler}的数据，但它用构装体特征取代不死，并且非邪恶，也不会被正能量伤害，体型和作为素材的尸体一致（中型或小型）。丧尸会作为你的部属，当你对他下达命令时，会执行你选择的动作。如果你不命令它，它就不会采取任何行动，在原地抽搐，直到电流慢慢耗尽。

Gamepiece Chariot.name: Gamepiece Chariot
Gamepiece Chariot.description:
This stone figurine of a chariot pulled by two horses was used by Tekritanin adults during strategy game competitions. Sometimes, though, mischievous adolescents snatched pieces like this one for joyriding.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You place the figurine on the ground and roll it forward. As the chariot begins to move, it rapidly expands to the size of a Large heavy chariot pulled by two animated stone war horses. You can board the chariot and drive it up to 80 feet in a straight line. You can move through spaces occupied by creatures of size Medium or smaller, dealing [[/r {4d8+10}[bludgeoning]]]{4d8+10 bludgeoning damage} to those creatures. Affected creatures must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save; on a failure, a creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. The chariot returns to its figurine form once it stops moving.

Games (Loaded Dice).name: Games (Loaded Dice)
Games (Loaded Dice).description:
A nigh-infinite assortment of games exist in Golarion. Simple games, including dice, a deck of cards, or dominoes, cost 5 sp. Board games vary in cost from 1 gp for dexterity games like Bungle, 3 gp for colorful children's games like Cauldron Quest, and 5 gp for complex strategy games like Kingmaker and Abendego Raiders. Lavish game sets can cost much more than these prices, as they are made of expensive components and are intricately crafted works of art unto themselves.

These dice are weighted on one side to ensure they always land with the desired number facing up. Loaded dice grant you a +1 item bonus to Games Lore checks to gamble with the dice. You can determine a die is loaded while handling it with a successful secret @Check[type:perception|dc:20|name:Loaded Dice] check. Determining dice are loaded without handling the dice is more difficult, especially since smart cheaters switch loaded dice in and out so they don't suspiciously roll the same number over and over. In this case, an observer must succeed at a secret Perception check against the roller's Games Lore or Thievery DC to notice the switches or the patterns.

Ganjay Book (1 bulk book).name: Ganjay Book (1 bulk book)
Ganjay Book (1 bulk book).description:
This item is a formula book, religious text, or spellbook that has been creased-possibly by Princess Ganjay herself-to fold up into an impossibly small shape. When folded up, the book can't be read or used, but its Bulk is reduced by 1 (a book that is 1 Bulk becomes light Bulk, and a book that is light Bulk becomes negligible in weight).

Activate 1 minute (Interact) You fold or unfold the Ganjay book, manipulating the cunning creases.

Ganjay Book (Light bulk book).name: Ganjay Book (Light bulk book)
Ganjay Book (Light bulk book).description:
This item is a formula book, religious text, or spellbook that has been creased-possibly by Princess Ganjay herself-to fold up into an impossibly small shape. When folded up, the book can't be read or used, but its Bulk is reduced by 1 (a book that is 1 Bulk becomes light Bulk, and a book that is light Bulk becomes negligible in weight).

Activate 1 minute (Interact) You fold or unfold the Ganjay book, manipulating the cunning creases.

Garrote Bolt.name: Garrote Bolt
Garrote Bolt.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The shaft of this silver bolt is engraved with wiry designs.

When a garrote bolt hits a target, it transforms into a silver garrote and wraps around one of the target's appendages, dealing an additional [[/r {2d12}[persistent,slashing]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Slashing Damage}. On a critical hit, it wraps around the target's throat, and the target can't breathe until the persistent damage ends.

Gauntlet.name: 铁手套 Gauntlet
Gauntlet.description: 全身甲、半身甲和板条甲都配有一副这种金属手套，也可以单独购买并与其他类型的盔甲一起佩戴。他们不仅保护你的手，而且把你的手变成致命的武器。

Gauntlight.name: Gauntlight
Gauntlight.description:
Gauntlight is much more than a 115-foot-tall lighthouse rising from the heart of an old ruin in Fogfen—its pale stone walls extend far below the ruins, passing through eight different dungeon levels and finally terminating at the ninth level below the surface, where its deep foundation centers on an ominous chamber where, long ago, Nhimbaloth herself once physically brushed against this world. Once she finished its physical construction, the sorcerer Belcorra Haruvex used this spot as a source of power to infuse the walls, floors, and ceilings of each of Gauntlight's levels with eldritch power. The lens at the apex of the lighthouse would have, in time, been able to focus this lingering eldritch energy into a powerful beam, but Belcorra's plans were cut short before she could replace the mundane lenses with dangerous magical ones.

As an artifact, Gauntlight can't be damaged by normal means. Its walls are impenetrable and impervious to any attempt to breach them by anybody except for followers of Nhimbaloth. They block effects that allow temporary passage, such as passwall, and also create a barrier against dimensional travel. The walls attempt to counteract teleportation effects and planar travel into or out of areas within Gauntlight and efforts to summon creatures into the area (using a +37 counteract modifier); this effect does not stop a summoned creature from departing when the summoning ends.

In Gauntlight's current state of diminished functionality, it can be activated only in the two ways below. By swapping in a series of magical lighthouse lenses that focus Nhimbaloth's baleful gaze—lenses so powerful that even Belcorra takes special care with them—the artifact gains significantly greater power, including the ability to reach all the way to Absalom and to activate its effects every minute. These lenses are described in “Eyes of Empty Death,” the third adventure in the Abomination Vaults Adventure Path.

To activate Gauntlight, a creature must be in the deepest portion of the artifact (this chamber is in the Temple level and is presented in “Eyes of Empty Death”). From this point, a creature can observe the world outside remotely through Gauntlight's lens, including any area Gauntlight's beam can reach.

Activate 3 Interact

Frequency once per month

Effect A pale blue beam shines from Gauntlight's lens and illuminates a 30-foot-radius burst centered on any point within 1 mile. The light saturates the region, causing any corpses in the area or within 10 feet of the surface of the illuminated area to animate as level -1 undead (typically as skeleton guards or zombie shamblers). Once animated, the undead remain active until slain. Until then, they remain uncontrolled and are driven only by the desire to slaughter the living. If Gauntlight is fully restored, the undead instead animate as any Common undead of 15th level or less, as the user wishes.

Activate3 Interact

Frequency once per month

Effect A pale blue beam shines from Gauntlight's lens and illuminates a 30-foot-radius burst centered on any point within 1 mile. The user chooses one creature of 4th level or less that is physically located within Gauntlight; this creature is then is teleported to any point within this illumination radius. If Gauntlight is fully restored, any number of creatures within Gauntlight of 15th level or lower can be transported. This is a teleportation effect.

Destruction If Belcorra's ghost is permanently destroyed, Gauntlight loses all of its magical properties and collapses in on itself all the way down to its base, leaving an incredibly deep pit in the Fogfen.

Gecko Pads.name: 壁虎护垫 Gecko Pads
Gecko Pads.description:
启动 2 交互

壁虎护垫很薄，形状像手掌一般的发条装置，可以绑在现成的手部装备或生物的手掌上。当它被启动时，会嗖嗖作响，提高你对表面的抓握力，同时缓慢地释放储存在设备装置的粘性物质，以帮助你进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}。只要你两只手都空着，壁虎护垫能让你获得等同于你地面速度的攀爬速度，持续10分钟。

Gecko Pads (Greater).name: 高等壁虎护垫 Gecko Pads (Greater)
Gecko Pads (Greater).description:
启动 2 交互

壁虎护垫很薄，形状像手掌一般的发条装置，可以绑在现成的手部装备或生物的手掌上。当它被启动时，会嗖嗖作响，提高你对表面的抓握力，同时缓慢地释放储存在设备装置的粘性物质，以帮助你进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}。只要你两只手都空着，壁虎护垫能让你获得等同于你地面速度的攀爬速度，持续1小时。

Gecko Potion.name: 壁虎药水 Gecko Potion
Gecko Potion.description:
启动 A 交互

壁虎药水是一种粘稠的黄褐色药水，其中悬浮着一些沙粒。喝下这瓶药水后5分钟内，你的指尖会长出上千根极其微小的刚毛，使其能吸附在物体上。

好处 你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}和@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{手上功夫 Palm an Object}检定和对抗@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}的反射豁免DC上获得+1物品加值

持续时间 5 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.buJnkFBzL4e22ASp]{效果：壁虎药水}

Genealogy Mask.name: Genealogy Mask
Genealogy Mask.description:
Access Alijae ethnicity

These large masks are forged of precious metals or carved of wood and tasked with guarding the history of a family. Most Alijae are granted a genealogy mask when they come of age, which they bequeath to their next of kin upon death. When a member of the family recounted in the genealogy mask performs a particularly significant event while wearing the mask, its eyes and ears animate, allowing the item to witness and record the deeds for posterity. Different families have different standards for their genealogy masks-some may value accuracy and objective, clinical facts, while others may relish embellishing their stories to the very brink of believability in the name of a good story.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You ask the mask about the deeds of a particular ancestor, and the mask speaks for 10 minutes, recalling the tales it knows about that ancestor. The mask is limited by what information a particular ancestor shared with it.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dtOUkMC57izf93z5]{Ancestral Memories} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}. You must be an Alijae elf.

Genius Diadem.name: Genius Diadem
Genius Diadem.description:
Perception +22; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet, constant detect magic

Communication speech (Common, Draconic, and eight other common languages)

Skills Arcana +34, seven Lore skills +28, Occultism +28, Society +28

Int +8, Wis +0, Cha +4

Will +24

The genius diadem is a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.1FKDq4Gfev5GObDT]{Diadem of Intellect} that typically acts like an arrogant professor or mentor, often boasting that it is a certified greater intellect and far superior to your own intelligence, even after the benefits the diadem grants you. The genius diadem encourages you to learn things for yourself rather than actually attempting to Recall Knowledge for you, though you or your allies might be able to play on its arrogance using Deception to trick it into doing so. In addition to allowing you to activate it, the diadem can use the diadem of intellect's hypercognition activation with its own actions, though if it does so, the diadem gains the benefits instead of you. Only the diadem can use the following activation.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect The genius diadem casts 7th-level feeblemind.

Ghost Ammunition.name: 幽冥弹药 Ghost Ammunition
Ghost Ammunition.description:
幽冥弹药的触感十分冰凉。该弹药有着幽冥Ghost Touch性能符文的效果，而且可以穿过任何无法阻挡虚体生物及效果的障碍物。虽然该弹药能够穿透屏障并忽略所有掩体，目标仍然能从掩体带来的隐蔽Concealed或藏匿Hidden中受益。你仍然无法在不猜测的情况下直接瞄准无踪Undetected的生物。

该弹药发射之后便会化作雾气。然而在 [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 天} 之后的深夜，它会出现在它被取出的箭袋或其他容器中。

Ghost Charge (Greater).name: 高等镇魂炸药 Ghost Charge (Greater)
Ghost Charge (Greater).description:
用法 单手持握

启动 A 打击

这个弹簧承载的金属罐内含有化学品和盐的混合物，能够消耗并瓦解附近的不死生物。

镇魂炸药使你在攻击骰上获得+2物品加值。造成[[/r 3d8]]正能量伤害和3点正能量溅射伤害，和其他正能量伤害类似，这种伤害只能伤害不死生物和可以被负能量治疗的其他生物。受到镇魂炸药所造成伤害的主要目标直到你的下一回合开始会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

镇魂炸药的设计让它能够在接触虚化表面时引爆，因此是非常理想的对抗虚体不死生物的武器。

Ghost Charge (Lesser).name: 次等镇魂炸药 Ghost Charge (Lesser)
Ghost Charge (Lesser).description:
用法 单手持握

启动 A 打击

这个弹簧承载的金属罐内含有化学品和盐的混合物，能够消耗并瓦解附近的不死生物。

镇魂炸药造成[[/r 1d8]]正能量伤害和1点正能量溅射伤害，和其他正能量伤害类似，这种伤害只能伤害不死生物和可以被负能量治疗的其他生物。受到镇魂炸药所造成伤害的主要目标直到你的下一回合开始会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。

镇魂炸药的设计让它能够在接触虚化表面时引爆，因此是非常理想的对抗虚体不死生物的武器。

Ghost Charge (Major).name: 上等镇魂炸药 Ghost Charge (Major)
Ghost Charge (Major).description:
用法 单手持握

启动 A 打击

这个弹簧承载的金属罐内含有化学品和盐的混合物，能够消耗并瓦解附近的不死生物。

镇魂炸药使你在攻击骰上获得+3物品加值。造成[[/r 4d8]]正能量伤害和4点正能量溅射伤害，和其他正能量伤害类似，这种伤害只能伤害不死生物和可以被负能量治疗的其他生物。受到镇魂炸药所造成伤害的主要目标直到你的下一回合开始会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

镇魂炸药的设计让它能够在接触虚化表面时引爆，因此是非常理想的对抗虚体不死生物的武器。

Ghost Charge (Moderate).name: 中等镇魂炸药 Ghost Charge (Moderate)
Ghost Charge (Moderate).description:
用法 单手持握

启动 A 打击

这个弹簧承载的金属罐内含有化学品和盐的混合物，能够消耗并瓦解附近的不死生物。

镇魂炸药使你在攻击骰上获得+1物品加值。造成[[/r 2d8]]正能量伤害和2点正能量溅射伤害，和其他正能量伤害类似，这种伤害只能伤害不死生物和可以被负能量治疗的其他生物。受到镇魂炸药所造成伤害的主要目标直到你的下一回合开始会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。

镇魂炸药的设计让它能够在接触虚化表面时引爆，因此是非常理想的对抗虚体不死生物的武器。

Ghost Dust.name: 幽影尘 Ghost Dust
Ghost Dust.description:
用法 附着到盔甲

启动 F 想象

触发 你使用一个具有移动Move特征的动作

需求 你在隐匿Stealth中达到传奇

这个小瓶子里面装满了从干燥的细胞外质中提取出的灰绿色粉尘。当你启动粉尘，它会对你施展一次4环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility}。它会在你进行触发动作的移动之前产生效果。

Ghost Ink.name: 幽灵墨水 Ghost Ink
Ghost Ink.description:
启动 10 分钟(交互)

这瓶青白色的墨水能够迅速干燥，在书写后的1分钟后变得完全透明。墨水会在接触到热量时发红光，例如火把或其他开放火焰带来的热量。墨水只会在接触热量时闪光，一旦从热源附近挪开，墨水则会继续保持透明。幽灵墨水的制作者可以略微修改公式，改变其敏感的对象，例如日光、星光、魔法光源、或由炼金术创造的无热光，例如日光杖。

在文字没有发光时，仔细检查由幽灵墨水书写的表面的生物可以通过一个@Check[type:perception|dc:25|traits:action:seek]检定来发现墨水的存在。如果达成了大成功，他们便足够清晰地观察到墨水，可以使用社群技能进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{解读文书 Decipher Writing}。一瓶幽灵墨水足够书写一整页的文字。

Ghost Touch.name: 幽冥 Ghost Touch
Ghost Touch.description: 该武器可以伤害到没有实体的生物。幽冥武器对虚体生物特别有效，那些东西大多数都对幽冥武器有着弱点。虚体生物可以接触、手持和持握幽冥武器（这和大多数物质物体不同）。

Ghostbane Fulu.name: 驱鬼符箓 Ghostbane Fulu
Ghostbane Fulu.description:
用法 附着至一件武器

启动 f 想象

触发 你成功用附着着这张符箓的武器打击（Strike）虚体生物（incorporeal creature），但你还未投掷伤害

这张红字白底的符箓贴在武器上能触及虚体生物的灵魂本质。在启动后，武器在对抗触发的虚体生物时获得幽冥性能符文（ghost touch property rune）的好处，持续1分钟。

Ghostly Portal Paint.name: 幽灵涂料 Ghostly Portal Paint
Ghostly Portal Paint.description:
启动 3 交互

这种半透明的乳白色颜料几乎没有重量，如果你盯着看太久的话，它似乎会呈现出某种神秘学符号。当被涂在一面5尺宽，10尺高的墙上时，被涂上涂料的墙壁将变成幽灵那样的虚体，最多可影响10尺厚度。这能让有形的生物和物品穿过它。通道持续10分钟时间。当效果消失时，墙内任何剩余的东西都会被挤出到最近的出口。

力场效果、其他虚体物品和生物，包括幽冥武器，无法穿过这堵墙，就像正常墙壁之于实体生物那样。如果墙被涂上涂料时，墙体里恰好有虚体生物，则该虚体生物会被挤出到最近的出口。

Ghostshot Wrapping.name: 鬼灵射击裹布 Ghostshot Wrapping
Ghostshot Wrapping.description:
用法 附着至一把远程武器

启动 f 想象

触发 你在藏匿或无踪状态下，以附着的武器尝试一次远程打击

这条长长的亚麻裹布紧紧地缠绕在附着的火器的枪管或弓的把手上。当启动时，该护符的魔法能抑制触的发射击时的噪音，使其完全静默，并偏转射击的角度，让它看上去来自一个和你实际位置完全不同的方位。你不会因为触发的射击而导致你自动对任何生物变为可见（observed）状态。

Ghoul Hide.name: 尸鬼皮甲 Ghoul Hide
Ghoul Hide.description:
通过将食尸鬼皮一块块缝合而成，这套+1革甲使你对抗疾病和麻痹时的豁免检定获得+1物品加值，且你免疫食尸鬼的麻痹。尸鬼皮甲若蚀刻有抗力符文，上述对疾病和麻痹的物品加值会增加对应抗力符文所提升的数值（因此该对疾病与麻痹的加值最高为+4）。

食尸鬼抗拒精灵的触摸，发出嘶嘶作响。若穿戴者拥有精灵特征，尸鬼皮甲就会获得嘈杂（Noisy）特征。

Giant Centipede Venom.name: 巨蜈蚣毒 Giant Centipede Venom
Giant Centipede Venom.description:
巨蜈蚣的毒液能够引发多重肌肉僵直。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12 毒素伤害}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}和 措手不及flat-footed (1 轮)

Giant Scorpion Venom.name: 巨蝎毒 Giant Scorpion Venom
Giant Scorpion Venom.description:
蝎毒能够带来剧烈的疼痛并使受害者变得虚弱。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10 毒素伤害} 和 力竭enfeebled 1 (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10 毒素伤害} 和 力竭enfeebled 2 (1 轮)

Giant Wasp Venom.name: 巨蜂毒 Giant Wasp Venom
Giant Wasp Venom.description:
巨峰毒液会妨碍受害者的移动。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6 毒素伤害} 和 笨拙clumsy 2 (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6 毒素伤害} 和 笨拙clumsy 2 (1 轮)

Gill Hook.name: Gill Hook
Gill Hook.description: This spear has a specialized hook just before the tip that can catch on the gills of large fish. Azarketis primarily use this to hunt sharks, but it can also be used to hook flesh or armor.

Glaive.name: 大砍刀 Glaive
Glaive.description: 这件长兵由7英尺长杆和顶端的单刃组成。它在一定距离外进行致命的切割时，非常有效。

Glamered.name: 无相 Glamered
Glamered.description:
该护甲可以仅凭想象变化自身。

启动 A 想象

效果 你改变护甲的形状和外表，展现成想象中服饰的普通版或精良版的样子。护甲的数据不会改变。只有受到真知术或类似效果的生物才能尝试不相信这个幻术效果，DC是25。

Glamorous Buckler.name: 迷神小圆盾 Glamorous Buckler
Glamorous Buckler.description:
迷神小圆盾（硬度 3，HP 6，BT 3）上奢侈地镀着金并镶嵌着各种在光照下闪闪发光的宝石。当你举起迷神小圆盾时，你在用来进行虚招的欺骗检定中获得+1物品加值。

启动 F 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 你进行虚招

需求 你举起了迷神小圆盾

效果 当你进行虚招，迷神小圆盾绚丽地闪烁起来。虚招成功时，目标陷入目眩，持续1轮。

硬度 HP BT
3 6 3

Glass Cutter.name: Glass Cutter
Glass Cutter.description: This small rod has a tiny, sharp cutting wheel made of steel on one end and a thick bulb on the other. You can use the glass cutter's wheel to score ordinary glass and use the bulb to break the piece along your scoring. It typically takes 1 minute of work to cut a hole large enough to fit your hand. If you are attempting to break the glass quietly, you must attempt a Thievery check against the Perception DC of nearby creatures to go unnoticed.

Glasses of Sociability.name: 社交眼镜 Glasses of Sociability
Glasses of Sociability.description:
这种带有大圆镜片的金属框眼镜是为了避免在社交聚会中尴尬的对峙而发明的。它能给与你的交涉技能+1物品加值。

启动 1 想象

效果 你注视着一个生物，如果你们之前见过面并且互相自我介绍过，那么你会立即想起他的名字。眼镜依赖你的潜在记忆，如果生物伪装了身份，眼镜是无法看透伪装的。如果一个变形怪（doppelganger）伪装成你见过的旅店老板，那么眼镜会告诉你旅店老板的名字。如果之前遇到过的贵族伪装成蒙面的警官，眼镜就不会告诉你他的名字。

Glittering Snare.name: Glittering Snare
Glittering Snare.description:
Small flecks of mica, sand, and ground glass are packed into a spring-loaded canister that can be rigged to a trip wire or hidden in a container. The first creature to enter the square or open the container must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save as the area is showered with bright, glittering dust that sticks to skin, fur, and clothing.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.w0LUnfS2whVhDBUF]{Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)}

Failure The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.D7teqZ68L21aZCpd]{Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)}

Critical Failure As failure, but the penalty is -4. The glitter sticks for 5 minutes or until the creature spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove it. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than undetected, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.GNFNDyx8nfNXrgV6]{Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)}

Gloaming Shard.name: 夕幕碎片 Gloaming Shard
Gloaming Shard.description:
这把引人注目的+2强击回力匕首闪耀着夕阳的光芒，刀柄上刻着三角形的格子。一缕细细的黑暗将你的影子和剑的影子连在一起，即便剑离开了你的手也是如此。

启动 2 交互(阴影, 传送)

频率 每小时一次

效果 你用夕幕碎片对60尺内的目标进行一次投掷打击。无论是是否命中，这把匕首都不会回直接返回你手中，而是通过和你的阴影连线将你拉到它的影子里。如同@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}效果一般，你会立即传送到打击目标相邻的空间，然后伸手握住这把匕首。

Gloom Blade.name: 暗刃 Gloom Blade
Gloom Blade.description:
其色暗如漆炭，在黑暗中，这柄剑刃威力更胜。当在明亮光中，它只是+1短剑且在低于4环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic}或类似法术前不显示魔法灵光。

若在昏暗光或黑暗中，暗刃会变成+2强击短剑。若你用暗刃攻击未察觉到你的生物，你额外造成1d6点穿刺伤害。

若要升级暗刃的基础符文，以+1短剑作为基础来升级。若你将其提升至超过+2强击短剑，这些符文在昏暗光或黑暗中也正常生效。

Glorious Plate.name: Glorious Plate
Glorious Plate.description:
This elegant full plate is embossed with heraldic imagery and never tarnishes or loses its shine. Glorious plate is +2 resilient full plate.

In battle, glorious plate sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius, which enemies see as a blinding halo that obscures creatures other than the wearer. When an enemy looks at the wearer, it must attempt a DC 33 Will saving throw. The enemy is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Success The enemy is unaffected.

Failure For 1 minute, the wearer's allies within the glorious plate's 10-foot radius of light are concealed to the enemy. Allies are concealed only while they remain within the light; if allies enter the light later, they are concealed as well.

Critical Failure As failure, except the wearer's allies are hidden to the enemy instead of concealed.

Activate D command, Interact

Effect The armor casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8xRzLhwGL7Dgy3EZ]{Sanctuary} on you.

Gloves of Storing.name: 储物手套 Gloves of Storing
Gloves of Storing.description:
这对柔软的皮革手套中可以将一件物品储存在异次元空间中。当手套内保存了一件物品时，手套的手背上会展现一个简单的物品图案。许多储物手套在被发现时就已经保存了一件物品。

启动 A 交互

需求 手套内没有保存物品

效果 你手上的一件负载为1或更低的物品被传入手套的异次元空间中。

启动 F 交互

需求 手套内保存了一件物品，而且你有一只空闲的手。

效果 手套中保存的物品出现在你的手上。在接下来的1分钟内，手套无法再次被启动。

Gluttonous Spear.name: Gluttonous Spear
Gluttonous Spear.description:
The head of this +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning} spear is wrapped in greasy hide, and its head resembles a thick, clawed finger.

On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute, and you gain [[/r 1d8]] temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute.

Gnome Amalgam Musket.name: Gnome Amalgam Musket
Gnome Amalgam Musket.description: Rumored to be the result of a gnomish dare to make a variant of a hooked hammer that's even more intricate and complex, this weapon adds a musket to the mix of an already overcomplicated device.

Gnome Flickmace.name: 侏儒弹簧锤 Gnome Flickmace
Gnome Flickmace.description: 这种武器与其说是硬头锤不如说是连枷，这种武器有一个短柄，连着一段链条，末端有一个球。球在手腕的轻挥下打到其所及之处，然后将球带回持球者手中。

Gnome Hooked Hammer.name: 侏儒钩式战锤 Gnome Hooked Hammer
Gnome Hooked Hammer.description: 这件侏儒的家伙事同时具备工具和武器的特征，一端是锤子，一端是弯曲的镐。这是一种如此奇怪而笨拙的武器，以至于其他人会认为使用这种武器的侏儒都有点儿不可靠。

Goblin-Eye Orb.name: 地精眼石球 Goblin-Eye Orb
Goblin-Eye Orb.description:
用法 附着至一把武器

启动 f 想象

触发 你对一个对你隐蔽或藏匿的敌人，以附着的火器或弩尝试一次打击

需求 你在附着的火器或弩上达到专家熟练度，并且你的察觉具有专家熟练度

这枚彩色的大理石球通过一根缠绕在武器上的皮带挂在武器上。当你启动它时，对于触发的这次打击，你不需要因为敌人对你隐蔽或藏匿而尝试纯骰检定。

Godsbreath Bow.name: Godsbreath Bow
Godsbreath Bow.description:
This +2 greater striking composite shortbow is made from wood, horn, and sinew. Once wielded by Ninshaburian heretics, it's carried in a leather case etched with images of Namzaruum in combat with Somnalu. On a successful Strike, it deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage}.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You make a ranged Strike. On a hit, a vortex of air trails the arrow as it travels. When the arrow strikes its target, the vortex expands to a @Template[type:burst|distance:30]{30-foot radius} from its point of impact. The arrow deals an additional [[/r {1d8}[bludgeoning]]]{1d8 bludgeoning damage} against its target. For the next 3 minutes, any physical ranged attacks that would strike a target within the vortex deal an additional [[/r {1d8}[bludgeoning]]]{1d8 bludgeoning damage}. The vortex is difficult terrain, and creatures attempting to fly through the vortex using a move action must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save, losing its move action on a failed save. Any gases within the vortex are cleared by the winds.

Goggles of Night.name: 夜视护目镜 Goggles of Night
Goggles of Night.description:
这副光滑护目镜上有一对不透明的水晶镜片，但不会妨碍视力，反而会加强它。穿戴这副护目镜时，你在利用视觉进行的察觉Perception检定中获得+1物品加值。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 将镜片旋转90度，你获得1小时的黑暗视觉

Goggles of Night (Greater).name: 高等夜视护目镜 Goggles of Night (Greater)
Goggles of Night (Greater).description:
这副光滑护目镜上有一对不透明的水晶镜片，但不会妨碍视力，反而会加强它。穿戴这副护目镜时，你在利用视觉进行的察觉Perception检定中获得+2物品加值。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 将镜片旋转90度，你获得黑暗视觉直到你把镜片转回来或你不再绑定这件物品。

Goggles of Night (Major).name: 上等夜视护目镜 Goggles of Night (Major)
Goggles of Night (Major).description:
这副光滑护目镜上有一对不透明的水晶镜片，但不会妨碍视力，反而会加强它。穿戴这副护目镜时，你在利用视觉进行的察觉Perception检定中获得+3物品加值。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 将镜片旋转90度，你获得高等黑暗视觉直到你把镜片转回来或你不再绑定这件物品。

Gold Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年金龙龙息药水 Gold Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Gold Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了金龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出金龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的火焰龙息，造成 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 火焰伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Adult Gold Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Gold and garnet ring.name: 镶石榴石金戒指 Gold and garnet ring

Gold mask of a high priest.name: Gold mask of a high priest

Gold urn with scenes of judgment.name: Gold urn with scenes of judgment

Golden Blade of Mzali.name: Golden Blade of Mzali
Golden Blade of Mzali.description:
Each of these golden spears was forged in the days of old Mzali, when the sun kings ruled the city. The majority of these weapons are lost, most likely buried with warriors in tombs and temples sealed by Walkena's decrees. Walkena retains a single golden blade, which he grants to his Master of Spears.

This +2 greater striking returning spear is coated in brilliant gold, and beautiful engravings run along the shaft, depicting the rising and setting of the sun against Mzali's skyline. The spear glows with the effects of 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}. You can suppress or resume this light by using an action, which has the concentrate trait. When you hit a creature with the spear, it takes 1d6 additional fire damage. When you critically hit a creature with the spear, the creature takes [[/r {1d8}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} and @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success] as its blood boils away. Unlike normal when taking two types of persistent damage, a creature needs only a single successful flat check to remove both the fire and bleed damage.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically hit a creature with the weapon

Effect You call upon the spear's light to guide the creature away from violence. The creature must choose one of the following options:

  • The creature surrenders, immediately receiving the critical failure effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}.
  • The weapon casts 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness} on the creature with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|name:Blindness|traits:incapacitation,necromancy].

Regardless of the choice, the spear loses its ability to glow with light until your next daily preparations.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The spear casts 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form} on you, choosing fire as the form's trait. The spear loses its additional fire damage until your next daily preparations.

Golden Chyrsalis.name: Golden Chyrsalis
Golden Chyrsalis.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Threads of iridescent golden silk wrap around the core of this magical sling stone. When you activate and shoot a golden chrysalis, rather than making an attack roll for your Strike, you cause the chrysalis to unwind in midair to reveal a magical butterfly that flies in a @Template[type:line|distance:30], scattering golden scale dust that hangs in the air for 1 minute.

A creature that enters or begins its turn in the dust must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|name:Avoid Golden Chrysalis|showDC:all] or have its @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisiblity} negated, becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} instead of invisible. This effect applies both if the creature was already invisible and if it benefits from any new invisibility effects before the end of the invisibility negation effect from the golden chrysalis.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's invisibility is negated for 2 rounds.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute and its invisibility is negated for 1 minute.

Golden Legion Epaulet.name: Golden Legion Epaulet
Golden Legion Epaulet.description:
These gleaming golden epaulets are issued to Eagle Knight officers and worn as part of the uniform. While they can be enchanted to provide a variety of effects, the Golden Legion epaulet remains the most common.

Activate A (Command)

Frequency once per day

Effect Issue an order as part of the command. You and each ally within 60 feet who follows that order gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws against fear until the beginning of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.bP40jr6wE6MCsRvY]{Effect: Golden Legion Epaulet}

Golden Rod Memento.name: Golden Rod Memento
Golden Rod Memento.description:
This coin-sized golden pin depicts a bundle of five trimmed tree branches. Once you've stolen the pin, accepted it from Krampus willingly, or carried it for at least 1 minute, its curse activates. After that happens, the pin fastens itself to your clothing, providing you an insistent empathic admonition not to be naughty and constantly informing Krampus of your location, as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status}. The pin reappears and reattaches itself within moments if discarded or destroyed. The pin constantly monitors your actions, judging you against a good-aligned champion's code of conduct, plus the following third tenet:

  • You must never knowingly steal or inflict harm with the goal of stealing the victim's wealth.

This tenet doesn't prevent you from looting those you harm primarily in the defense of yourself and others. Whenever you violate this code of conduct, one of the golden branches tarnishes (and utterly egregious violations might tarnish multiple branches). During the winter following the curse activating, the pin transforms based on the number of golden branches remaining.

5 Branches: The pin either transforms into a pile of golden trinkets whose gold piece value equals your level × 25, or it grants you absolution for your misdeeds as a critically successful @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual for any good-aligned faith. You don't need to perform a special quest; your exemplary behavior over the past year qualifies.

3-4 Branches: The pin either becomes a non-magical golden pin worth 10 gp, or it grants you absolution for your misdeeds as a successful atone ritual for any good-aligned faith.

1-2 Branches: The pin transforms into a leering Krampus face. As long as you wear it, it grants you weakness 5 to bludgeoning damage, and you still can't remove it.

0 Branches: The pin transforms into Krampus, who appears in an adjacent space and knows of your misdeeds while wearing the pin.

Golem Stylus.name: Golem Stylus
Golem Stylus.description:
This small, diamond-tipped stylus allows you to inscribe a magical symbol on a golem's body and possibly gain control over it.

Activate D Interact

Frequency one per hour

Effect You make a quick inscription on an adjacent golem creature of 11th level or lower. The golem must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27] saving throw or you immediately gain control over the golem for 1 minute. A controlled golem is helpful toward you and follows your orders to the best of its ability as long as it is under your control. If the golem's original controller is within 60 feet of the golem and can see the golem, that controller can attempt a counteract check (DC 27) as a reaction to counteract this effect; on a success, the inscription disappears and the golem reverts to its pre-inscription state. The inscription can also be counteracted with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}.

If the golem you are targeting has already been inscribed with a golem stylus, you must attempt a counteract check against the previous inscription as part of activating the item, using your golem stylus's item level or your Arcana skill check modifier as your counteract check modifier. If successful, you modify the existing inscription so that the golem falls under your control.

Gorget of the Primal Roar.name: 原始咆哮颈甲 Gorget of the Primal Roar
Gorget of the Primal Roar.description:
这具经过镌刻的暗木颈甲似乎凶残地颤动着，为你在威吓Intimidation检定中提供+2物品加值。

启动 A 命令

频率 每次变形效果期间一次

需求 你在变形效果期间内不是类人生物的形态。

效果 你发出野兽的咆哮，对30尺内的所有敌人进行一次威吓Intimidation检定，对抗他们的意志DC以施加如下的效果。虽然启动的动作有着命令成分，但你不需要使用语言下达这次命令。

大成功 生物惊惧frightened 2

成功 生物惊惧frightened 1

失败 生物不受影响

Gorgon's Breath.name: Gorgon's Breath
Gorgon's Breath.description:
Gorgon's breath is a fine powder that can easily enter living creatures' bloodstreams through their lungs before binding to mucous membranes and causing any nearby soft tissues to harden.

Activate A Interact (Inhaled)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage} and slowed 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} (1 round)

Stage 4 petrified permanently

Gourd Home.name: 葫芦之家 Gourd Home
Gourd Home.description:
这个干燥的葫芦看起来平平无奇，它是空心的，有一根结实的绳子缠绕在葫芦的脖子上，便于携带。仔细观察就能发现，葫芦大致长成了一个粗糙的类似茅屋或小房子的形状。

启动 (1 分钟) 交互

效果 你将葫芦之家放置在地面上（一个足够容纳它的开放区域），并让它扩展为一个30平方尺大小、只有一扇门的建筑。葫芦的内部是一个单独的大房间，足够容纳10 个小型或中型生物，舒适度为普通。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

需求 葫芦之家必须已经扩展为房屋形态，并且位于土壤或土地上。

效果 通过从外面或里面敲门，你可以让葫芦缩小到正常外观，看起来就像是一个长在地面上的普通非魔法的葫芦。在接下来的 8 小时内，葫芦之家的内部会成为一个异次元空间，内部和之前看起来没有什么变化。

如果外面有任何生物捡起或伤害了葫芦之家，或有葫芦之家里有任何人尝试离开，则葫芦里的所有生物都会立即出现在葫芦周围的区域中，并且葫芦之家在 24 小时内无法再次启动。

Goz Mask.name: Goz Mask
Goz Mask.description:
Originally designed by a fanatical sect of Gozren priests, goz masks were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but they remain in use by people all around the Mwangi Expanse. These masks are typically made of wood and crafted to sport round, exaggerated features.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You ignore concealment caused by fog, smoke, and other obscuring vapors for 1 minute.

Goz Mask (Greater).name: Goz Mask (Greater)
Goz Mask (Greater).description:
Originally designed by a fanatical sect of Gozren priests, goz masks were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but they remain in use by people all around the Mwangi Expanse. These masks are typically made of wood and crafted to sport round, exaggerated features.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You ignore concealment caused by fog, smoke, and other obscuring vapors for 10 minutes.

Goz Mask (Major).name: Goz Mask (Major)
Goz Mask (Major).description:
Originally designed by a fanatical sect of Gozren priests, goz masks were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but they remain in use by people all around the Mwangi Expanse. These masks are typically made of wood and crafted to sport round, exaggerated features.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The major goz mask gives you @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision} and allows you to ignore all concealment from any environmental effects for 1 hour.

Grail of Twisted Desires.name: Grail of Twisted Desires
Grail of Twisted Desires.description:
This timeworn chalice is constructed of dull tin. It has an unassuming appearance save for the gold, silver, and ebony rings that encircle its rim.

Activate A envision

Frequency three times per day

Effect The chalice fills with one of three different wines of your choosing, as described below. The wine looks, tastes, and smells the same regardless of which type you choose, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} has no effect on the liquid beyond indicating that it is magical.

  • Ordinary wine.
  • Wine that, when imbibed, casts a 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} spell on the drinker.
  • Wine that, when imbibed, casts a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} spell on the drinker.

If you aren't chaotic, the first time each day you activate the chalice, there is a one-in-six chance that the liquid you conjure is a different type (the GM should roll 1d6 as a secret roll) instead. The second and third times you activate the chalice in the same day, the odds of this happening increase to two-in-six or three-in-six, respectively. If you are chaotic, the chalice always works as intended.

Granny's Hedge Trimmer.name: Granny's Hedge Trimmer
Granny's Hedge Trimmer.description:
Usage Two hands

Granny's hedge trimmer resembles a polearm, with whirring blades attached to the end of a pole. The item can be used as a simple weapon in the polearm group that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage}.

Grappling Arrow.name: Grappling Arrow
Grappling Arrow.description: This small grappling hook is designed to be tied to a rope and fired from a bow. When fired, it has half the normal range increment for the weapon.

Grappling Bolt.name: Grappling Bolt
Grappling Bolt.description: This small grappling hook is designed to be tied to a rope and fired from a crossbow. When fired, it has half the normal range increment for the weapon.

Grappling Gun.name: 爪钩枪 Grappling Gun
Grappling Gun.description: 这把木制的、类似手枪的装置有一个巨大的绞盘，上面缠绕着100尺长的金属细绳，可以将爪钩发射到100尺高的地方。要重新装填好爪钩枪，你必须通过转动绞盘的曲柄来收紧绳索，然后锁定爪钩。重新装填需要花费1分钟。

Grappling Gun (Clockwork).name: 发条爪钩枪 Grappling Gun (Clockwork)
Grappling Gun (Clockwork).description:
这把木制的、类似手枪的装置有一个巨大的绞盘，上面缠绕着100尺长的金属细绳，可以将爪钩发射到100尺高的地方。

这把爪钩枪的绞盘由发条装置控制，要重新装填好爪钩枪，你必须拉动杠杆，爪钩能自动收回来。重新装填需要花费3个交互动作。

Grappling Hook.name: 爪钩 Grappling Hook
Grappling Hook.description: 你可以用绳子系上一个抓钩，以便更容易攀爬。要锚定一个抓钩，需要对目标进行一次秘密掷骰的攻击检定，通常至少为DC20。一旦成功，爪钩就会牢牢抓住目标，但是如果发生大失败时，爪钩表面上抓的很牢，一旦使用者爬到一半就会突然脱开。

Grasping Snare.name: 机擭圈套 Grasping Snare
Grasping Snare.description:
你控制藤条和绳索以将生物束缚在原地。第一个进入方格的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:26] 豁免，效果如下。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物的速度Speed承受-5尺状态罚值，持续1分钟或直到它逃脱Escape（DC 26）。

失败 生物被禁足Immobilized 1轮，然后其速度Speed承受-5尺状态罚值，持续1分钟。这两个效果都会在它逃脱Escape（DC 26）时提前终止。

大失败 生物被禁足Immobilized 1分钟或直到它逃脱Escape（DC 26）。

Grasping Tree.name: Grasping Tree
Grasping Tree.description:
You rig tree branches, thin strands of bark, or other plant matter to close in on a creature that enters the snare's square. The first creature to enter the square must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19] saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes 1d4 slashing damage.

Failure As success, plus the target is flat-footed.

Critical Failure The target takes 2d4 slashing damage and is immobilized until it destroys the snare (AC 16, HP 25) or Escapes (DC 19).

Graveroot.name: 墓根 Graveroot
Graveroot.description:
这种从墓根中提取出的白色不透明汁液能让人意识模糊。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 4 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害} 和 呆滞stupefied 2 (1 轮)

Grease Snare.name: Grease Snare
Grease Snare.description:
This snare releases a stream of grease that coats the area, making movement difficult and potentially making the target slippery and clumsy. The square with the snare, as well as three adjacent squares you determine when you set the snare, become difficult terrain when a creature triggers the snare. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22] saving throw. A creature can use three Interact actions to wipe away the grease from a single square or from the triggering creature; removing the grease from the triggering creature ends the effects on it.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure For 1 minute, the creature is clumsy 1 and must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Thievery check. If the target rolls a failure at a Thievery check, it gets a critical failure instead. This is a misfortune effect.

Critical Failure As failure, but the effects last for 1 hour instead of 1 minute, and removing the grease from the triggering creature requires a 1-minute activity instead of three Interact actions.

Greataxe.name: 巨斧 Greataxe
Greataxe.description: 这把巨大的战斧太重了，单手无法使用。许多巨斧都有两头 "胡须"般的刃，底部有一个钩子以增加它们的切割力。

Greatclub.name: 巨木棒 Greatclub
Greatclub.description: 有些巨木棒有复杂的雕刻，而另一些就是粗壮的树枝。这把巨大的木棒太重了，单手无法使用。

Greatpick.name: 巨镐 Greatpick
Greatpick.description: 这种镐比普通镐具有更长的手柄和更宽的头部。它太重了，单手无法使用。

Greatsword.name: 巨剑 Greatsword
Greatsword.description: 这把巨大的双手剑几乎和它的使用者一样高。它的下刃一般较钝，以便在近距离格斗中获得额外的杠杆作用力。

Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年绿龙龙息药水 Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了绿龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出绿龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。
