Invisibility.name: 隐形 Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
光线似乎直接穿透了该护甲。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 轻念命令词，你会变得隐形1分钟，获得2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility} 的效果。

制造需求 提供施放1次隐形术法术

Invisibility (Greater).name: 高等隐形 Invisibility (Greater)
Invisibility (Greater).description:
光线似乎直接穿透了该护甲。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天三次

效果 轻念命令词，你会变得隐形1分钟，获得2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility} 的效果。

制造需求 提供施放1次隐形术法术

Invisibility Potion.name: 隐形药水 Invisibility Potion
Invisibility Potion.description: 隐形药水是一种无色而且异常轻盈的药水。喝下它之后，你获得2环隐形术Invisibility的效果。

Invisible Chain Shirt.name: 无形链甲衫 Invisible Chain Shirt
Invisible Chain Shirt.description:
这件+2抗力@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.VDudQ4x2ozosAbTb]{隐形 Invisibility}链甲衫本身是隐形的。其他生物无法看见它，所以你可以偷偷地穿着它。此外，这种护甲的隐形材料让它比普通的链甲衫更为安静舒适，它失去嘈杂（noisy）特征，获得舒适（comfort）特征。

启动 2 想象

频率 每分钟一次

效果 你行走一次，然后身体部分隐形，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}效果，直到你下一回合结束或直到你使用敌对动作之前，二者以先发生的为准。和通常一样，你可以利用启动带来的隐蔽效果进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}动作。

Invisible Net.name: Invisible Net
Invisible Net.description:
Activate A Interact

You activate this folded lace handkerchief by spreading it out on the ground, where it grows to cover a 30-foot-by- 30-foot square area. Pale and diaphanous, the spread handkerchief is exceptionally difficult to see from more than 30 feet away and evaporates entirely after 1 minute. Any creature that falls on the net doesn't take falling damage.

Iris of the Sky.name: Iris of the Sky
Iris of the Sky.description:
This +1 striking jezail is built from white hot metal and has a ruby fused into the palm wood stock. When the iris of the sky misfires, you take [[/r {5}[persistent,fire]]]{5} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

The first firearm of this type came as the result of a gunslinger who entreated an efreeti, wishing for the might of the desert sun. The weapon constantly glows and burns with a brilliant intensity. The firearm has since belonged to an extensive string of users and been replicated several times, though each wielder of the weapon, whether the original or one of its copies, has eventually ended up as a charred husk, slain by fire in battle or unusual accidents that no one could quite explain except, perhaps, the efreet.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per minute

Effect You focus the solar energy housed in the ruby to release a gout of solar flame instead of a bullet. Make a Strike with the iris of the sky. All damage from this Strike is fire damage and the target takes an additional [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} and [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Activate 2 command, envision (fortune)

Frequency once per minute

Effect You make a wish into the iris of the sky, yearning for it to strike true, and then fire. Strike against a foe with the iris, rolling the attack roll twice and taking the better result. If the attack is a failure, you take [[/r {5}[persistent,fire]]]{5} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Iron Cube.name: 铁方块 Iron Cube
Iron Cube.description:
用法 附着到一件武器

启动 D @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.39CqlOzlHjEhh0E4]{击倒 Knockdown}

需求 你在附着的武器上达到专家

这个黑色的铁方块通过一条铁链附着到一把武器上。当你启动铁方块，你使用击倒Knockdown，如战士同名专长。

如果你拥有击倒Knockdown专长，那么可以忽略掉它通常的体型限制。

Iron Cudgel.name: 铁棒 Iron Cudgel
Iron Cudgel.description:
这根微型短铁棒通常通过一条铁链附着到一把武器上。当你启动这根短铁棒，你使用残酷终结Brutal Finish，如战士同名专长。你必须满足通常的条件，包括来自连携Press特性的限制。

如果你拥有残酷终结Brutal Finish专长，在成功或失败时增加两个额外的武器伤害骰。

用法 附着到一件武器

启动 A 残酷终结 Brutal Finish

需求 你在附着的武器上达到大师

Iron Equalizer.name: 铁配重 Iron Equalizer
Iron Equalizer.description:
用法 附着到一件武器

启动 A @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.h5DzKmKDADGhvmF9]{确定之击 Certain Strike}

需求 你在附着的武器上达到大师

这条小铁带上有个可以移动的配重，能够用来调整附着武器的平衡。当你启动它时，你使用确定之击Certain Strike，如战士同名专长。你必须满足通常的条件，包括来自连携Press特性的限制。

如果你拥有确定之击Certain Strike专长，失败效果提升到造成武器的正常伤害。

Iron Medallion.name: 铁奖章 Iron Medallion
Iron Medallion.description:
用法 附着到盔甲

启动 F 想象

触发 你进行一次针对恐惧Fear效果的意志豁免，但尚未投掷豁免骰

需求 你在意志豁免上的熟练等级达到大师，或拥有勇敢Bravery职业特性。

这枚小奖章的形状像是一面盾牌。当你启动它，你在针对恐惧的意志豁免中获得+2状态加值，持续1分钟。对于触发的那次豁免，如果你的结果是失败，则改为成功；如果结果是大失败，则改为失败。

Isolation Draught.name: Isolation Draught
Isolation Draught.description:
Derived from steeping toxic highland plum pits in refined grain alcohols, this clear tonic slowly shuts down the imbiber's senses.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 30 minutes

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}, -3 to all Perception checks (1 minute)

Stage 2 dazzled, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, -5 to all Perception checks (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, deafened, -5 to all Perception checks (5 minutes)

Ivory Baton.name: Ivory Baton
Ivory Baton.description:
This white, slender rod bears intricately carved reliefs of magnificent animals that bow and dance to some unseen commander. The baton enables you to command constructs.

Activate 2 command, Interact (enchantment, incapacitation)

Frequency once per day

Effect You take control of a construct. This has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} with a DC of 30, but it affects only constructs. It lacks the mental trait and functions on mindless constructs. It also ignores any golem antimagic the target might have. The effect's duration endsif the baton is destroyed or leaves your possession for at least 1 minute, and you can issue commands to the target only while holding the baton.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per round

Effect You closely direct the actions of one construct you control and can see within 60 feet. That construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.WXsWkFosSGBrptwF]{Effect: Ivory Baton}

Ivory Baton (Greater).name: Ivory Baton (Greater)
Ivory Baton (Greater).description:
This white, slender rod bears intricately carved reliefs of magnificent animals that bow and dance to some unseen commander. The baton enables you to command constructs.

Activate 2 command, Interact (enchantment, incapacitation)

Frequency once per day

Effect You take control of a construct. This has the effects of 9th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} with a DC of 39, but it affects only constructs. It lacks the mental trait and functions on mindless constructs. It also ignores any golem antimagic the target might have. The effect's duration endsif the baton is destroyed or leaves your possession for at least 1 minute, and you can issue commands to the target only while holding the baton.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per round

Effect You closely direct the actions of one construct you control and can see within 60 feet. That construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.WXsWkFosSGBrptwF]{Effect: Ivory Baton}

Ixamè's Eye.name: Ixamè's Eye
Ixamè's Eye.description:
Usage affixed to headgear

Activate F Envision.

Via some strange alchemical reaction with the gasses of Terwa Lake, the cloud dragon Ixamè's eyeballs have shriveled into sky-blue gems. The dragon's sense of vision isn't impaired, and her eyes can't be removed from her head until she's destroyed. Once removed, each gem functions as a special talisman.

Ixamè's eye sparkles when it's in an area of fog or mist. Activating the talisman enables you to see clearly through fog and mist for 1 minute; any creature concealed only by fog or mist is no longer concealed to you. If such a creature was relying on the concealment to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, this also means it's no longer hidden or undetected.

Jack's Tattered Cape.name: Jack's Tattered Cape
Jack's Tattered Cape.description:
This ragged, mud-stained cape closes with a single black button engraved with a leering devil's face. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} (or Vault, if you're Spring-Heeled Jack), you gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.vj2hkcSbwwRYNLk5]{Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape}

Jade Bauble.name: 翡翠雕饰 Jade Bauble
Jade Bauble.description:
用法 附着到一件近战武器

启动 A 命令

需求 你在附着的武器上达到大师

这块翡翠通常被雕刻成一个决斗者的形状，有时也会雕刻成一个多武装的生物。当你启动这块雕饰，它魔法般地吸引了对手的注意力。直到你下一回合开始，在护符附着的武器的触及范围内的敌人陷入措手不及Flat-footed。

Jade Cat.name: 翡翠猫 Jade Cat
Jade Cat.description:
用法 附着到盔甲

启动 F 命令

触发 你跌落或进行一次用来保持平衡Balance的特技Acrobatics检定

需求 你在特技Acrobatics上受训

这个拇指大小的猫科动物是用稀有的宝石雕刻成的。翡翠猫Jade Cat通常作为垂饰挂在盔甲上。你启动这只猫后的1分钟内，你视所有坠落的坠落高度减少20尺、你在保持平衡Balance的时候不会陷入措手不及Flat-footed、且狭窄的表面和崎岖的地表对你来说不是困难地形。

Jar of Shifting Sands.name: 流沙之罐 Jar of Shifting Sands
Jar of Shifting Sands.description:
这个小陶罐内装满了大约四分之一加仑的沙子。当你倒出里面的沙子时，陶罐随即能变出更多的沙子。尽管听上去匪夷所思，据说世界上至少有一个沙漠是由这种陶罐创造出来的。

启动 1 命令, 交互

效果 你能让沙子以每轮1加仑的速度从陶罐里涌出。该效果不会结束，直到罐子被盖上盖子。

启动 2 命令, 交互

效果 你迅速将沙子倒在1块相邻的方格里，造成困难地形。你在1分钟内无法使用罐子的任何一种启动效果。

Javelin.name: 标枪 Javelin
Javelin.description: 这种细矛在投掷中能保持平衡，但并非设计用于近战。

Javelin of Lightning.name: 闪电标枪 Javelin of Lightning
Javelin of Lightning.description:
启动 D 命令, 交互

这个物品像是一把普通的标枪，上面刻有闪电矢的图纹。如果没启动的时候就将它丢出去，它会在空中摇晃，无法击中目标。

当你启动Activate标枪，你的命令让雕纹灌注了闪电。你之后投掷标枪。它会在你投掷出去之后立刻碎裂并释放其中的魔法，施展一次4环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电矢 Lightning Bolt} 法术，法术原点是你的格子。

闪电矢造成 [[/r 5d12]] 电击伤害，反射Reflex豁免DC为25

Jawbreaker Shield.name: Jawbreaker Shield
Jawbreaker Shield.description:
This heavy bone shield is composed of a massive plate of dinosaur bone with jagged, tooth-like ridges ringing its edge. It has Hardness 12, HP 48, and BT 24. The ridges are unremovable +1 striking shield spikes that deal slashing damage instead of piercing damage.

While holding the jawbreaker shield, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Reflex DC to resist Swallow Whole attacks.

Activate R Interact

Trigger A creature attacks you with a jaws or fangs Strike or similar Strike using its mouth

Effect You make a shield bash Strike as a reaction against the attacker. If the shield bash hits, the target takes damage and must attempt a DC 31 Fortitude saving throw. The effects of the saving throw are determined after the effects of the triggering Strike are resolved.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure You wound the target's mouth. It takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] and takes a -2 status penalty to attack and damage rolls with jaws, fangs, or similar Strikes for 24 hours.

Critical Failure You break the target's jaw. As failure, and the creature can't make Strikes using its mouth for 1 minute. At the end of its turn, it can attempt a Fortitude save to regain the ability to make Strikes using its mouth.

Jellyfish Lamp.name: Jellyfish Lamp
Jellyfish Lamp.description: These bioluminescent jellyfish are as bright as candles, come in a variety of colors, and can act as living lanterns. They dry up and die if removed from the water for more than 1 hour, but as long as they're allowed access to seawater, they can usually survive for up to 1 year by feeding on micronutrients. Rarely, a well-treated jellyfish lamp might live longer and potentially develop stronger light or additional abilities.

Jerkin of Liberation.name: Jerkin of Liberation
Jerkin of Liberation.description:
This +2 greater resilient studded leather is traditionally inscribed with a symbol of either Norgorber or Cayden Cailean. Its leather is light as silk, and its buttons and studs are gleaming crystal. While you wear it, you get a +15-foot item bonus to your Speed, and effects that attempt to impose penalties on your Speed must first counteract the jerkin of liberation or they have no effect on you.

In addition, you are hard to incapacitate. You use the jerkin's item level or your own level, whichever is higher, to determine effects of the incapacitation trait.

Jet and white gold game set.name: Jet and white gold game set

Jezail.name: 杰撒伊火枪 Jezail
Jezail.description: 杰撒伊火枪是一种被发明在卡斯玛隆的简单而有效的长枪，其特色为可自定义的枪托以及燧发装置。尽管火力和射程都比不上和声鸟枪（Harmona Gun）和重型火绳枪，但杰撒伊火枪是精美匀称的合适各式各样的战斗环境。这种火器甚至可以只用一只手夹在腋下进行一次较不准确的攻击。

Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).name: 高等主宰突变药剂 Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)
Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).description:
启动1 交互

在你饮用这瓶突变药剂后，你的身体会变得厚实而强壮。你呈现出容光焕发的健康体态，不过也会倾向于变得呆板而缺乏注意力。

好处 你在强韧豁免上获得+3物品加值，并获得30点临时生命值。每当你将生命值保持在最大值至少1分钟时，你就会重新获得这一临时生命值。 当你在强韧豁免上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功。

缺陷 你在意志豁免、察觉（Perception）检定和先攻骰上承受-2的减值。

持续时间 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.xLilBqqf34ZJYO9i]{效果：高等主宰突变药剂}

Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser).name: 次等主宰突变药剂 Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)
Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

在你饮用这瓶突变药剂后，你的身体会变得厚实而强壮。你呈现出容光焕发的健康体态，不过也会倾向于变得呆板而缺乏注意力。

好处 你在强韧豁免上获得+1物品加值，并获得5点临时生命值。每当你将生命值保持在最大值至少1分钟时，你就会重新获得这一临时生命值。

缺陷 你在意志豁免、察觉（Perception）检定和先攻骰上承受-2的减值。

持续时间 1 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.1l139A2Qik4lBHKO]{效果：次等主宰突变药剂}

Juggernaut Mutagen (Major).name: 上等主宰突变药剂 Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)
Juggernaut Mutagen (Major).description:
启动 A 交互

在你饮用这瓶突变药剂后，你的身体会变得厚实而强壮。你呈现出容光焕发的健康体态，不过也会倾向于变得呆板而缺乏注意力。

好处 你在强韧豁免上获得+4物品加值，并获得45点临时生命值。每当你将生命值保持在最大值至少1分钟时，你就会重新获得这一临时生命值。 当你在强韧豁免上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功，并且你在强韧豁免上取得的大失败全都替换为失败。

缺陷 你在意志豁免、察觉（Perception）检定和先攻骰上承受-2的减值。

持续时间 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.2PNo8u4wxSbz5WEs]{效果：上等主宰突变药剂}

Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate).name: 中等主宰突变药剂 Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate)
Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

在你饮用这瓶突变药剂后，你的身体会变得厚实而强壮。你呈现出容光焕发的健康体态，不过也会倾向于变得呆板而缺乏注意力。

好处 你在强韧豁免上获得+2物品加值，并获得10点临时生命值。每当你将生命值保持在最大值至少1分钟时，你就会重新获得这一临时生命值。

缺陷 你在意志豁免、察觉（Perception）检定和先攻骰上承受-2的减值。

持续时间 10 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fUrZ4xcMJz0CfTyG]{效果：中等主宰突变药剂}

Juggling Club.name: Juggling Club
Juggling Club.description: A juggling club is lighter than a typical club and balanced to be easily caught and thrown again by a juggler. While a juggling club deals less damage, the extra throwing distance its light weight allows is important for juggling.

Junk Bomb (Greater).name: Junk Bomb (Greater)
Junk Bomb (Greater).description:
This volatile-looking bomb is cobbled together from jagged metal scrap, broken glass, and other bits of razor-sharp fragments, lashed around a core of explosive alchemical slag. A junk bomb deals [[/r {3d8}[slashing]]]{3d8 slashing damage}, [[/r {3}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, and [[/r {3}[splash,slashing]]]{3 slashing splash damage}.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Junk Bomb (Lesser).name: Junk Bomb (Lesser)
Junk Bomb (Lesser).description: This volatile-looking bomb is cobbled together from jagged metal scrap, broken glass, and other bits of razor-sharp fragments, lashed around a core of explosive alchemical slag. A junk bomb deals [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 slashing damage}, [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, and [[/r {1}[splash,slashing]]]{1 slashing splash damage}.

Junk Bomb (Major).name: Junk Bomb (Major)
Junk Bomb (Major).description:
This volatile-looking bomb is cobbled together from jagged metal scrap, broken glass, and other bits of razor-sharp fragments, lashed around a core of explosive alchemical slag. A junk bomb deals [[/r {4d8}[slashing]]]{4d8 slashing damage}, [[/r {4}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, and [[/r {4}[splash,slashing]]]{4 slashing splash damage}.

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

Junk Bomb (Moderate).name: Junk Bomb (Moderate)
Junk Bomb (Moderate).description:
This volatile-looking bomb is cobbled together from jagged metal scrap, broken glass, and other bits of razor-sharp fragments, lashed around a core of explosive alchemical slag. A junk bomb deals [[/r {2d8}[slashing]]]{2d8 slashing damage}, [[/r {2}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, and [[/r {2}[splash,slashing]]]{2 slashing splash damage}.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Ka Stone.name: Ka Stone
Ka Stone.description:
Ontained with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CZQgH17ZxoBiVXLa]{Ka Stone Ritual}

You inscribe your true name on your ka stone, as well as oaths to gods and pharaohs, and embed it in your forehead in a special ritual with a sphinx or with a living monolith who already has this feat. The ka stone is an invested magic item that you automatically invest each day. It can't be removed without your permission, nor can it be dispelled, and you can never lose investiture in the ka stone. Its Bulk is negligible.

The ka stone grants you a +1 item bonus to saves against death effects and negative effects, which increases to +2 at 8th level, +3 at 14th level, and +4 at 20th level.

Activate 2 (envision), or a different activation if otherwise specified

Frequency a number of times each day equal to the number of class feats you have from the Living Monolith archetype

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} on yourself or use one of the other activated abilities granted by a later Living Monolith feat.

Kama.name: 单镰 Kama
Kama.description: 类似镰刀，在某些地区用来收割谷物，单镰有着短而弯的刀刃和木柄。

Karambit.name: 爪刀 Karambit
Karambit.description: 这种小型弯刀就像老虎爪子一样，能够造成很深的伤口。

Katana.name: 打刀 Katana
Katana.description: 打刀有着弯曲的单边刀刃，以其锋利而闻名。

Katar.name: 拳刃 Katar
Katar.description: 也被称为拳刃，其特定是Ｈ型的握把，允许刀刃从指关节外突出。

Keen.name: 锐锋 Keen
Keen.description: 锐锋武器的锋刃超乎寻常的锐利。用该武器的攻击若骰出19且攻击结果为成功，则可为重击。若骰出19但结果为失败，则该性能符文没有效果。

Keymaking Tools.name: 配钥工具 Keymaking Tools
Keymaking Tools.description: 这件盗贼工具可以让它的主人在开锁后一段时间内拥有锁的控制权限。当用此工具进行开锁（Pick a Lock）动作时，贼活检定有+1物品加值。当用此工具将锁完全打开时，它会生成一把临时的钥匙副本。这把幻影钥匙可以像原本的钥匙一样上锁或者开锁。这把钥匙被一条精致的银链栓在盗贼工具上，12小时后会消失。通过这种方式创造出的钥匙副本，同一套盗贼工具只能包含一把。创建新钥匙将取代旧钥匙。

Khakkara.name: 禅杖 Khakkara
Khakkara.description: 这根杖的顶端是尖锐的金属圈，上面挂着许多叮当作响的小环，在禅杖运动时发出噪音，让你能够彰显你的存在并在你移动时吓退野生动物。

Khopesh.name: Khopesh
Khopesh.description: This curved sickle sword has a pointed tip, allowing it to be swung like a handaxe or thrust like a short sword. The tip of a khopesh is usually hooked so that it can be used to disarm an opponent's shield or weapon.

Kin-Warding.name: Kin-Warding
Kin-Warding.description: A kin-warding clan dagger can deflect attacks aimed at your allies. When you use the weapon's parry trait, you can point the clan dagger at an adjacent ally instead of defending yourself, creating a shield of runes around them. The runic barrier grants your ally the weapon's circumstance bonus to AC, but you do not gain the bonus yourself.

King's Sleep.name: 王之安眠 King's Sleep
King's Sleep.description:
王之安眠是一种极其隐蔽的长效毒素，让那些尊贵的受害者看起来仿佛是死于疾病甚至自然因素。王之安眠带来的流失（drained）状态会在每次豁免失败时叠加，并且在毒素持续期间无法被移除。

启动 A 交互 (摄入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41]

潜伏期 1 天

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失Drained 1} (1 天)

阶段 2 流失drained 1 (1 天)

阶段 3 流失drained 2 (1 天)

Kite.name: Kite
Kite.description: This colorful canvas kite is controlled by twine and flies when it catches the wind.

Knapsack of Halflingkind.name: 半身人小背包 Knapsack of Halflingkind
Knapsack of Halflingkind.description:
这件耐用的皮革背包包含了三块被大背包扣扣上的隔间。第一块的内衬是蓝色的缎子，而且装着一块异次元空间，等同于@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JBMBaN9dZLytfFLQ]{II型次元袋 Bag of Holding (Type II)}。

第二块隔间没有内衬，你可以从里面抓出四件料理道具和器皿。一旦用它们做完一顿料理，这些物品也会变成碟子和银餐具，在料理被吃完后则会消散，同时带走所有的厨余。在一小时后，这些厨具会再次干净地出现在隔间中。这块隔间只提供厨具，不提供食物。

第三块隔间有着奢侈的紫色天鹅绒内衬，并装着羊皮纸包着的莓果馅饼。一个生物可以用一个交互Interact动作打开羊皮纸并吃一块馅饼，以恢复 [[/r 2d8+4]] 点生命值。小背包每天能提供四块馅饼，这些馅饼会在早餐时间出现在背包里。在一天结束时，没吃完的馅饼都会消散。

Knapsack of Halflingkind (Greater).name: 高等半身人小背包 Knapsack of Halflingkind (Greater)
Knapsack of Halflingkind (Greater).description:
这件耐用的皮革背包包含了三块被大背包扣扣上的隔间。第一块的内衬是蓝色的缎子，而且装着一块异次元空间，等同于@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JBMBaN9dZLytfFLQ]{II型次元袋 Bag of Holding (Type II)}。

第二块隔间没有内衬，你可以从里面抓出四件料理道具和器皿。一旦用它们做完一顿料理，这些物品也会变成碟子和银餐具，在料理被吃完后则会消散，同时带走所有的厨余。在一小时后，这些厨具会再次干净地出现在隔间中。这块隔间只提供厨具，不提供食物。

第三块隔间有着奢侈的紫色天鹅绒内衬，并装着羊皮纸包着的莓果馅饼。一个生物可以用一个交互Interact动作打开羊皮纸并吃一块馅饼，以恢复 [[/r 4d8+8]] 点生命值。小背包每天能提供四块馅饼，这些馅饼会在早餐时间出现在背包里。在一天结束时，没吃完的馅饼都会消散。

第四块隔间的内衬是金色天鹅绒。每天一次，你可以从中抓出一个幸运的魔法投石索。如果你用这个投石索攻击，你可以投两次攻击骰和伤害骰，并选用较好的结果。这是一个幸运效果。如果石头在你的回合结束前都没有被投出去，那么就会失去上面的魔法效果。这个隔间一旦被启动，就会把自己缝上直到第二天的到来。

第五块隔间的内衬是黑色羊绒。每天一次，你可以翻开这个隔间，铺到地上做成一个5尺见方的传送门。第一个从邻接方格快步Step进入传送门的人会被传送走。这与5环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{任意门 Dimension Door}法术有着相同的效果，除了被影响的生物会带着这个小背包一起走。当这个传送门被用过，或当你的下一回合开始前都没有被用过，这块隔间会自动关上，而且到第二天之前都无法再次被翻开。

Knockout Dram.name: Knockout Dram
Knockout Dram.description:
This soporific chemical comes in liquid form and is virtually undetectable by taste or scent. It's most commonly slipped into a victim's drink to quickly induce a deep unconsciousness.

Activate 1 Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 10 hours

Stage 1 fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} and can't attempt Perception checks to wake up (1 minute)

Stage 2 sleep normally ([[/br 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours})

Knuckle Duster.name: 指虎 Knuckle Duster
Knuckle Duster.description: 这一丁点儿的硬化金属受到街道硬汉们的钟爱。典型的指虎以黄铜制成，并有四个指孔，所以能置于关节上，以增加些许拳击的威力。

Kortos Diamond.name: Kortos Diamond
Kortos Diamond.description:
The hilt of this +3 major striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6xu6dPIaUZ7edKEB]{Axiomatic} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.payq4TwkN2BRF6fs]{Spell-Storing} longsword is simple and elegant. The blade itself is made of throneglass-a clear, jewellike crafting material with a razor-sharp edge, capable of absorbing psychic magic and redirecting it at the wielder's enemies. Whenever the Kortos Diamond is in an area of dim or brighter light, it glows faintly, as if reflecting the light of a setting sun.

While wielding the Kortos Diamond, you gain a +2 item bonus on saving throws against mental effects. You can never harm yourself with the Kortos Diamond, even if confused.

If you ever travel farther than 100 miles from the Isle of Kortos while in possession of the Kortos Diamond, the sword becomes impossibly heavy; you are encumbered as long as you carry the sword and remain outside of this area. If you relinquish the Kortos Diamond while away from Kortos, the sword gradually makes its way back to the isle over the course of a year.

Activate (Single Action) Interact

Effect You attempt a melee Strike with the Kortos Diamond against a creature within reach. On a hit, you deal damage as normal and the target's mind is inflicted with a powerful disruptive energy. When the creature attempts to Cast a Spell, it must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:44]; on a failure, the spell fails and both the spell and the actions spent to cast it are lost. This effect lasts for up to 1 minute.

Activate (Free Action) envision

Frequency once per round

Trigger You damage an aberration with the Kortos Diamond

Effect You deal an additional [[/r 2d8]] force damage to the struck creature.

Activate (Two Actions) command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You hold the Kortos Diamond aloft and proclaim your might in a booming voice. You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fkDeKktdmbeplYRY]{Overwhelming Presence} (DC 42).

Destruction A deity who ascended to divinity via the Test of the Starstone can damage and destroy the Kortos Diamond as if it were not an artifact.

Kraken's Guard.name: 海妖守护 Kraken's Guard
Kraken's Guard.description:
这面钢盾漆著斑驳的殷红色，只要沾水就会褶褶闪亮。盾面纹饰为八道彼此交缠的饰条，代表巨大海妖盘旋的触手，中间有着一对闪耀凶狠光芒的眼睛。

硬度 HP BT
16 96 48

启动 2 举盾

频率 每小时一次

效果 你释放出海妖的愤怒，举起盾牌（Raise the Shield）。盾牌上的饰条立即延伸至不可思议的长度，蠕动着伸向你的敌人，对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]内所有敌人造成[[/r {10d10}[bludgeoning]]]{10d10钝击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true|name:Kraken's Guard Tentacle Attack|traits:uncommon]豁免）。盾牌会保持启动1分钟，在这段时间内，你可以用其擒抱（Grapple）10呎内的一个生物，无须一只空着的手。当你用这面盾牌擒抱敌人，你的运动检定获得+3物品加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.wFP3SqPoO0bCPmyK]{效果：海妖守护}

Kukri.name: 反曲刀 Kukri
Kukri.description: 这把一英尺长的小刀，向内弯曲，刀柄上没有刀镡。

Kusarigama.name: 锁镰 Kusarigama
Kusarigama.description: 这种令人惊叹的武器是由挂着重物的带有锁链的镰刀组成，能够缴械对手或从远距离进行攻击。

Lady's Knife.name: 淑女匕首 Lady's Knife
Lady's Knife.description:
这把+1强击回力匕首（+1 striking returning dagger）有个精心打造的宝石刀柄，可以用皮绳困在手腕上，或作为装饰别在女性上衣中。尽管这种匕首的名字起源于奥帕拉（Oppara）女性对它的偏爱，但这种匕首如今在各种性别中都很受欢迎，并且在最近成为了艾巴萨罗姆的新宠。大多数贵族们都会带着它，用刀柄上的宝石来装点自己的盛装。

启动 2 命令, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你将此武器赠与一位盟友，或调情或柏拉图式。你和你的盟友将在1天内保持连接。再此期间内，你们都能获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{关照术 Status}带来的好处，将彼此作为目标。

启动 1 想象

频率 每天一次

需求 你通过给与淑女匕首和某个盟友建立了连接

效果 你召回匕首。淑女匕首瞬间传送到你手中。如果和匕首的距离超过1英里，召唤匕首的尝试会失败。和你连接的盟友也可以每天使用同样的启动动作来召回匕首。

Lance.name: 长枪 Lance
Lance.description: 这种长矛状的武器用于骑乘生物时造成巨大的伤害。

Lantern (Bull's Eye).name: 提灯(牛眼) Lantern (Bull's Eye)
Lantern (Bull's Eye).description: 一盏提灯提供明亮光线并且需要1品脱油才能燃烧6小时。一个牛眼提灯在一个60英尺的锥形内发出光芒。一个附盖提灯在30英尺半径范围内散发光线并配有百叶窗，你可以关闭它以阻挡光线。关闭或打开百叶窗需要一个【交互动作】。

Lantern (Hooded).name: 提灯(附盖) Lantern (Hooded)
Lantern (Hooded).description: 一盏提灯提供明亮光线并且需要1品脱油才能燃烧6小时。一个牛眼提灯在一个60英尺的锥形内发出光芒。一个附盖提灯在30英尺半径范围内散发光线并配有百叶窗，你可以关闭它以阻挡光线。关闭或打开百叶窗需要一个【交互动作】。

Lantern of Empty Light.name: Lantern of Empty Light
Lantern of Empty Light.description:
It's said that the pale blue light of this eldritch lantern shines from another dimension or even is linked, somehow, to the glow of a ghost when it is consumed by the Outer Goddess Nhimbaloth. A lantern of empty light is not intrinsically an evil item, though it remains a favored tool of those who would manipulate the minds of others for sinister reasons. It can be used as a normal bull's-eye lantern, but prolonged use tends to instill in the user a vague sense of being watched by unseen eyes.

Activate 2 Interact (emotion, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You direct the lantern's light upon a single living creature within 60 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20|traits:damaging-effect] save to resist the light's effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and realizes that you attempted to mentally influence them with the light.

Success The creature is unaffected but thinks the light was harmless, unless it knows the true nature of the lantern already.

Failure The creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by the lantern's light, and remains fascinated as long as you Sustain the Activation, up to 10 minutes.

Critical Failure As failure, but you can Sustain the Activation for up to 1 hour. When the effect ends, the fascinated creature remembers any events that took place while fascinated only as indistinct, dream-like memories.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You direct the lantern's light upon a single incorporeal undead creature within 60 feet to siphon away some of the creature's essence, dealing [[/r {4d8}[positive]]]{4d8 positive damage} to the creature (@Check[type:will|dc:20|basic:true] save).

Large Bore Modifications.name: 大口径改修 Large Bore Modifications
Large Bore Modifications.description:
这些改进包括更重的枪托和更大口径的代替枪管，旨在增加火器的杀伤力。大口径改修只适用于具有反冲（kickback）或散射（scatter）特征的火器，安装大口径改修需要1小时，但该工作可以与为了防止哑火所进行的标准保养工作同时进行。

当你在反冲火器上安装大口径改修时，反冲特征在伤害上带来的环境加值从+1增加到+2，但抵消反冲在攻击骰上的环境减值所需的力量值增加到18。

当你在散射火器上安装大口径改修时，散射效果的半径增加5尺，但如果持用者的力量小于14，则该武器的攻击骰将受到-2环境减值。如果火器同时具有反冲和散射特征，抵消攻击减值所需的力量值增加到18。

Lastwall Soup.name: Lastwall Soup
Lastwall Soup.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Crimson Reclaimers make this rich, hearty soup using herbs that baffle the senses of the undead. A bowl of Lastwall soup is as nourishing as a full meal.

In addition, for 1 hour after consuming a bowl of Lastwall soup, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.6A8jsLR7upLGuRiv]{Effect: Lastwall Soup}

Leadenleg.name: 铅髀 Leadenleg
Leadenleg.description:
铅髀一旦注入体内便会沉到四肢末端，使四肢陷入近乎瘫痪的麻痹。

启动 2 交互(伤口)

豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10毒素伤害}及全速度-5尺状态罚值（1轮）

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}及全速度-5尺状态罚值（1轮）

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}及全速度-5尺状态罚值（1轮）

Leaper's Elixir (Greater).name: 高等跳跃者灵药 Leaper's Elixir (Greater)
Leaper's Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 1 交互

这瓶刺激性的溶液能够增强你腿部肌肉的弹性和伸缩性。在饮用灵药后的1分钟，取代原本的2个动作，你能够以单个动作进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump} 。如果你这样做，你不会执行最初的迈步（Stride）（即便你没有迈步10尺你也不会失败）。

你跳高时能够跳起的最大垂直距离如同你跳远时能够跳出的水平距离。

Leaper's Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等跳跃者灵药 Leaper's Elixir (Lesser)
Leaper's Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 1 交互

这瓶刺激性的溶液能够增强你腿部肌肉的弹性和伸缩性。在饮用灵药后的1分钟，取代原本的2个动作，你能够以单个动作进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump} 。如果你这样做，你不会执行最初的迈步（Stride）（即便你没有迈步10尺你也不会失败）。

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲 Leather Armor
Leather Armor.description: 这种盔甲混合了柔韧的生皮和成型的熟皮，在最大限度的灵活下提供了保护。

Leiomano.name: 鲨齿棒 Leiomano
Leiomano.description: 这种大棒嵌入了锋利的牙齿，通常是鲨鱼牙齿，可以轻易撕开血肉。这是民那塔战士的首选武器。

Leopard's Armor.name: Leopard's Armor
Leopard's Armor.description:
Made of cobalt-colored steel rings that flow down the entire length of the garment, this +1 resilient chain mail includes an armored face covering. The armor is said to be based on the same armor once worn by Azure Leopard, one of Old-Mage Jatembe's magic warriors.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon the ferocity and grace of the leopard. The armor's rings flatten out to become a solid piece of flexible armor. You gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and Intimidation checks to Demoralize, but take a -2 penalty to Diplomacy and Society checks.

This lasts for 1 hour, but you can Activate the armor again to revert it back to its original form.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.LVy8SfUF8Jrd6X18]{Effect: Leopard's Armor}

Lethargy Poison.name: 昏睡毒 Lethargy Poison
Lethargy Poison.description:
昏睡毒普遍用于卓尔的一击脱离战术，而另外一些希望受害者存活的家伙也会使用这种毒素；用毒伏击者会先行撤退，直到毒素发作让受害者倒地昏迷后再归来。多次曝露在昏睡毒之下并不会让目标进行额外的豁免检定；只有在对抗正于体内生效的毒素的豁免检定上失败时才会推进毒发阶段。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续时间 4 小时

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1 轮)

阶段 2 缓慢slowed 1 (1 分钟)

阶段 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} 且不能通过察觉检定醒来 (1 轮)

阶段 4 失去意识且不能通过察觉检定醒来 ([[/br 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 小时})

Liar's Gun.name: Liar's Gun
Liar's Gun.description:
This dubious weapon gets its name from the fact that it's typically crafted with multiple false barrels so that it's more difficult for enemies to predict the weapon's angle of fire from the four working barrels. Most of the time, this gun functions as a +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tk4cfktEnMrp4K6m]{Pepperbox} with capacity 4 instead of capacity 3, albeit one with a complicated loading mechanism involving rotating the barrels. In a pinch though, all four of the real barrels can be fired simultaneously.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect Make up to four Strikes with the liar's gun. Each of the four Strikes must be against a different target within a @Template[type:cone|distance:20]{20-foot cone}. You apply and increasing your multiple attack penalty for the four Strikes only after resolving all attacks. If the weapon misfires on any of these attacks, wait to apply the misfire until you resolve all of the attacks.

Librarian's Baton.name: Librarian's Baton
Librarian's Baton.description:
A crystal pendulum hangs loosely from a delicate cord connecting the tips of this Y-shaped wooden baton. Such batons are often used by librarians who have problems with customers (or thieves) who can't be trusted to return the books they burrow, but they're equally valuable to wizards who are particularly worried about having their spell books stolen.

Activate 10 minutes (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per month

Effect You focus your attention on the crystal pendulum, repeatedly passing it over the covers of up to 10 Bulk of books. Doing so causes the librarian's baton to permanently attune itself to those books, while simultaneously removing any attunement it may have had to previous books. If an attuned book is damaged significantly, the librarian's baton loses attunement to it (although it can be reattuned at a later date to the damaged book as long as it retains some of its functionality). The librarian's baton grants a +2 item bonus to perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} for attuned books hidden within 60 feet of you.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect When you activate the librarian's baton, concentrate on one of the books to which the baton is attuned. The crystal pendulum moves of its own volition, pointing directly toward the location of the book you were concentrating on as a long as the book is within 25 miles of you. If the book is further away than this, or if the book has been damaged enough that it's no longer attuned, you learn only that the book is out of range or damaged, as appropriate. You can Sustain this activation up to 1 minute, during which time you can sense whether the target book is in motion, is in a creature's possession, or enters the possession of a different creature. However, you can't determine the identities of such creatures

Lich Dust.name: 巫妖尘 Lich Dust
Lich Dust.description:
这种从被摧毁的巫妖的遗骸中抢救出来的粉尘因具有麻痹性能而成为了极具价值的毒素。

启动 A 交互 (摄入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

潜伏期 10 分钟

最大持续时间 6 分钟

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1 分钟)

阶段 2 [[/r {5d6}[poison]]]{5d6 毒素伤害} 和 疲乏fatigued (1 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {5d6}[poison]]]{5d6 毒素伤害}, 疲乏fatigued, 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1 分钟)

Lich Soul Cage.name: Lich Soul Cage
Lich Soul Cage.description:
This item is crafted by a spellcaster who wishes to become a lich. When a lich is destroyed, its soul flees to the soul cage. The phylactery then rebuilds the lich's undead body over the course of [[/br 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}. Afterward, the lich manifests next to the soul cage, fully healed and in a new body (therefore, it lacks any equipment it had on its old body). A lich's soul cage must be destroyed to prevent a lich from returning.

The standard soul cage is a sealed metal box containing strips of parchment inscribed with magical phrases. This box has Hardness 9 and 36 HP, but some liches devise more durable or difficult-to-obtain soul cages. A soul cage might also come in the form of a ring, an amulet, or a similar item; the specifics are up to the creator.

Life's Last Breath.name: Life's Last Breath
Life's Last Breath.description:
The twin serrated blades of this legendary rhoka sword are dull black and constantly drip with blood. Life's Last Breath is said to have been forged centuries ago for an unknown urdefhan general and has since fallen into the hands of countless other powerful urdefhan warlords.

Life's Last Breath is a +3 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fo6Yhq5mbQXsnZs0]{Wounding} rhoka sword with the following special abilities.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Requirements You successfully Strike a creature with Life's Last Breath

Effect You cast a 9th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze} spell on the target.

Activate R envision

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You successfully Strike a creature with Life's Last Breath

Effect The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] or take [[/r 4d6]] negative damage; you gain an equal amount of temporary Hit Points that last 1 minute.

Lifting Belt.name: 负重腰带 Lifting Belt
Lifting Belt.description:
这条宽皮带为你在运动Athetics检定上提供+1物品加值，并能让你携带更多的物品。你可以携带负载值为6+你的力量Strength调整值的物品而不受到超载Encumbered状态，你最多可以携带11+你的力量Strength调整值的物品。

启动 D 交互

效果 你可以提起最多8负载的物品，就如同它没有重量。这需要你空出两只手，如果这物品被锁，或被用什么方式固定在原地的话，作为启动动作的一部分，你也可以以运动Athletics技能尝试一次破拆Force it Open。在其他所有情况下，这件物品仍然有着完整的重量和负载——你只是忽略了它的重量。这个效果持续到你的下一回合结束。

Light Hammer.name: 轻锤 Light Hammer
Light Hammer.description: 这种小号的战锤的木质或金属柄顶端有个金属头，不像它沉重的表亲，足够轻巧到能够投掷。

Light Mace.name: 轻型硬头锤 Light Mace
Light Mace.description: 轻型硬头锤有根短短的木质或金属柄顶端有个厚重的金属头，使用它更像使用棍棒，它能造成沉重的钝击，头上的金属棱或刺还提供额外的力量。

Light Pick.name: 轻型镐 Light Pick
Light Pick.description: 轻型镐是一种改良的采矿工具，其木柄顶端是一个镐头，设计目的是刺穿盔甲和肉身，而不是岩石碎片。

Light Writer.name: Light Writer
Light Writer.description: The light writer is a cutting edge invention, first created in Absalom in late 4721, combining magic and clockwork innovation to allow its operator to create a true-to-life, monochromatic portrait of people or a scene over the course of 20 minutes of exposure. It consists of two flat metal squares, one larger than the other, connected by a tube of leather similar to that found on a bellows. The smaller square, which sits at the front of the device, has a small glass lens in the center of it. The larger square contains a specially treated metallic plate on the inside; its exterior also has both a small control stick connected via flexible wire, and a small metal tube attached to the top and pointing forward. The user presses a button on the control stick to activate the light writer. Upon activation, magical light illuminates the tube, producing a steady light for 20 minutes. This light is captured by the lens and projected onto the metal plate, slowly creating an image of the scene in front of the lens. The plate can then be removed, allowing the image to be displayed anywhere the owner desires. The light writer is mounted on a tripod and must be perfectly still during operation to prevent any defects from appearing in the plate image. If creating a captured image of a living creature, it is equally important for that creature to remain still throughout the process, to avoid a ghostlike blurring of the final image

Lini's Leafstick.name: Lini's Leafstick
Lini's Leafstick.description:
Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tanglefoot}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} , @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Shillelagh}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{Shape Wood}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Tree Shape}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Barkskin}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}
  • 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YtBZq49N4Um1cwm7]{Nature's Reprisal}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Lion Claw.name: 狮爪 Lion Claw
Lion Claw.description:
用法 附着至护甲

启动 1 交互

需求 一个生物视你为无踪（undetected）状态，并且你的隐秘达到大师熟练度

这只经过脱水处理的爪子来自强大的野兽，能赋予你捕食者的能力。当你启动爪子时，你能以流畅的动作猛扑你的猎物。你行走一次，然后以附着的武器对一个视你为@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}状态的生物进行一次打击。你的打击完成后，该生物依然视你为无踪状态。

Lion Scythe.name: Lion Scythe
Lion Scythe.description: A lion scythe resembles a common sickle but is specially weighted to allow for greater power when attacking. This is a martial melee weapon.

Lion's Shield.name: 狮子盾 Lion's Shield
Lion's Shield.description:
这面铁盾（硬度6，HP36，BT18）被铸造出咆哮的狮头形状。这个石头可作为+1强击盾凸来使用，且无法从狮子盾上移除。

启动 A 举起盾牌

频率 每天一次

效果 你使狮头活化。作为举起盾牌动作的一部分进行一次近战打击。

狮头的啮咬可作为军用近战武器来使用，造成2d6穿刺伤害并拥有致命1d6特征；狮头无法被符文增强。盾牌保持活化1分钟，时限内的每次举起盾牌动作都可同时用其进行一次打击，如同一次打击动作一般。

Little Love.name: Little Love
Little Love.description:
This steel +1 dagger is chipped and worn but no less deadly for its much-used appearance. When you critically succeed at an attack roll with Little Love, you can activate the dagger to spring away from your foes.

Activate f Interact

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You critically hit a creature with Little Love

Effect You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} (or Vault, if you're Spring-Heeled Jack).

Living flame shaped into a phoenix.name: Living flame shaped into a phoenix

Lock (Average).name: 锁(普通) Lock (Average)
Lock (Average).description: 打开普通锁需要四次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:25|traits:action:pick-a-lock|immutable:true]检定

Lock (Good).name: 锁(优质) Lock (Good)
Lock (Good).description: 打开优质锁需要通过五次@Check[type:thievery|dc:30|traits:action:pick-a-lock|immutable:true]检定

Lock (Poor).name: 锁(简陋) Lock (Poor)
Lock (Poor).description: 打开简陋锁需要2次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:15|traits:action:pick-a-lock|immutable:true]检定

Lock (Simple).name: 锁(简单) Lock (Simple)
Lock (Simple).description: 打开简单锁需要三次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:20|traits:action:pick-a-lock|immutable:true]检定。

Lock (Superior).name: 锁(究极) Lock (Superior)
Lock (Superior).description: 打开究极锁需要通过六次@Check[type:thievery|dc:40|traits:action:pick-a-lock|immutable:true]检定。

Locket of Sealed Nightmares.name: Locket of Sealed Nightmares
Locket of Sealed Nightmares.description:
As long as this locket of horn and silver is closed, you don't need to sleep. However, you can still overexert your body with too much activity, so you still need to rest to avoid becoming fatigued or to remove the fatigued condition.

You also gain a +4 item bonus on saving throws against mental illusions, magical effects that would make you unconscious, and effects that would make you fatigued.

Each time dawn occurs, you regain the ability to make your daily preparations as if you had rested for 8 hours. Daily preparations still take about an hour, as normal.

Activate D Envision, interact

Requirements You aren't fatigued

Effect You open the locket to unleash the dreams it has kept at bay. You become fatigued and cast one of the following spells at 9th level (DC 41): @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qDjeG6dxT4aEEC6J]{Weird}.

Long Air Repeater.name: 长连发气枪 Long Air Repeater
Long Air Repeater.description: 就像是单手版的连发气枪，这个细管的火器使用装有压缩气体的容器而非黑火药来发射小型金属子弹。长连发气枪有着相比起单手版本更好的射程和更多的弹容，但是依然严重缺乏制止力。一个典型的长连发气枪的弹匣能填装8发弹丸。

Longbow.name: 长弓 Longbow
Longbow.description: 这种5英尺的长弓，通常由榆木、山胡桃木或紫杉木制成，具有很强的弹力能以巨大的力量和极远的距离发射箭支。长弓必须用双手射击，并且在骑乘时不能使用。

Longspear.name: 长矛 Longspear
Longspear.description: 这种很长的矛，有时被称为长矛（Pike），纯粹是用来刺戳而不是投掷的。许多士兵和城市守卫用来控制人群和防御冲锋的敌人，这种武器必须用双手挥舞。

Longsword.name: 长剑 Longsword
Longsword.description: 长剑可以是单刃或双刃，其刀刃很重，长约3到4英尺之间。

Looter's Lethargy.name: Looter's Lethargy
Looter's Lethargy.description:
Traps may keep many a thief at bay, but the poison known as looter's lethargy ensures that no thieves are strong enough to walk off with pilfered treasures. Commonly smeared on locks, chests, and even valuable items themselves, the poison slowly saps the strength of those who touch it. Nearby guardians can then simply follow the resulting trail of discarded valuables to find the weakened trespasser.

Activate 1 Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 1 hour

Stage 1 reduce Bulk limit by 3 (1 minute)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, reduce Bulk limit by 4 (10 minutes)

Stage 3 flat-footed, reduce Bulk limit by 5 (10 minutes)

Lover's Gloves.name: 爱人手套 Lover's Gloves
Lover's Gloves.description:
这些白色的丝绸手套装点着红色的爱心。每当你邻接一个你投入强烈感情的人物时，手套上的爱心都会微微闪烁。手套使你情绪高涨，为你在交涉检定中提供+1物品加值。

启动 1 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你握起那个让你有着强烈正面情绪的自愿生物的手，无论这种情绪的本质是什么。该生物在豁免骰上获得+1状态加值，并且获得10点临时生命值，持续10分钟。如果该生物和你共享这种情绪，那么你也获得相同的增益，且在这段持续时间内，如果你们双方在对抗一个造成负面影响的情绪效果的豁免骰中都达成了成功，那么你们双方都改为达成大成功。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.3O5lvuX4VHqtpCkU]{效果：爱人手套}

Luck Blade.name: 吉兆刃 Luck Blade
Luck Blade.description:
这柄+3高等强击短剑的持有者受到剑的好运祝福。吉兆刃有着许多样式，但其剑柄或剑刃总有代表着好运的印记，例如四叶草、马蹄铁、鱼、瓢虫等等印记。

启动 R 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 使用吉兆刃的打击未命中

效果 重骰触发的攻击骰并使用新的结果。这是一个幸运效果。

Luck Blade (Wishing).name: 祈愿吉兆刃 Luck Blade (Wishing)
Luck Blade (Wishing).description:
这柄+3高等强击短剑的持有者受到剑的好运祝福。吉兆刃有着许多样式，但其剑柄或剑刃总有代表着好运的印记，例如四叶草、马蹄铁、鱼、瓢虫等等印记。

启动 R 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 使用吉兆刃的打击未命中

效果 重骰触发的攻击骰并使用新的结果。这是一个幸运效果

某些吉兆刃制作时埋入了一个 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{许愿术 Wish} 你在持握该吉兆刃时，可以将祈愿术作为内在奥术法术施放一次，消耗掉该祈愿术。施法者可以消耗8000gp和4天的休整期并施放一个祈愿术来替换该吉兆刃内含的祈愿术。祈愿吉兆刃同一时间不能保有超过一个祈愿术。

制造需求 提供一次祈愿术施法。

Lucky Draw Bandolier.name: 幸运拔枪弹带 Lucky Draw Bandolier
Lucky Draw Bandolier.description:
这款米色的皮套上有一个长方形的皮套，能容纳一套标准尺寸的哈罗套牌，红色的口袋上绣着金工花纹，是一种奇怪但吸引人的阿肯斯塔和瓦瑞西亚的混合图案。

启动 1 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你从弹带中抽出一张卡，然后以一个交互动作将卡片装入你所使用的、只需要1个动作就能装填火器或弩中。抽到的牌立刻变成魔法弹药，其类型取决于你所抽到的卡牌的花色。该卡牌的新的复制将返回弹带中，以备下次抽到。

当卡牌转换成弹药时，它会自动转换成适和你选择的武器相匹配的火器弹药或弩矢，即便所抽出的各种魔法弹药通常会有形式上的限制（例如，风暴箭通常被限定为只能以箭的形式出现）。从哈罗套牌中抽一张牌需要投掷1d6来确定卡牌的花色。其结果决定了卡牌的弹药类型，如下表所列。以这种方式创造的魔法弹药能持续存在10分钟，或直到你击发它，以最先发生的为准。

d6 属性(花色) 弹药

Lucky Draw Bandolier (Greater).description:

Mace.name: 硬头锤 Mace
Mace.description: 有着结实的柄和沉重的金属头，硬头锤坚固到可以让使用者造成强力打击给盔甲留下凹痕。

Mace Multipistol.name: Mace Multipistol
Mace Multipistol.description: At first glance this weapon looks like nothing more than an iron-bound club. But the top of the weapon features a latch that opens to reveal three rotating pistol muzzles concealed in the mace's head that can be fired and rotated using triggers built into the weapon's haft.

Machete.name: Machete
Machete.description: This medium-length sword has a wide blade and long grip. Though it is typically used to hack through heavy foliage, the machete can also be used as a deadly weapon.

Maestro's Chair.name: 大师之椅 Maestro's Chair
Maestro's Chair.description:
大师之椅是一台旅行用椅，带有神经操纵的升级（见下文），并在椅身上安装了一个小型管风琴。你可以用大师之椅进行表演检定，就像使用任何普通乐器一样，占用你的双手。当你使用你的轮椅进行表演检定时，你在检定上获得+1的物品加值。

启动 1 交互

频率 每10分钟一次

效果 你以你的轮椅速度进行移动Stride。如果你有一个目前正在起效的组曲戏法Composition Cantrip，你可以用一个自由动作对这个组曲进行维持法术Sustain。

Maestro's Instrument (Greater).name: 高等大师乐器 Maestro's Instrument (Greater)
Maestro's Instrument (Greater).description:
任何一种形式的手持乐器都能被做成大师乐器。当使用大师乐器演奏音乐时，这件乐器会为表演检定提供+3物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你可以通过演奏这一乐器来产生8环@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm}(DC 38)的效果。

制造需求 提供对应等级的魅惑术charm施法。

Maestro's Instrument (Lesser).name: 次等大师乐器 Maestro's Instrument (Lesser)
Maestro's Instrument (Lesser).description:
任何一种形式的手持乐器都能被做成大师乐器。当使用大师乐器演奏音乐时，这件乐器会为表演检定提供+1物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你可以通过演奏这一乐器来产生@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm}(DC 17)的效果。

制造需求 提供对应等级的魅惑术charm施法。

Maestro's Instrument (Moderate).name: 中等大师乐器 Maestro's Instrument (Moderate)
Maestro's Instrument (Moderate).description:
任何一种形式的手持乐器都能被做成大师乐器。当使用大师乐器演奏音乐时，这件乐器会为表演检定提供+2物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你可以通过演奏这一乐器来产生4环@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm}(DC 27)的效果。

制造需求 提供对应等级的魅惑术charm施法。

Magazine with 5 Bolts.name: Magazine with 5 Bolts
Magazine with 5 Bolts.description: Magazine with 5 bolts for use with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow}.

Magazine with 6 Pellets.name: Magazine with 6 Pellets
Magazine with 6 Pellets.description: Firearms require ammunition consisting of a projectile and black powder. A round of ammo can vary in its composition but is typically either a prepackaged paper cartridge, including wadding, bullet, and black powder, or loose shot packed in manually. Some weapons, like hand cannons and blunderbusses, can fire other materials, but their ammunition has the same Price due to the cost of the black powder. Because making rounds of firearm ammunition requires creating black powder, you need the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat to make them. Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.

Magazine with 8 Pellets.name: Magazine with 8 Pellets
Magazine with 8 Pellets.description: Firearms require ammunition consisting of a projectile and black powder. A round of ammo can vary in its composition but is typically either a prepackaged paper cartridge, including wadding, bullet, and black powder, or loose shot packed in manually. Some weapons, like hand cannons and blunderbusses, can fire other materials, but their ammunition has the same Price due to the cost of the black powder. Because making rounds of firearm ammunition requires creating black powder, you need the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat to make them. Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.

Mage Bane.name: Mage Bane
Mage Bane.description:
Upon being mixed and injected into the bloodstream, this powder of the crimson orchid quickly assaults the brain and nerves, disrupting the victim's ability to piece together coherent thoughts and spells.

Activate T Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Magical Hearing Aids.name: 魔法助听器 Magical Hearing Aids
Magical Hearing Aids.description: 这些弯曲的助听器钩在耳朵顶上并挂靠在后面，有一个接收器可以插进耳朵口。装置的外部检测声波，并使用预言魔法，将它们顺着接收器转移到你的耳朵里。根据你的听力损失情况，你可以佩戴一个或两个，你可以用交互动作来打开或关闭助听器。

Magical Lock Fulu.name: 封锁符箓 Magical Lock Fulu
Magical Lock Fulu.description:
用法 附着至一扇门，窗或者收纳家具

持续时间 1小时

这张符箓上的符号好似一把缠绕着链条的锁头。将这张符箓贴在目标的接合处或框架上来锁住它，即便目标物体原本没有栓或者锁头可用也能生效。你至多可以将9张封锁符箓贴在相同的物体上。1张符箓等同于@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.PBlxTrEyr3qXFBqq]{简陋锁 Poor Lock}（DC 15），3张等同于Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JZXCTwoIWoGKjMX6]{简单锁 Simple Lock}（DC 20），而9张则等同于@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.q2TYVAMaK6UfenbV]{普通锁 Average Lock}（DC 25）。

Magnetic Construction Set.name: Magnetic Construction Set
Magnetic Construction Set.description: This collection of small magnets and metal rods comes in a wooden box. The magnets are strong enough to firmly cling to metal objects but too weak to move or suspend them. The metal rods are a quarter of an inch in diameter and vary in length from 3 to 6 inches. If connected with the magnets, these rods can be used to build flimsy shapes and structures, which collapse if external weight or pressure is applied.

Magnetic Suit.name: 磁化服 Magnetic Suit
Magnetic Suit.description:
启动 2 交互

这种磁化服需要套在你的护甲或衣服外面。当你启动它时，你必须选择将它的极性设置为吸引或排斥。

如果选择吸引，你在面对金属武器的攻击时，AC有-1物品减值；同时你周围@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]范围中的除你之外的生物，在面对金属武器的攻击时，AC有+1物品加值。如果你设置为排斥，你在面对金属武器的攻击时，AC有+1物品加值。在吸引金属状态下，你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}金属物体和@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grapple}金属生物时，运动检定有+1物品加值，而你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}金属生物时，运动检定有-1物品减值。在排斥金属状态下，你在推撞金属生物时，运动检定有+1物品加值，而你在攀爬金属物体和擒抱金属生物时，运动检定有-1物品减值。

Magnetic Suit (Greater).name: 高等磁化服 Magnetic Suit (Greater)
Magnetic Suit (Greater).description:
启动 2 交互

这种磁化服需要套在你的护甲或衣服外面。当你启动它时，你必须选择将它的极性设置为吸引或排斥。

如果选择吸引，你在面对金属武器的攻击时，AC有-2物品减值；同时你周围@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围中的除你之外的生物，在面对金属武器的攻击时，AC有+2物品加值。如果你设置为排斥，你在面对金属武器的攻击时，AC有+2物品加值。在吸引金属状态下，你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}金属物体和@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grapple}金属生物时，运动检定有+2物品加值，而你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}金属生物时，运动检定有-2物品减值。在排斥金属状态下，你在推撞金属生物时，运动检定有+2物品加值，而你在攀爬金属物体和擒抱金属生物时，运动检定有-2物品减值。

Magnetite Scope.name: 磁铁瞄准镜 Magnetite Scope
Magnetite Scope.description:
这种小圆柱体形的磁铁比起瞄准镜来更像个磁场投射器，它被魔法增强，能让散射武器的弹片以更高速度和更广的角度射出。此外，漂浮在磁铁瞄准镜内的一些结构可以让你在试图确认盟友位置时帮上忙。当你使用磁铁瞄准镜来协助你辨别方向（Sense Direction）时，它能让你的生存检定获得+2物品加值。这个瞄准镜只能安装到具有散射（scatter）特征的火器上。

启动 1 交互

效果 你在本轮中以安装该瞄准镜的火器所进行的下次打击，其散射半径增加5尺。

Magnetite Scope (Greater).name: 高等磁铁瞄准镜 Magnetite Scope (Greater)
Magnetite Scope (Greater).description:
这种小圆柱体形的磁铁比起瞄准镜来更像个磁场投射器，它被魔法增强，能让散射武器的弹片以更高速度和更广的角度射出。此外，漂浮在磁铁瞄准镜内的一些结构可以让你在试图确认盟友位置时帮上忙。当你使用磁铁瞄准镜来协助你辨别方向（Sense Direction）时，它能让你的生存检定获得+3物品加值。这个瞄准镜只能安装到具有散射（scatter）特征的火器上。

Magnifying Glass.name: 放大镜 Magnifying Glass
Magnifying Glass.description: 这款手持式镜头为你寻找文档、织物及类似物体细节的察觉检定提供+1物品加值。

Magnifying Glass of Elucidation.name: 阐明放大镜 Magnifying Glass of Elucidation
Magnifying Glass of Elucidation.description:
这些年代久远的木质放大镜上铭刻着不同符文。每一种放大镜都被灌输了某种特定的语言。当你用放大镜检查文字时，它将把文字翻译成你能理解的语言。举个例子，如果一个精灵只会说精灵语，而他使用灌输了矮人语的放大镜去查看矮人语时，矮人语就会变为精灵语。阐明放大镜只能提供字面意思上的翻译，并不能让你理解密码或晦涩的文本——你依然需要尝试进行解读文书（Decipher Writing）技能检定。

启动 3 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你使用阐明放大镜扫描最多两页文字，将扫描到的信息灌输进放大镜。你可以使用一个单独的3动作行动，将放大镜记录的信息复印在空白的纸张上，看起来似乎和原件一样。这种复制只能复制页面上的文字，但无法转移任何魔法效果或特殊效果。例如，你可以复制卷轴上的文字，但复印出来的文字只是普通文字，没有任何魔法效果。放大镜只能在一定时间内保存一份信息，再次启动放大镜或将放大镜中的内容复印出来将会清除放大镜中储存的信息。

制造需求 你掌握灌输进放大镜中的那门语言

Magnifying Scope.name: 放大瞄准镜 Magnifying Scope
Magnifying Scope.description:
这些瞄准镜使用魔法增强过的镜头，能延长你的武器射程并帮助你发现远处的敌人。当你通过该瞄准镜来@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}生物时，它能让你在基于视觉的察觉检定中获得+1物品加值。

启动 1 交互

效果 当你通过瞄准镜观察时，你可以放大目标，使你更容易在远处击中它。安装了该瞄准镜的武器，其射程增量延长5尺，直到你的下回合开始或直到你不再使用该武器，二者以先发生的为准。

Mail of Luck.name: 幸运护甲 Mail of Luck
Mail of Luck.description:
这套+2抗力板条甲在其最显眼的中心位置有着一颗巨大的绿宝石镶嵌在上。

启动 F 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 你被一次攻击命中或重击，但还未骰伤害

效果 你迫使攻击者重骰攻击检定并使用较差的结果。这个效果拥有厄运（misfortune）特征。

启动护甲效果会让绿宝石变灰并暗淡下去。直到宝石恢复绿色前你无法再次启动护甲效果。宝石会在1周后或一名敌人成功对你造成重击后恢复绿色。若敌人对你造成的重击后被你迫使重骰攻击骰，则该次重击成功不会充能幸运护甲。即便护甲的能量在短于一周的时间内充能，你也无法每天启动它超过1次。

Main-Gauche.name: 格挡匕首 Main-Gauche
Main-Gauche.description: 这种格挡匕首有坚固的刀镡保护使用者的手。

Malleable Mixture (Greater).name: Malleable Mixture (Greater)
Malleable Mixture (Greater).description:
Your bones, muscles, and organs become vastly softer and more pliable. You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were 2 sizes smaller than your normal size (minimum tiny), and you gain a +3 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.kMPPl4AqFb6GclOL]{Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater)}

Malleable Mixture (Lesser).name: Malleable Mixture (Lesser)
Malleable Mixture (Lesser).description:
Your bones, muscles, and organs become vastly softer and more pliable. You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were 1 size smaller than your normal size (minimum small), and you gain a +2 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.cozi2kUELY40Dcv3]{Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser)}

Malyass Root Paste.name: 烈赤根糊 Malyass Root Paste
Malyass Root Paste.description:
烈赤根糊可能被用于在运动比赛中阻碍对手，此外也有用于间谍和追踪活动。

启动 T 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 分钟

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} 和针对所有速度（Speeds）的-10尺状态减值 (1 分钟)

阶段 2 笨拙clumsy 2 和针对所有速度的-20尺状态减值 (1 分钟)

阶段 3 笨拙clumsy 3, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}, 和针对所有速度的-30尺状态减值

Mambele.name: Mambele
Mambele.description: Also known as a hunga munga or danisco, this hybrid knife-axe consists of a hilt and a blade that curves backward toward the wielder. The curve of the blade is such that after a victim has been struck by a mambele, more damage is dealt as the weapon is extracted from the victim's body.

Manacles (Average).name: 手铐(普通) Manacles (Average)
Manacles (Average).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从普通手铐中解放出来需要四次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:27|traits:action:pick-a-lock]检定

Manacles (Good).name: 手铐(优质) Manacles (Good)
Manacles (Good).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从优质手铐中解放出来需要五次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:32|traits:action:pick-a-lock]检定

Manacles (Simple).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从简单手铐中解放出来需要三次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:22|traits:action:pick-a-lock]检定。

Manacles (Superior).name: 手铐(究极) Manacles (Superior)
Manacles (Superior).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从究极手铐中解放出来需要六次成功的@Check[type:thievery|dc:42|traits:action:pick-a-lock]检定。

Manacles of Persuasion.name: Manacles of Persuasion
Manacles of Persuasion.description: These sturdy, average manacles are connected by a thick iron chain that is much heavier than its appearance suggests at a glance. Followers of Zon-Kuthon sometimes employ manacles of persuasion against captured enemies and spies. When the manacles are locked around an immobilized creature's wrists, they begin to sap the life out of the victim, dealing 2 negative damage per hour until the creature falls unconscious. The effect is nonlethal, so the damage doesn't cause the creature to become dying. While the creature is unconscious, the manacles deal no damage and allow the creature to recover Hit Points normally to a maximum of 10 Hit Points, at which point the manacles begin to deal damage once more. The manacles have no effect on a creature that is not immobilized.

Mantle of the Grogrisant.name: Mantle of the Grogrisant
Mantle of the Grogrisant.description:
This long, golden cloak is among the royal regalia of the emperors of Taldor. It was fashioned from the pelt of Grogrisant itself, after being slain by Taldaris, and Grogrisant's mane was fashioned into a thick fringe that runs all along the mantle's edges. The paws of the Grogrisant cross beneath the wearer's throat, giving you an imposing appearance. The Mantle of the Grogrisant grants you fire resistance 15 and physical resistance 5 (except bludgeoning).

Activate 1 envision, Interact (evocation, incapacitation, light, primal, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You pull the hood of the mantle over your face, revealing the six eyes of Grogrisant. The mantle gives off a flash of blinding light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]. All enemies within this area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38|name:Blinding Flash|traits:evocation,incapacitation,light,visual] saving throw. On a failure, they're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 minute. On a critical failure, they're permanently blinded.

Marbles.name: Marbles
Marbles.description: These tiny round balls are made of polished stone and colorful glass, and come in a bag of 200. You can pour marbles in an empty square adjacent to you with an Interact action. The first creature that moves into that square must succeed at a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:13] check or @Check[type:reflex|dc:13] save (its choice) or fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Once a creature enters a space with marbles, enough marbles are scattered that other creatures moving into that space don't need to attempt a roll to avoid falling.

Mariner's Astrolabe.name: Mariner's Astrolabe
Mariner's Astrolabe.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Astrolabes can be used for navigation in unfamiliar or featureless locations. To use an astrolabe, the holder must be trained in Survival.

By spending 1 minute to measure the height of the stars and planets, a holder who knows the time and date can determine the latitude, and a holder who knows their latitude can determine the date and time.

An astrolabe also grants a +1 item bonus on checks to identify celestial bodies. A mariner's astrolabe contains additional stabilizers that make it suitable for use on moving surfaces, such as the deck of a ship.

Marking Snare.name: 标记圈套 Marking Snare
Marking Snare.description:
这个圈套能用来标记闯入者，以便接下来的追踪和辨识工作。当你制造这个圈套时，你必须决定使用颜色标记还是气味标记。哪一种标记方法都会为追踪Track该生物的检定上提供+2环境加值，持续24小时或直到标记物被洗去（洗去标记物需要使用10加仑的水清洗10分钟）。一个进入圈套格子的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:17] 豁免。

成功 该生物不受影响

失败 圈套成功标记该生物

大失败 圈套成功标记该生物，而且该生物到它的下个回合结束前都陷入目盲Blinded。

Martyr's Shield.name: Martyr's Shield
Martyr's Shield.description:
Perception +12; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

Communication speech (Common and Celestial)

Skills Diplomacy +15, Religion +13

Int +0, Wis +2, Cha +4

Will +15

A martyr's shield is a lesser sturdy shield imbued with the compassion of a devout champion of a righteous deity, like Iomedae or Vildeis, who sacrificed themself to save an ally. In addition to good-naturedly attempting to convert you to its religion, the martyr's shield can use 1 reaction each round that, when raised, it uses to Shield Block to protect an ally adjacent to you, with the effects of the Shield Warden feat. The martyr's shield uses this reaction whether you would prefer it did so or not. The martyr's shield can be upgraded to a stronger form of sturdy shield by paying the difference in cost between its current type of sturdy shield and the new type.

Marvelous Calliope.name: Marvelous Calliope
Marvelous Calliope.description:
This large slide whistle appears to be made of fine brass, the sides of which are engraved with musical notes and dancing clowns.

Activate 1 minute (command, envision, Interact)

Effect You blow a tune upon the slide whistle, causing the whistle to expand. The whistle sprouts from one into several, and then creates a large wooden frame and keyboard. By the time the unfolding is complete, the whistle fully transforms into a calliope, a wagon-sized contraption consisting of several steam whistles played like an organ. The calliope is heavy and anchored in place.

You have a +1 item bonus to Performance checks to play the calliope. The calliope has a tendency to produce music for a few seconds after you cease playing it, adding a jaunty and overlong conclusion to your music.

If you use an Interact action to pull the small metal ring on the underside of the marvelous calliope, the calliope collapses back down into a slide whistle.

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You play the calliope, causing it to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} on one of the listeners.

Marvelous Medicines.name: 神奇药箱 Marvelous Medicines
Marvelous Medicines.description:
这套医疗工具包仿佛容纳着无穷无尽的绷带、草药和医疗攻击，这些物品都有着完美的品质，可以为你的医疗检定提供+2物品加值。

启动 A 治疗中毒，或者8小时（治疗疾病）

效果 你能够在治疗毒素时使用这套工具对患者施加 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{中和毒素 Neutralize Poison}的效果，或是在治疗疾病时为患者施加 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{移除疾病 Remove Disease}的效果。

一旦这些药物被用来尝试治愈一名患者的毒素或是疾病之后，便无法再次使用它们来治愈这名患者身上相同的苦难。

Marvelous Medicines (Greater).name: 高等神奇药箱 Marvelous Medicines (Greater)
Marvelous Medicines (Greater).description:
这套医疗工具包仿佛容纳着无穷无尽的绷带、草药和医疗攻击，这些物品都有着完美的品质，可以为你的医疗检定提供+3物品加值。

启动 A 治疗中毒，或者8小时（治疗疾病）

效果 你能够在治疗毒素时使用这套工具对患者施加6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{中和毒素 Neutralize Poison}的效果，或是在治疗疾病时为患者施加6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{移除疾病 Remove Disease}的效果。

一旦这些药物被用来尝试治愈一名患者的毒素或是疾病之后，便无法再次使用它们来治愈这名患者身上相同的苦难。

Mask (Fine).name: Mask (Fine)
Mask (Fine).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

This well-crafted mask, suitable for a noble at a masquerade, is made with impeccable craftsmanship and expensive material, such as porcelain and gold filigree.

Mask (Ordinary).name: Mask (Ordinary)
Mask (Ordinary).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

This ordinary mask is made out of cheap material, such as paper-mâché or simple cloth. This can be specially fitted over another mask.

Mask (Plague).name: Mask (Plague)
Mask (Plague).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

This stylized bird mask is equipped with a basic filter. The plague mask attempts to counteract any inhaled poisons or airborne diseases each round you breathe. The same replacement filters used in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kDrlBnkDMVxPrahI]{Water Purifiers} can be used with a plague mask, granting you the counteract modifier and effects of the filter for 20 minutes.

Plague masks are uncommon items because the filters they use to protect from inhaled poisons and diseases are themselves uncommon. As such, you can buy a plague mask without a filter as a common item, though it's usually more cost-effective to buy a fine mask in the shape of a plague mask in that case.

Mask (Rubber).name: Mask (Rubber)
Mask (Rubber).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

Rubber masks are sculpted to resemble the face of another creature. You can use this mask to help decrease the difficulty of Impersonating a specific creature with a very different face than yours.

Mask of Allure.name: 诱惑面具 Mask of Allure
Mask of Allure.description:
该面具看起来像是在薄薄的金属板上附着了一层镜面一般的、具有流动性的银。当你把它戴在脸上时，它会自动贴合你面部的形状。面具的材料透气、轻便，不会遮挡视线。当你穿戴面具时，你的欺骗、交涉、威吓和表演技能检定将获得+2物品加值。

当你绑定此面具时，你可以将你的魅力属性提升2点，或提升至18，二者以较高的结果为准。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.zZsdex5orF5Odpus]{效果：诱惑面具}

启动 f 想象 (视觉)

频率 每天一次

触发 你尝试一次欺骗、交涉、威吓和表演技能检定

效果 你在触发的检定上获得+4 状态加值。如果你身上的伪装效果遮住了诱惑面具，那么该能力无效。根据你所使用的技能检定，面具表面的银色镜面会转变成以下外观之一。

  • 欺骗 Deception 面具泛起旋转的银色旋涡，这完全掩盖和隐藏了你的面部特征。
  • 交涉 Diplomacy 面具呈现出亲切、温和、吸引人的表情。
  • 威吓 Intimidation 面具呈现出可怖的面容，震惊了所有观众并让他们将注意力集中于你。
  • 表演 Performance 面具呈现出戏剧性的面容，呈现喜剧式的咧嘴微笑或悲剧式的愁眉苦脸，这取决于你表演的情境。

Mask of Mercy.name: Mask of Mercy
Mask of Mercy.description:
This porcelain or alabaster mask portrays an angelic visage of kindness and mercy.

Activate F envision (fortune)

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are about to roll a variable number of Hit Points you restore from an action with the healing trait

Effect Roll twice to determine the number of Hit Points you restore and take the higher result.

Mask of the Banshee.name: 女妖面具 Mask of the Banshee
Mask of the Banshee.description:
这副冰蓝色的半脸面具用银丝勾勒出一张令人胆寒的狞笑着的嘴，复盖了穿戴者原本的口部；穿戴者面部的其他区域都不被遮挡。你在威吓检定中获得+2物品加值。

启动 2 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 面具放出摄人心魂的尖啸，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]范围内的每个活物造成[[/r 6d10]] 点负能量伤害（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|basic:true]豁免）。

制造需求 提供一次女妖之嚎Wail of the Banshee法术

Mask of the Banshee (Greater).name: 高等女妖面具 Mask of the Banshee (Greater)
Mask of the Banshee (Greater).description:
这副冰蓝色的半脸面具用银丝勾勒出一张令人胆寒的狞笑着的嘴，复盖了穿戴者原本的口部；穿戴者面部的其他区域都不被遮挡。你在威吓检定中获得+3物品加值。

启动 2 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 面具放出摄人心魂的尖啸，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]范围内的每个活物造成[[/r 8d10]] 点负能量伤害（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|basic:true|name:Greater Mask of the Banshee]豁免）。

制造需求 提供一次女妖之嚎Wail of the Banshee法术

Mask of the Cursed Eye.name: Mask of the Cursed Eye
Mask of the Cursed Eye.description:
These masks are always decorated with at least one wide, staring eye. The first time each day a creature on your plane that you can't perceive targets you with a divination spell, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save. This effect is automatic and does not require you to Activate the item.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is unaffected. You know you've been targeted with a divination spell, but the mask gives you no additional information.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute. You know you've been targeted with a divination spell, but the mask gives you no additional information.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} and dazzled for 10 minutes, and the spell is disrupted. You gain a brief mental glimpse of the triggering creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.

Matchmaker Fulu.name: 姻缘符箓 Matchmaker Fulu
Matchmaker Fulu.description:
用法 附着至护甲

启动 f 想象

触发 你尝试一次交涉检定来建立印象（Make an Impression）

这张红色的符箓上包含着爱与美之女神莎琳（Shelyn）对某人姻缘的祝福。你在交涉检定上获得+2状态加值，若你在检定中投出大失败，则会用失败替换它。

Material Component Pouch.name: 施法材料包 Material Component Pouch
Material Component Pouch.description: 这个小袋包含那些需要材料的法术的材料成分。虽然组分会随着时间的推移而耗尽，但你可以在休整期内重新补充用过的组分。

Material Essence Disruptor (Greater).name: 高等物质精华干扰器 Material Essence Disruptor (Greater)
Material Essence Disruptor (Greater).description:
启动 d 交互

物质精华干扰器释放出无序的能量，打破操作物质精华的咒语的结构。在启动时，它会以所列出的反制调整值和反制等级来反制射程内正在生效的奥术或原能法术。

射程60尺，反制调整值+18[[/r d20+18]]，反制等级6级。

Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser).name: 次等物质精华干扰器 Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser)
Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser).description:
启动 d 交互

物质精华干扰器释放出无序的能量，打破操作物质精华的咒语的结构。在启动时，它会以所列出的反制调整值和反制等级来反制射程内正在生效的奥术或原能法术。

射程30尺，反制调整值+7[[/r d20+7]]，反制等级2级。

Material Essence Disruptor (Major).name: 上等物质精华干扰器 Material Essence Disruptor (Major)
Material Essence Disruptor (Major).description:
启动 d 交互

物质精华干扰器释放出无序的能量，打破操作物质精华的咒语的结构。在启动时，它会以所列出的反制调整值和反制等级来反制射程内正在生效的奥术或原能法术。

射程90尺，反制调整值+24[[/r d20+24]]，反制等级8级。

Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate).name: 中等物质精华干扰器 Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate)
Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate).description:
启动 d 交互

物质精华干扰器释放出无序的能量，打破操作物质精华的咒语的结构。在启动时，它会以所列出的反制调整值和反制等级来反制射程内正在生效的奥术或原能法术。

射程40尺，反制调整值+13[[/r d20+13]]，反制等级4级。

Mattock of the Titans.name: 泰坦之锄 Mattock of the Titans
Mattock of the Titans.description:
这柄15尺长的精金挖掘工具即便对大体系生物而言都过于巨大。若你是小体型或更大的生物，当你穿戴巨人力量腰带后，则可将其视为合适体型的物品使用，负载视为2B。若你能一定程度持握越型武器，GM也可以允许你持握这柄锄头，例如巨人本能的大型野蛮人或巨型生物。若将其作为武器使用，泰坦之锄使用+3高等强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{锋锐 Keen}精金巨镐的数据。

当你持握泰坦之锄时，你的运动技能检定获得+3物品加值。你能使用它在软土地上刨土，每分钟5立方尺，或在硬石地上掘土，每5分钟5立方尺。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你用泰坦之锄快速掘地，制造非魔法的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]地震术 {Earthquake}法术效果。

制造需求 你是一名泰坦，原材料中必须包含8100gp的精金。

Maul.name: 大锤 Maul
Maul.description: 大锤是大号的战锤，必须用双手挥舞。

Mechanical Torch.name: Mechanical Torch
Mechanical Torch.description: Powered by electricity, you can turn a mechanical torch on and off by toggling a lever on the torch with an Interact action. When active, the torch sheds bright light in either a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet) or a 40‑foot cone (and dim light to the next 40 feet). Changing this area requires a single Interact action to flip a switch. The torch carries sufficient charge to operate for ten minutes. You can recharge the torch in 1 minute via an integrated crank-charging mechanism, turning the clockwork gears and generating sparks to power the torch, though doing so requires two hands

Medusa Armor.name: Medusa Armor
Medusa Armor.description: This +2 adamantine scale mail appears to have a fortification rune but grants none of its effects. Whenever you are critically hit, after taking damage, you become petrified for 1 round. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the armor fuses to you.

Medusa's Scream.name: 美杜莎之嚎 Medusa's Scream
Medusa's Scream.description:
这面钢盾（硬度13，HP 52，BT 26）上嵌入了一个被砍下来美杜莎的头颅，令人毛骨悚然。盾面上也有一层厚厚的皮革，可以盖住这颗头颅。

启动 2 交互(视觉)

频率 每天一次

效果 你揭露美杜莎的面部，将它的视线对准30尺内的一个生物。盾牌会施展一个射程30尺的石化术Flesh to Stone。

制造需求 原材料必须包括一颗美杜莎的头。

硬度 HP BT
13 52 26

Memory Palace.name: 记忆宫殿 Memory Palace
Memory Palace.description:
记忆宫殿是一栋精心设计的魔法建筑，可以将记忆安全地储存在里面，方便日后查找。它的外观看起来像是一栋小型的塔尔多别墅模型，小到可以放在掌心。

启动 (10 分钟) 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 微缩的模型变大，称为一栋与星界（Astral Plane）相连的建筑， 存在1小时。记忆宫殿有一个30平方尺的中央庭院，周围围绕着12个10尺见方的房间。这些房间里排列着被称为宫殿节点的各类物品——雕像、挂毯、喷泉或其他艺术品是最常见的形式，但根据GM的选择也可以呈现出其他样子。作为一项10分钟的活动，你可以将一段扩展的记忆铭刻在其中一个节点上：例如，一本特定的简单书籍中的内容，或最近的一次冒险事件。每当你这样做时，节点就会改变其形状和外观，以直观地表示你曾在上面留下过记忆。如果该节点已经被存入记忆，新的记忆将复盖旧的。

在记忆节点上留下的记忆可以被任何一个持有微缩形态记忆宫殿的生物以心灵感应的方式访问，无论这些记忆是谁留下的。这将给与和记忆相关的回忆知识检定+2物品加值。具体限制由GM裁定，但节点不应该总是给与某项技能带来好处。例如，如果某个节点中存储了一本关于芒吉莽原中的树木的书籍，这么将给关于这些树木的回忆知识检定带来好处，但不能给所有使用自然技能的回忆知识检定带来这样的好处。

记忆宫殿的节点也可以储存法术书或魔法巨著中的内容，但这些记忆并不能代替法术书的作用。法师不能通过记忆宫殿准备法术，但是可以用它学习法术。然而，将法术储存在节点中会让之后发现记忆宫殿的人受益，所以很少有人会选择如此做。节点中的记忆不能影响现实，因此即便记忆是一段精神危害，也不会对使用者造成任何有害影响。许多记忆宫殿都保留了之前主人（可能已经死了很久）所留下的记忆，这些记忆被储存在各不相同的节点上。

Mending Lattice.name: 修复格栅 Mending Lattice
Mending Lattice.description:
这个强化铁制成的格栅有着完美的八边形外表。当你启动它，它抵消掉即将受到的伤害并立刻完美地修复附着的物品。

用法 附着到一面盾牌或者一件武器

启动 F 命令

触发 附着的物品即将受到伤害

需求 你在手艺Crafting上达到大师

Mentalist's Staff.name: 心灵师法杖 Mentalist's Staff
Mentalist's Staff.description:
这根磨光的木杖上有着一个旋转的图案，让人想起大脑的褶皱。持握该法杖时，你在鉴别心灵法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{晕眩术 Daze}

Merchant's Guile.name: Merchant's Guile
Merchant's Guile.description:
The band of this ring is made from blue-colored iron and has two sharp, decorative protrusions on each side of the red-stone inlay. It feels quite heavy and reliable. Wearing this ring grants you a +2 item bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks, but only if the associated checks involve haggling or bargaining over a purchase or trade.

Activate T envision, interact

Effect You can determine if an item is magical simply by handling it. You detect no other indication of its power, only whether or not it is magical, granting the effects of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} spell that affects only the object.

Mercurial Mantle.name: 水银斗篷 Mercurial Mantle
Mercurial Mantle.description:
这件深红色的斗篷轻轻地包裹住你的肩膀，边缘一直在微微飘荡，就像被微风吹过的涟漪一样。它的布料摸起来比丝绸还光滑，在运动时像波涛一样上下起伏。你感到一种活力能量注入了你的四肢。你的特技和隐秘获得+3物品加值，并且当你的移动触发反应动作时，斗篷能给你的AC带来+2环境加值。

当你绑定此斗篷时，你可以将你的敏捷属性提升2点，或提升至18，二者以较高的结果为准。

启动 r 交互

频率 每小时一次

触发 一个敌人对你进行近战打击，但失手

效果 你可以轻松绕着攻击你的生物走位。你在不离开触发生物的前提下进行快步（Step），然后对触发的生物进行一次近战打击。如果你以此方式进行近战打击，目标在你进行攻击骰之前先尝试一次@Check[type:perception|dc:38|name:Detect Reaction|showDC:all]检定。

失败 生物对此攻击@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}

大失败 直到它的下回合结束之前，生物对你的所有的攻击都措手不及

启动 2 命令, 想象(咒法系, 传送)

频率 每天一次

效果 你用斗篷包裹自己，斗篷嗡嗡作响，然后你消失在一道短暂的闪光之中。你传送至一处你可以目视的地点，最大距离为你速度的两倍。在抵达传送终点后，你还可以对触及范围内的生物进行一次近战打击，如果有的话。

Mesmerizing Opal.name: 迷心蛋白石 Mesmerizing Opal
Mesmerizing Opal.description:
用法 附着到盔甲

启动 F 想象

触发 你进行一次用来虚招Feint的欺骗Deception检定，但尚未投掷结果

这枚吊在银链上的蛋白石垂饰洋溢着灿烂的光辉。当你启动它，如果你用来触发的欺骗Deception检定结果是大失败，则改成失败；如果结果是成功，则改成大成功。

Messenger's Ring.name: 信使戒指 Messenger's Ring
Messenger's Ring.description:
这只银质的纹章戒指会发生变化以将其上的纹章转变成你所服侍领主或组织的纹章（或者是你自己的脸，如果你没有服务于任何其他人）。它为你在交涉Diplomacy检定上提供+2物品加值，并让你可以以奥术内在法术的形式随意施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{短讯术 Message} 。

启动 1 分钟 (想象)

频率 每天一次

效果 戒指会为你施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{动物信使 Animal Messenger}。这个动物是一个从戒指中跳出来的魔法生物，它的外表会与你服侍的领主或组织的肖像及纹章含义相匹配。

Metalmist Sphere (Greater).name: Metalmist Sphere (Greater)
Metalmist Sphere (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This sphere contains small fragments of thunderstones within a colloidal suspension of a precious metal. When you twist the sphere, it creates an opaque mist in a burst centered on one corner of your space. Creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. Any creature with a weakness to the precious metal that starts its turn in the mist takes damage equal to its weakness. The mist lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind. Most metalmist spheres are filled with silver or cold iron, but more expensive versions containing other ingredients might exist.

The radius of the burst is 15 feet.

Meteor Hammer.name: Meteor Hammer
Meteor Hammer.description: This weapon consists of a long chain connected to a heavy weight at one end. When a wielder swings the weight by the chain, it builds momentum and can serve as a deadly bludgeon with incredible reach.

Midday Lantern (Greater).name: Midday Lantern (Greater)
Midday Lantern (Greater).description:
This hooded lantern is made from brilliant, reinforced gold engraved with the image of the sun high in the sky. The lantern uses oil, as a standard lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is magical and similar to sunlight. The lantern doesn't emit dim light, instead only emitting bright light to its normal radius (20 feet for typical lights when using oil). This bright light is close enough to sunlight to open temple doors that require sunlight or similar light, but it doesn't shine direct sunlight, so it doesn't trigger effects such as a vampire's sunlight weakness.

Activate 1 to 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a blast of powerful sunlight. The blast has the effects of 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZxHC7V7HtjUsB8zH]{Scorching Ray} using a spell attack roll of [[/r {1d20+26} #Midday Lantern (Greater)]]{+26}, with its effect determined by the number of actions you used to activate the lantern.
