Mindfog Mist.name: 惑心迷雾 Mindfog Mist
Mindfog Mist.description:
惑心迷雾通常用于针对施法者，因为它能对受害者的心智能力产生迅速而又强力的影响。

启动 A 交互 (吸入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]

潜伏期 1 轮

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1 轮)

阶段 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} 和 呆滞stupefied 3 (1 轮)

阶段 3 困惑confused 和 呆滞stupefied 4 (1 轮)

Minotaur Chair.name: 牛头人战椅 Minotaur Chair
Minotaur Chair.description:
牛头人战椅是一台旅行用椅，升级包括有椅载储物箱，神经操纵（见下文），以及+1强击血光轮钉。轮钉可以像普通武器那样升级、转移或添加符文。这台轮椅可以用魔法储存全天运动产生的动能，你能消耗它来进行强大的冲锋。

启动 2 交互

频率 每小时一次

效果 你启动轮椅向前突进，发动强大的冲锋，像保龄球般穿过挡路的敌人。你在一条直线上行走Stride，穿过敌人的空间，用车轮上的尖刺对直线上的每个敌人进行攻击。如果一个敌人已经处于@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态，则应用以下效果：在每个武器伤害骰上获得+1的环境加值，血光符文在命中时造成@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d12.success]（或在重击时造成@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed3d6.success]）。

Miogimo's Mask.name: Miogimo's Mask
Miogimo's Mask.description:
The crime lord Miogimo almost always appears with this special mask, crafted with a piece of his soul.

It has two forms. In its first form, the mask depicts a silvery and angelic face; while wearing the mask in this form, your alignment appears as lawful good to creatures attempting to detect your alignment. In its second form, the mask depicts a gold-skinned demonic face; while wearing the mask in this form, your alignment appears as chaotic evil to creatures attempting to detect your alignment. If you die while wearing the mask, a fragment of your soul is trapped in the mask, forming a life link. If there was already a soul fragment in the mask when this happens, you roll a @Check[type:will] save against the Will DC of the person who left the previous fragment. If you succeed, your soul fragment replaces the old one. On a failure, you die normally.

Activate1 envision

Effect You switch the mask to its other form.

Activate2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3x6eUCm17n6ROzUa]{Crisis of Faith} (@Check[type:will|dc:34|name:Crisis of Faith|traits:divine,enchantment,mental]), targeting up to four creatures within 30 feet. If the mask is in its angelic form, you can target only evil and neutral creatures. If the mask is in its demonic form, you can target only good and neutral creatures.

Activate 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact)

Requirements A soul fragment is in the mask

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse} on the soul fragment, except you communicate telepathically and don't require the fragment's body to speak.

Mirror Robe.name: 镜面长袍 Mirror Robe
Mirror Robe.description:
成千上万个小的、反光的玻璃碎片被小心地缝合在这件长长的丝绸礼服上。

启动 1 交互

需求 镜面长袍最后一次被启动是为了吸引别人对你的注意，或者你今天尚未使用镜面长袍

效果 镜面袍以[[/r {1d20+9} #Mirror Robe Deception]]{+9}欺骗调整值为你进行一次分神（Creates a Diversion）动作

启动 1 交互(视觉)

需求 镜面长袍最后一次被启动是为了将别人的注意力从你身上移开，并且你至少对一个敌人@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}

效果 你将敌人的注意力吸引到自己身上。选择一个视你为藏匿或无踪的敌人。这名由你选择的敌人会将注意力转向你，对你的盟友@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}，直到你的下回合开始。如果有@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}或其他让你不@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{可见 Observed}的状态，你无法使用该启动。

Mirror of Sleeping Vigil.name: 睡眠警戒之镜 Mirror of Sleeping Vigil
Mirror of Sleeping Vigil.description: 这面宝石魔镜让你能对睡眠中的自己获得更强的掌控力。当你绑定这面镜子时，你可以在梦中监视自己的身体，让你能看到自己的身体和@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]范围内的东西，但是你无法听到、闻到、或使用你沉睡身体的其他感官。你在观察此区域时，基于视觉的察觉检定不会受到-4减值，也不会因为@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}导致你对区域内的生物@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}。只要你是自愿睡着的，而不是由于某种睡眠状态的影响，如果你周围有可见的活动迹象，你将自动从睡眠中醒来。

Mirror of Sorshen.name: Mirror of Sorshen
Mirror of Sorshen.description:
The silvery glass of this oval mirror displays alluring sights. Its dark wooden frame is studded with small green gems and is carved with the shapes of a male figure on one edge of the glass and a female figure on the other side.

The mirror can form a bond with a spellcaster who has legendary proficiency in Arcana or Occultism, who becomes the mirror's owner. Regardless of where the mirror is, as long as the bond remains, the owner is aware of everything the mirror is currently reflecting and can use the mirror's activations.

Whenever an intelligent creature looks in the mirror, they see an image of a person, creature, or item they find irresistible-most often one they find attractive. The specific image varies depending on the observer, even when more than one creature is looking into the mirror at the same time. Observers are fascinated by the images in the mirror unless they succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:35|traits:emotion,incapacitation,visual] save each round. On a failure, they stare blankly at the mirror for as long as it remains in view, and if it leaves their view, they stare toward the last place they saw the mirror for several minutes thereafter. This is an emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, and visual effect. Creatures that are fascinated by the mirror are so deeply entranced that they don't end their fascinated condition automatically even if a creature uses hostile actions against them or their allies; instead, they can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:30|traits:emotion,incapacitation,visual] save to end the fascination. At the GM's discretion, a truly innocent creature or a creature that has renounced all worldly pleasures might be immune to the mirror's fascination.

Activate D envision (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, visual)

Effect You force a creature looking at the mirror to attempt an additional Will save against the mirror's fascination effect, even if they succeeded at their save.

Activate T command (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation)

Requirements The target must be fascinated by the mirror

Effect You control the target for 30 days, with the effect of a critically failed saving throw against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate}. If the victim sees the mirror again at any point before this duration expires, the control extends for an additional 30 days from the moment it looked at the mirror again. While there is no initial saving throw, the DC to break free due to commands against the creature's nature is 35.

Destruction The Mirror of Sorshen shatters into a thousand pieces if an intelligent but completely innocent creature resists the mirror's attraction and then accidentally drops it.

Mirror-Ball Snare.name: Mirror-Ball Snare
Mirror-Ball Snare.description: A mixture of metal shavings and flash powder inside this small, mirrored sphere ignites when disturbed, causing the ball to flash and spin. When a creature enters the square, the ball pops into the air, and all creatures within 10 feet who can see the mirror ball must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. On a critical failure, affected creatures are instead dazzled for 1 minute.

Misdirecting Haversack.name: 误导背包 Misdirecting Haversack
Misdirecting Haversack.description:
这个棕色的皮背包是由油浸的坚硬皮革制成。这个背包的大小足够装下1B的物品。

启动 1 分钟(想象, 交互)

效果 包内的文件会被神奇地伪装成类型类似，但带有误导性信息的文件。任何检查文件的人只要成功地进行@Check[type:perception|dc:20|name:Determine Documents are Misleading|showDC:all]检定就能注意到这种伪装，但确定实际的文字需要成功地进行@Check[type:society|dc:20|name:Decipher Writing|traits:action:decipher-writing|showDC:all]检定来破译文书。这个效果一直持续到你再次使用这个启动，从而结束所有之前被伪装的文件的效果；直到你使用第二种启动来结束对单个文件的效果；或者直到背包中的文件被放在背包外至少1小时，这话结束对该文件的效果。

启动 1 命令

效果 你将其中一个文件恢复到其原始状态。

Mistform Elixir (Greater).name: 高等雾化灵药 Mistform Elixir (Greater)
Mistform Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

一阵模糊的雾气从你的皮肤中散发，使你在5分钟内变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

当你的位置仍然显而易见时，就像普通的隐蔽一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽状态来进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。

Mistform Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等雾化灵药 Mistform Elixir (Lesser)
Mistform Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

一阵模糊的雾气从你的皮肤中散发，使你在3轮内变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

当你的位置仍然显而易见时，就像普通的隐蔽一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽状态来进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。

Mistform Elixir (Moderate).name: 中等雾化灵药 Mistform Elixir (Moderate)
Mistform Elixir (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

一阵模糊的雾气从你的皮肤中散发，使你在1分钟内变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

当你的位置仍然显而易见时，就像普通的隐蔽一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽状态来进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。

Miter of Communion.name: Miter of Communion
Miter of Communion.description:
This ornate headgear comes in many different shapes and sizes, though most are elaborately decorated with motifs of the deity whose honor in which it was made. The miter brings you spiritually closer to your deity's servitors, granting you a +2 item bonus to Religion checks.

Activate 1 minute (command)

Frequency once per week

Effect You chant for a minute about a task at hand for the coming week to cast a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pkcOby5prOausy1k]{Read Omens} spell that grants you cryptic but useful advice.

Mithral Buckler (High-Grade).name: 高纯度秘银小圆盾 Mithral Buckler (High-Grade)
Mithral Buckler (High-Grade).description:
秘银盾牌比正常材料的要轻：物品负载降低1（若正常负载为1，则变为L，对于正常为L的物品来说无效果）。当使用盾击Shield Bash时，盾牌视为秘银武器。

该盾牌硬度6，HP24，BT12。

制造需求 至少价值4,000 gp的秘银

Mithral Buckler (Standard-Grade).name: 标准纯度秘银小圆盾 Mithral Buckler (Standard-Grade)
Mithral Buckler (Standard-Grade).description:
秘银盾牌比正常材料的要轻：物品负载降低1（若正常负载为1，则变为L，对于正常为L的物品来说无效果）。当使用盾击Shield Bash时，盾牌视为秘银武器。

该盾牌硬度3，HP12，BT6。

制造需求 至少价值50 gp的秘银

Mithral Chunk.name: 秘银块 Mithral Chunk
Mithral Chunk.description:
秘银因其轻巧、耐用和对恶魔与兽化人的特效而闻名。它有着和银一样的色泽但更轻。秘银武器和护甲在伤害对银有弱点的生物时可以视为银制。秘银制的金属物品比钢铁制的要轻：物品负载降低1（若正常负载为1，则变为L，对于正常为L的物品来说无效果）。秘银制物品的价格基于物品正常的负载，而非秘银减少过后的负载，不过秘银减少负载的计算，在其它因体型而对物品负载的进行的调整之前。

Mithral Shield (High-Grade).description:
秘银盾牌比正常材料的要轻：物品负载降低1（若正常负载为1，则变为L，对于正常为L的物品来说无效果）。当使用盾击Shield Bash时，盾牌视为秘银武器。

秘银盾牌比正常材料的要轻：物品负载降低1（若正常负载为1，则变为L，对于正常为L的物品来说无效果）。当使用盾击Shield Bash时，盾牌视为秘银武器。

该盾牌硬度5，HP20，BT10。

制造需求 至少价值55 gp的秘银

Mithral Tree.name: 秘银之树 Mithral Tree
Mithral Tree.description: 不是秘银也不是树，这把长枪的名字源于最常见该武器的精瑛（Jinin）的精灵传说。这是一种优雅的武器，而也确实在某些方面像是一颗树；其扇型的枪托和长且被金属环加固的曲线枪管（sweeping barrel），使持用者可以在返回安全的射击范围时格挡近战攻击。

Mnemonic Acid.name: Mnemonic Acid
Mnemonic Acid.description:
Activate1Interact

This translucent yellow-green liquid has a sharp, tangy odor and an oily sheen. It's mildly acidic and can cause a minor rash after prolonged contact with skin. To unlock its true potential, you must submerge a piece of an intelligent creature's brain matter in the acid and allow the material to completely dissolve. This takes [[/r 2d10 #minutes]]{2d10 minutes}, during which time the mnemonic acid bubbles and steams eagerly.

Once the brain matter fully dissolves, you can consume the acid as an Interact action to experience a powerful vision and relive one of the memories of the creature whose brain matter was dissolved. You have no control over which memory you experience, although such visions are almost always of memories that were meaningful to the owner of the dissolved brain matter. The memory might be of a single event or a series of related and interconnected events; the memory lasts no longer than 10 minutes, and you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blind} to the world around you for the duration.

Each dose of mnemonic acid requires roughly 10% of the brain matter of the creature whose visions are to be experienced, meaning that up to 10 different memories from the same creature can be experienced, each with a different dose of mnemonic acid, before the brain matter is exhausted.

Monkey Pin.name: 猿猴徽章 Monkey Pin
Monkey Pin.description:
用法 附着到盔甲

启动 A 攀爬Climb

需求 你在运动Athletics中受训

这枚黄铜小徽章的形状是一只在爬树的猴子。当你启动这枚护符，进行一个攀爬Climb动作。如果你成功了，则在攀爬中以你完整的速度Speed移动。如果你投出了大失败，则改为失败。

Monkey's Fist.name: Monkey's Fist
Monkey's Fist.description: Also called a "slungshot", the monkey's fist is a short length of rope ending in a thick knot wrapped around a metal weight. You can tie the loose end of a monkey's fist to your wrist; if you are Disarmed, the weapon remains secured to your wrist rather than falling to the ground, though you must use an Interact action to grip it before using it again. A monkey's fist is a martial melee weapon.

Monkey's Paw.name: Monkey's Paw
Monkey's Paw.description:
This dried, gnarled hand is clenched in a fist, waiting for a creature to pick it up. When you pick up the monkey's paw, the hand opens, revealing three withered fingers. The monkey's paw grants you three wishes, curling one finger after every one. Once you pick up the monkey's paw, you cannot discard the hand until it returns to a clenched fist by casting its three wishes. Any attempts to discard the hand, even with the effects of a miracle or wish spell, are unsuccessful as the monkey's paw reappears among your possessions within [[/br 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}; it doesn't work for any other creature in the intervening time. The hand returns even if another creature steals it from you. Once you make all three wishes, the monkey's paw uses plane shift to travel to a random point in the multiverse.

Whenever the monkey's paw hears you utter a statement that sounds like a wish, even if you don't use the words "I wish", it activates and grants a twisted, horrifying version of your wish, producing any effect within the possibility of alter reality, miracle, primal phenomenon, or wish, and potentially a greater effect at the GM's discretion.

Moonlit Chain.name: 月耀链衫 Moonlit Chain
Moonlit Chain.description:
这件+1银制链甲衫特别制作了一个绣有月相的衣领。你可在月光环境中如同有低光视觉一般视物。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 触摸护甲衣领上的新月图案以压制自己所受的目眩状态1分钟。

制造需求 原材料中必须包含33gp的银。

Moonstone Diadem.name: Moonstone Diadem
Moonstone Diadem.description:
This delicate and elegant diadem is woven of intricate silver wires set with three tear-shaped pearlescent moonstones. You gain a +1 item bonus to Religion checks.

Activate T focus

Frequency once per hour

Requirements You are within 10 feet of a moonstone pool

Effect You peer into the moonstone pool and gain access to all the visual history recorded within the receptacle by concentrating on the specific subject you wish to see. Conversely, you can choose to deposit your own memories into the pool by concentrating for 1 hour on the information you wish to impart.

Morningstar.name: 钉头锤 Morningstar
Morningstar.description: 这种武器有短柄顶端是带着尖刺的金属球。

Mortar of Hidden Meaning.name: Mortar of Hidden Meaning
Mortar of Hidden Meaning.description:
This matching mortar and pestle are made from immaculate darkwood that looks nearly olive in the right light.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You use the mortar of hidden meaning to grind tea leaves (or another suitable substance for making a hot beverage). While grinding the tea leaves, which takes no less than 1 minute, you can speak a message into the mortar. After the leaves are steeped in hot water, the first person who drinks from the resulting brew hears the message whispered in their ear.

Mountebank's Passage.name: Mountebank's Passage
Mountebank's Passage.description:
This +2 greater striking flintlock pistol has the odd construction of possessing two triggers, one of soapstone and one of onyx, clearly separated with individual trigger guards. Originally created by a student at Blythir College in Alkenstar, the mountebank's passage has the ability to create temporary linked portals on existing surfaces. The weapon disappeared shortly after its invention, but rumors have circulated that it now belongs to a group of thieves who use it to commit impossible robberies.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements the mountebank's passage isn't loaded

Effect You pull the soapstone trigger. Choose a vertical surface within 120 feet. A beam of white energy crackles to the vertical surface and creates a white portal on that surface. Any creature who moves through the white portal comes out through the mountebank's passage's black portal, if one exists on the same plane. Using this activation causes any previous white portal to disappear, even if you don't create a new portal; otherwise, the portal lasts until your next daily preparations.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements the mountebank's passage isn't loaded

Effect You pull the onyx trigger. Choose a vertical surface within 120 feet. A beam of black energy crackles to the vertical surface and creates a black portal on that surface. Any creature who moves through the black portal comes out through the mountebank's passage's white portal, if one exists on the same plane. Using this activation causes any previous black portal to disappear; even if you don't create a new portal; otherwise, the portal lasts until your next daily preparations.

Mudrock Snare.name: Mudrock Snare
Mudrock Snare.description:
Fired clay covers a pit of thin mud interspersed with fragile vials of blue dragon blood. The first creature to step into the square breaks through the clay and sinks into the pit, fracturing the vials and rapidly hardening the mud as it touches the blue dragon blood. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29|traits:bkobold] save as the mud hardens over its legs.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.6p2Sjl7XxCc55ft4]{Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success)}

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}, and it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.UTtX0xLGYci6P43I]{Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure)}

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}, and it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Craft Requirements Supply 75 gp worth of refined blue dragon blood.

Mummified Bat.name: 木乃伊蝙蝠 Mummified Bat
Mummified Bat.description:
用法 附着到一件武器

启动 A 命令

需求 你在察觉Perception上达到大师

这个护符是一个经过魔法处理的微型蝙蝠残骸，并包在了莎草纸里面。当你启动这只蝙蝠，附着的武器会侦测到附近的颤动，并指引你的感官。你获得战士职业专长 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{盲斗 Blind-Fight} 的效果，持续1分钟。

如果你拥有盲斗Blind-Fight专长，你获得距离30尺的模糊回声定位能力，持续1分钟。这能让因为你无法看见而获得无踪Undetected状态的生物改为获得藏匿Hidden状态。

Murderer's Knot.name: 杀手绳结 Murderer's Knot
Murderer's Knot.description:
用法 附着到一件武器

启动 F 命令

触发 你用附着的武器进行的打击Strike伤害了一个措手不及Flat-footed的生物

需求 你在附着的武器上达到专家

这卷黑色的皮绳系在一起，在附着的武器收起来的时候看起来就像和平结一样，但不会影响你拔出武器的动作。当你启动这个绳结，你伤害的生物受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success]。

如果你拥有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Jc2ySGLVi053qpz]{扭转刀刃 Twist the Knife} 专长，这个护符造成的持续流血伤害等同于你的偷袭攻击伤害。

Musical Instrument (Handheld).name: 乐器(手持) Musical Instrument (Handheld)
Musical Instrument (Handheld).description: 手持乐器包括风笛、小套编钟、小鼓、小提琴和弦乐器、长笛和龠、小竖琴、琵琶、小号和类似大小的乐器。GM可能会裁定一个特别大的手持仪器（如大号）具有更大的负载。诸如大鼓、全套编钟和键盘乐器之类的大型乐器不太方便携带，并且通常在演奏时需要静止。

Musical Instrument (Heavy).name: 乐器(大型) Musical Instrument (Heavy)
Musical Instrument (Heavy).description: 手持乐器包括风笛、小套编钟、小鼓、小提琴和弦乐器、长笛和龠、小竖琴、琵琶、小号和类似大小的乐器。GM可能会裁定一个特别大的手持仪器（如大号）具有更大的负载。诸如大鼓、全套编钟和键盘乐器之类的大型乐器不太方便携带，并且通常在演奏时需要静止。

Musical Instrument (Virtuoso handheld).name: 专家级乐器(手持) Musical Instrument (Virtuoso handheld)

Naginata.description: This 6-foot staff has a 2-foot-long, slightly curved, swordlike blade attached at one end. The long pole helps keep the wielder out of reach of swords and shorter weapons.

Nauseating Snare.name: 反胃圈套 Nauseating Snare
Nauseating Snare.description:
你布置了一些恶臭难闻的物质，能够溅到一个生物身上。第一个进入方格的生物必须进行一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}

失败 生物陷入恶心2

大失败 生物陷入恶心3

Necklace of Fireballs I.name: I型火球项链 Necklace of Fireballs I
Necklace of Fireballs I.description:
这条项链像是大麻茎上挂着光滑的，大小不一的红色小珠子一样。启动后，它会瞬间变回自己真实的模样：一根黄金链上精巧地串着黄金球体。火球项链有许多不同类型。每种都有着不同的反射Reflex豁免DC，并包含了一组能造成不同数量伤害的球体。

这串项链上有一颗 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 火焰伤害} 和两颗 [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 火焰伤害}，豁免为@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect|showDC:all] 当所有珠子都被用掉，项链就会变成失去魔法的大麻茎。

启动 A 交互

效果 你取下项链上的一颗珠子，让它发出橙色的光芒。你启动一颗珠子之后，你或其他人将它丢出去（这是一个具有远程Ranged特征的交互Interact动作），它在落地时会像火球术Fireball一样爆炸。你的投掷可以将火球的中心置于70尺内的任意位置，但如果这次投掷的难度较高，GM也可能认为你需要投一个攻击骰。如果在你的下一回合开始前没有人投掷这颗珠子，它会变成失去魔法效果的红色珠子。

Necklace of Knives.name: Necklace of Knives
Necklace of Knives.description:
This necklace strung with miniature stone throwing knives. As long as you wear it, you are never without a weapon, a crude surgical tool, or stake for a vampire, if necessary in following Pharasma's teachings.

Activate A Interact

Effect You pluck a miniature knife from the necklace, and it grows into a normal stone, steel, or wooden dagger for as long as you hold it, fading away 1 round after it leaves your hand. No matter how many knives you pull from the necklace, you never seem to deplete them. Wooden daggers from the necklace are as effective as ordinary steel daggers and can be useful to stake vampires.

Necrotic Bomb (Greater).name: Necrotic Bomb (Greater)
Necrotic Bomb (Greater).description:
Necrotic bombs combine reagents most people consider disgusting at best and unholy at worst, creating a life-sucking miasma upon contact with air. A necrotic bomb deals the listed negative damage and splash damage, and it sickens the primary target on a critical hit. This damage harms only living creatures.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

The bomb deals [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 negative damage} and [[/r {3}[splash,negative]]]{3 negative splash damage}. On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3}.

Nectar of Purification.name: 净化之蜜 Nectar of Purification
Nectar of Purification.description:
启动 A 交互

净化之蜜是一种闪闪发光的液体，通常保存在像是用来装酒醋的瓶子里。这种油会对它撒上的任何食物和饮品施展一次1环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qXTB7Ec9yYh5JPPV]{净化粮食 Purify Food and Drink}。这种花蜜在生效之后就会挥发，食物和饮品的外貌和味道都不会发生改变。

Net.name: 网 Net
Net.description:
你可以直接使用一张网或将其附着在一根绳索上。当它被附着在绳索上时，你可以使用网来擒拿一个距离10尺内的中体型或更小的生物（而不只是邻接的生物）。只要该生物保持在你的10尺距离内，且你仍然持握着网，你就能继续进行擒拿以维持对目标的擒抱。除非你邻接被擒抱的生物，否则该生物在逃脱检定中会获得+2环境加值，该生物也可以尝试@Check[type:athletics|dc:16|traits:action:force-open]检定以彻底破拆这张网。一旦目标不再陷入擒抱，这张网便变得十分笨拙，直到使用一个占用两只手的专注动作以折叠网；如果使用一张未经折叠的网，用网进行的擒拿检定便要承受-2罚值。

当这张网没有附着到绳索上时，你可以对20尺内的中体型或更小的目标进行一次远程攻击骰。命中时，目标陷入措手不及并在速度上承受-10尺环境罚值，直到其成功逃脱；如果达成重击，目标被禁足直到其成功逃脱。逃脱DC是16。邻接目标的生物可以进行交互以移除网。

Net Launcher.name: 网子发射器 Net Launcher
Net Launcher.description: 这种空心的管子有两到三尺长，可以发射一张单独的网子，其射程远超正常的投掷距离。网子发射器可以扛在肩膀上或夹在腋下使用。网子必须小心折叠，避免打结。正确地将网子装进发射器内需要花费1分钟。用网子发射器发射的网可以瞄准40尺内的中型或小型生物，而不是原来的20尺。

Nethysian Bulwark.name: Nethysian Bulwark
Nethysian Bulwark.description:
This round shield is often fashioned to resemble the religious symbol of its dual-natured namesake. A Nethysian bulwark is a high-grade cold iron shield (Hardness 10, HP 40, BT 20) that defends the wielder and can explode with retributive force when struck.

Activate F envision

Trigger The shield becomes broken when performing a Shield Block

Effect The shield explodes in a burst of bright light and shadowy tendrils, releasing a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] of force that must include the attacker if possible. The cone deals [[/r 6d8]] force damage to all creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true]).

Nettleweed Residue.name: 荨麻草渣 Nettleweed Residue
Nettleweed Residue.description:
由刺状野草的浓缩汁液制成的一种颇为有效的毒物。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 分钟

阶段 1 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 毒素伤害} (1 分钟)

阶段 2 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 毒素伤害} (1 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {13d6}[poison]]]{13d6 毒素伤害} (1 分钟)

Nightbreeze Machine.name: Nightbreeze Machine
Nightbreeze Machine.description:
The nightbreeze machine can turn a scorching hot room into a comfortable one with just the pull of a lever. Its outer shell is a brass cube half as tall as the average human that houses a series of flat metal "blades" in a circular arrangement. When placed on a flat surface, a creature within reach can Interact to flip the lever, turning the machine on. When the machine is active, the blades begin to spin rapidly, setting the air in the room into motion, which cools off the room's inhabitants. A front-mounted metal grate prevents anyone from coming into accidental contact with the spinning blades without impeding airflow.

The nightbreeze machine was recently commissioned by Malduoni, Keeper of the First Law, leader of the nation of Rahadoum. He tasked the country's brightest inventors with creating devices that would, in his words, "Ensure that no mortal need fear death from the desert heat." This machine was the first creation to come out of this consolidated engineering effort, but it won't be the last.

A nightbreeze machine can affect an enclosed area of no more than 50 feet by 50 feet and has negligible effect when used in a larger enclosed area or outside. While active, it reduces the effects of severe heat by one step to mild heat, and reduces extreme heat to severe heat. A nightbreeze machine isn't powerful enough to reduce the effects of incredible heat, though fortunately such heat isn't found naturally in the deserts of Rahadoum. A nightbreeze machine runs for 8 hours, after which it must be wound in a process that takes 10 minutes to complete. The 8 hours of activity don't have to be consecutive.

Nightmare Cudgel.name: Nightmare Cudgel
Nightmare Cudgel.description:
Crafted from polished wood, this seemingly mundane +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.c58wczIzH2gzeXQL]{Club} comes with a red leather strap near the handle. The mere sight of the cudgel in a guard's hand fills prisoners with dread.

Good creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying, wielding, or wearing this item crafted by the sea-witches.

Activate2 Interact (emotion, mental)

Frequency once per day

Effect You initiate an intimidating walk, thumping the cudgel menacingly against your palm. As part of activating this item, you can Stride twice. For the next minute, whenever you successfully Strike a creature with the nightmare cudgel, you can use a free action to attempt an Intimidation check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} the struck creature.

Nightmare Salt.name: Nightmare Salt
Nightmare Salt.description:
This potent poison consists of crystals whose flavor and appearance mimics edible salt but whose effects are deadly: victims experience periods of waking nightmares that overload the senses and eventually result in death through a combination of shock and exhaustion.

Activate T Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:43]

Onset 1 hour

Maximum Duration 5 days

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} once every [[/r 1d4]] hours, plus @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 day)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute once every [[/r 1d4]] hours, plus frightened 3 and fatigued (1 day)

Stage 3 frightened 3, plus confused for [[/r 1d4]] minutes, once every hour, plus fatigued (1 day)

Stage 4 death

Nightmare Vapor.name: 梦魇蒸汽 Nightmare Vapor
Nightmare Vapor.description:
据说梦魇蒸汽有着许多怪异的来源，不过大多数梦魇蒸汽是由遭受极其恐怖的梦魇折磨的类人生物身上收集来的汗液再经过沸腾产生的。

启动 A 交互 (吸入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

潜伏期 1 轮

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} (1 轮)

阶段 2 困惑confused 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1 轮)

阶段 3 困惑confused, 措手不及flat-footed, 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1 轮)

Nightstick.name: Nightstick
Nightstick.description: This collapsible baton consists of several nested, telescoping metal shafts that can be extended as a free action by flicking the wrist. Once extended to its full length (usually around 2 feet), the baton locks into shape until the wielder uses an Interact action to collapse it-a collapsed nightstick is 8 inches long, making it easily concealed. Lighter and more maneuverable than an ordinary club or truncheon, nightsticks are designed to subdue foes without causing permanent injury. A nightstick is an uncommon simple melee weapon.

Nine-Ring Sword.name: Nine-Ring Sword
Nine-Ring Sword.description: This sword has a broad blade, along which are threaded nine heavy metal rings. The rings add weight to the weapon for downward swings, as well as clashing together to make noise.

Noisemaker Snare.name: Noisemaker Snare
Noisemaker Snare.description:
When a creature enters this snare's square, it triggers an extremely loud clockwork device, which explodes with a bang that can be heard from 200 feet away and deals [[/r {1d8}[fire]]]{1d8 fire damage}. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute.

Noqual Buckler (High Grade).name: 高纯度零晶小圆盾 Noqual Buckler (High Grade)
Noqual Buckler (High Grade).description:
零晶盾的制作过程难得令人发指，需要高纯度材料，但在对抗魔法时格外高效。当你举起Raise一面零晶盾，你在对抗瞄准你的法术的豁免骰上获得它的环境加值（也包括AC）。

另外，当盾牌被举起Raise，且当一个敌人对你施展的一个法术在对抗你AC的法术攻击骰中大失败时，你可以花费一个反应将法术反射回去。尝试一次对抗触发生物的远程攻击骰，使用你在远程武器上的最高熟练度。如果成功，你的敌人受到自己的法术在法术攻击骰中达成成功时的效果（如果你的远程攻击骰达成大成功，你的敌人则受到大成功的效果）。

制造需求 价值至少7,000gp的零晶

Noqual Chunk.name: 零晶块 Noqual Chunk
Noqual Chunk.description:
零晶又轻又强韧，而且也被证实对魔法具有强大的抗力。这种抗力的副作用是在使用零晶制作魔法武器时需要一些复杂而昂贵的炼金对策。科沃斯·库，纽梅利亚的黑君（Kevoth-Kull, the Black Sovereign of Numeria），使用零晶和寒铁开发出了一种被称为霸钢的合金，能够缓和这种性质。这种金属的水晶外观可能会被认为性质脆弱，但这种惨绿色的材料和铁具有类似的性质。

使用零晶制成的物品在该物品尝试对抗魔法的豁免检定中具有+4环境加值，该加值也适用于持有者在从魔法中保护物品的这种特定豁免（例如对抗@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0fYE64odlKqISzft]{锈蚀爪 Rusting Grasp}）。

零晶物品

高纯度 10 40 20

Noqual Ingot.description:
零晶又轻又强韧，而且也被证实对魔法具有强大的抗力。这种抗力的副作用是在使用零晶制作魔法武器时需要一些复杂而昂贵的炼金对策。科沃斯·库，纽梅利亚的黑君（Kevoth-Kull, the Black Sovereign of Numeria），使用零晶和寒铁开发出了一种被称为霸钢的合金，能够缓和这种性质。这种金属的水晶外观可能会被认为性质脆弱，但这种惨绿色的材料和铁具有类似的性质。

Noqual Shield (High Grade).description:
零晶盾的制作过程难得令人发指，需要高纯度材料，但在对抗魔法时格外高效。当你举起Raise一面零晶盾，你在对抗瞄准你的法术的豁免骰上获得它的环境加值（也包括AC）。

制造需求 价值至少7,700gp的零晶

North Wind's Night Verse.name: 北风夜诗 North Wind's Night Verse
North Wind's Night Verse.description:
这把+1强击冻寒打刀（katana）摸起来总是很冰冷，几乎令人难以忍受。它既没有刀镡也没有雕饰，它的打磨锋利的刀刃是用一整根龙龟的獠牙雕刻而成，把手处裹着冬狼的皮。使用该打刀对那些承受速度减值或陷入缓慢状态的生物进行打击时，伤害骰有+2状态加值。如果该武器具有高等强击符文，状态加值为+3，上等强击为+4。

启动 f 命令(寒冷，塑能系，魔法)

频率 每分钟一次

触发 你的法术对生物造成寒冷伤害

效果 选择其中一个受到法术的寒冷伤害的生物。它的速度遭受-5尺状态减值，持续1轮。

Nosoi Charm.name: Nosoi Charm
Nosoi Charm.description:
Nosois serve as scribes and messengers to psychopomps. They are rare outside of the Boneyard, so it's common for psychopomps venturing to other planes to carry a nosoi facsimile to aid in their travels. This tiny icon of a masked raven emits twittering sounds in perfect accompaniment to your performances. You gain a +2 item bonus to Performance checks to play an instrument, orate, or sing. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{Sending} once per day as a divine innate spell.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.MesQvxSazhl7Xvg8]{Effect: Nosoi Charm (Performance)}

Activate 3 Interact

Effect You twist the base of the charm, and the twittering it emits becomes helpful words to boost your arguments. You lose the item bonus to Performance checks and gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make Requests until you use this activation again.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.4uy4Ygf5KD2WrtGW]{Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy)}

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.VVWvXiNudYYGV9sJ]{Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)}

Nosoi Charm (Greater).name: Nosoi Charm (Greater)
Nosoi Charm (Greater).description:
Nosois serve as scribes and messengers to psychopomps. They are rare outside of the Boneyard, so it's common for psychopomps venturing to other planes to carry a nosoi facsimile to aid in their travels. This tiny icon of a masked raven emits twittering sounds in perfect accompaniment to your performances. You gain a +3 item bonus to Performance checks to play an instrument, orate, or sing. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{Sending} once per day as a divine innate spell.

You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet as long as you continue holding the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.LHOd4aqzb4q9ZuEH]{Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Performance)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.0rkg7SVzs2AetUXw]{Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense)}

Activate 3 Interact

Effect You twist the base of the charm, and the twittering it emits becomes helpful words to boost your arguments. You lose the item bonus to Performance checks and gain a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make Requests until you use this activation again.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.NdfhpKCjSS80LiUz]{Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy)}

Noxious Incense.name: 刺鼻熏香 Noxious Incense
Noxious Incense.description:
启动 施放法术

这种恶臭的熏香只有单独一根，上面复盖着一团炼金发烟物质，在高温下会释放出恰如其名的刺鼻气味。以此触媒强化@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{火墙术 Wall of Fire}，能让所有火墙相邻的方格都充满恶臭、浓厚的烟幕。在此区域内的生物获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，而那些位于烟幕之外的生物对于烟幕内的生物来说也是隐蔽的。在法术生效期间，烟幕会持续存在。 熏香能强化6环级以下的火墙术。

Noxious Incense (Greater).name: 高等刺鼻熏香 Noxious Incense (Greater)
Noxious Incense (Greater).description:
启动 施放法术

这种恶臭的熏香只有单独一根，上面复盖着一团炼金发烟物质，在高温下会释放出恰如其名的刺鼻气味。以此触媒强化@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{火墙术 Wall of Fire}，能让所有火墙相邻的方格都充满恶臭、浓厚的烟幕。在此区域内的生物获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，而那些位于烟幕之外的生物对于烟幕内的生物来说也是隐蔽的。在法术生效期间，烟幕会持续存在。 熏香能强化任意环级的火墙术。

Noxious Jerkin.name: Noxious Jerkin
Noxious Jerkin.description:
This +2 resilient padded armor is woven from many strands of gut cord strung with dried organs and preserved xulgath scent glands. When worn, it infuses your body with a ghastly and nauseating flavor.

Activate F envision

Trigger You are grabbed or are hit by an unarmed attack

Effect Your attacker must attempt a DC 28 Fortitude saving throw. Creatures with a stench aura, such as otyughs and xulgaths, are immune to this effect.

Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to the effects of the noxious jerkin for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is sickened 1.

Critical Failure The creature is sickened 1 and is slowed 1 for 1 round.

Numerian Steel Breastplate.name: Numerian Steel Breastplate
Numerian Steel Breastplate.description:
This +1 resilient breastplate is constructed from the salvaged armor plating of one of Numeria's large robots. It protects the wearer from harsh elements and common laser fire, granting the wearer fire resistance 5.

Activate1command

Frequency once per day

Effect You activate the remnants of mysterious technology within the breastplate to encase yourself in an electric field. For 1 minute, adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee Strike, as well as creatures that touch you or hit you with an unarmed attack, take [[/r 1d10]] electricity damage per hit.

Nunchaku.name: 双截棍 Nunchaku
Nunchaku.description: 双截棍由两根木质或金属的棍子通过绳子或链条链接而成。

Oath of the Devoted.name: Oath of the Devoted
Oath of the Devoted.description:
You gain fire and mental resistance 5. When you die, you rise as an undead creature with the zombie trait on the next round; if you are a PC, you become an NPC under Walkena's control. Your stats remain the same, except that your alignment changes to evil. If you reach 0 Hit Points as a zombie, you are destroyed and do not rise again.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. Choose a weapon or an unarmed Strike; your chosen attack deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} for the next 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.zY7cemRcFD2zAVbC]{Effect: Oath of the Devoted}

Special If you are a zombie at a time when Mzali is entirely purged of foreigners, your duty is fulfilled and you are immediately destroyed.

Oathbow.name: 誓仇弓 Oathbow
Oathbow.description:
其用柔韧的白木制作，表面刻有华美的纹路图，这张+2强击复合长弓似乎由精灵制作。当你射矢时，箭身在空中划过，发出如同精灵轻吟一般的声响，许下尽早击溃强敌的祝福。

启动 A 命令

效果 你许下摧毁一位可见敌人的誓言。在接下来7天，直到该生物被击杀前，你用该弓对其的每次攻击都能造成1d6点额外伤害，且你在追踪其时的生存检定上获得+2环境加值。

你对目标造成的重击获得弓重击专精效果；若你已可如此，则改为将逃脱重击特效的运动DC增至20。

启动誓仇弓特效后，7天内你无法再次启动它。若你击杀誓仇的对象，誓仇结束，你只需要等待10分钟即可再次启动誓仇弓。

Obfuscation Oil.name: 混淆油 Obfuscation Oil
Obfuscation Oil.description:
你可以把这种蓝灰色的软膏抹在一件负载Bulk在3或以下的物品上，保护其不受魔法侦测。该物品免疫8环或以下的预言系法术（例如定位术Locate）。这种油的效果是永久的，但可以用酸来移除它。在负载Bulk为1或以下的物品上移除这种油需要花费1分钟，对于负载Bulk更高的物品，需要花费等同于负载Bulk的分钟数。

启动 A 交互

Oblivion Essence.name: Oblivion Essence
Oblivion Essence.description:
Created from a daemon's powdered soul gems or refined from the waters of Abaddon's rivers, oblivion essence causes victims to rapidly age and decay.

Activate A Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and slowed 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {12d6}[poison]]]{12d6 poison damage}, enfeebled 3, slowed 1 (1 round)

Occult Scroll Case of Simplicity.name: Occult Scroll Case of Simplicity
Occult Scroll Case of Simplicity.description:
The four different types of scroll cases of simplicity often bear adornments appropriate to their magical tradition, such as angelic wings or otherworldly lettering. On the inside, intricate runic diagrams spiral out to surround the scroll stored within. A scroll placed within the case can be converted into energy to cast consistently useful spells depending on its type. You must be able to cast spells of a given tradition to use a scroll case of simplicity of a corresponding type.

Activate A Interact

Requirements The scroll case contains a single scroll of a 1st-level spell

Effect You transfer the scroll's energy into the scroll case, consuming the scroll, and you can immediately begin casting one of the scroll case's spells. If you use any action other than to Cast a Spell from the scroll case after activating the scroll case of simplicity, the scroll and its energy are lost.

The scroll case can be used to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe}

Ogre Hook.name: Ogre Hook
Ogre Hook.description: Ogres are known for using immense, curved picks called ogre hooks.

Oil (1 pint).name: 油(1品脱) Oil (1 pint)
Oil (1 pint).description: 你可以用油来为提灯加油，但你也可以点燃一品脱油然后把它扔出去。你必须首先花费一个【交互动作】来准备油，然后用另一个动作进行远程接触攻击扔出它。如果你命中目标，它会溅在这个生物上或者你所瞄准的一个5尺方格。你必须成功进行@Check[type:flat|dc:10]检定才能使油在命中时成功点燃。如果油点燃，目标会受到1d6火焰伤害。

Oil of Animation.name: 活化油 Oil of Animation
Oil of Animation.description:
启动 A 交互

你可以把这种青铜色的油擦在一件近战武器上，让它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{舞空 Dancing} 符文带来的好处。一旦你在使用该武器的纯骰检定中失败，武器会落地，效果也随之终止。

Oil of Keen Edges.name: 锐锋油 Oil of Keen Edges
Oil of Keen Edges.description:
启动 A 交互

当这种银色软膏涂抹到一件造成穿刺或挥砍伤害的武器上后，该武器变得更加锐利而危险，获得 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{锋锐 Keen} 符文的好处，持续1分钟。

Oil of Mending.name: 修复油 Oil of Mending
Oil of Mending.description:
启动 A 交互

一瓶修复油的外表看起来有无数半透明的螺纹在其中旋转。将这瓶油涂抹在物品上可以对该物品施展一次2环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{修复术 Mending} 以修理它。

Oil of Object Animation.name: 活物油 Oil of Object Animation
Oil of Object Animation.description:
启动 2 交互

这种精致的金色油装在一种蓝色的小罐子里。将油小心的涂抹在一件物体上能将其转变成一个相同类型的活化物体。例如，将油抹在雕塑上能将其变成一个活化雕塑。如果转变成的活化物体等级将会超过3级，活物油将无法成功转变物体。

这些活化物体具有随从特征，意味着当你命令它时，它可以使用两个动作。作为启动活物油行动的一部分，你可以同时下达一次命令。活化物体能持续行动1分钟，之后便会停止动作。如常，你最多可以控制的随从数量是4个。

Oil of Object Animation (Greater).name: 高等活物油 Oil of Object Animation (Greater)
Oil of Object Animation (Greater).description:
启动 2 交互

这种精致的金色油装在一种蓝色的小罐子里。将油小心的涂抹在一件物体上能将其转变成一个相同类型的活化物体。例如，将油抹在雕塑上能将其变成一个活化雕塑。如果转变成的活化物体等级将会超过11级，活物油将无法成功转变物体。

这些活化物体具有随从特征，意味着当你命令它时，它可以使用两个动作。作为启动活物油行动的一部分，你可以同时下达一次命令。活化物体能持续行动1分钟，之后便会停止动作。如常，你最多可以控制的随从数量是4个。

Oil of Potency.name: 潜能油 Oil of Potency
Oil of Potency.description:
启动 A 交互

当你将这种厚重粘稠的油涂抹到武器或盔甲上后，这件物品立刻获得了魔法潜能。如果这件物品是武器，那么它暂时变成了+1强击武器，如果它是盔甲，那么它暂时变成了+1抗力盔甲。该效果持续1分钟。

Oil of Repulsion.name: 斥力油 Oil of Repulsion
Oil of Repulsion.description:
启动 A 交互

这种油内包含了磁化的铁屑，因斥力而聚集到了瓶子的两端。你在把这种油涂抹到盔甲上之后的一分钟内，所有对你进行近战打击Strike的生物必须尝试一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] 强韧豁免。

成功 该生物不受影响

失败 该生物被你推离10尺（方向由GM决定）

大失败 同失败，但该生物同时被击倒

Oil of Revelation.name: 显像油 Oil of Revelation
Oil of Revelation.description:
启动 1 交互

这种闪闪发光的油是由人类创造，用来协助他们在黑暗中战斗的。这种油中悬浮着一些宝石颗粒，而且闻起来像是烧过的火柴。

复盖着显像油的武器第一次伤害一个生物时，伤口会发光1分钟。如果生物隐形，闪光能暴露他的位置，这意味着该生物对于原本看不见他的生物来说只能获得藏匿状态，而非无踪状态。这种光也能打消由于光照条件产生的隐蔽状态。如果涂油的武器在1小时内都没有伤害到一个生物，油会脱落并失去效果。

Oil of Unlife (Greater).name: 高等无命油 Oil of Unlife (Greater)
Oil of Unlife (Greater).description:
启动 1 交互

这种稀薄的黑色液体透露出刺入骨髓的冷彻，能够快速修复一个不死生物的物理或灵魂形态。当你将无命油泼在一个不死生物，或具有负能量治疗能力的活体生物身上时，油会快速吸收进该生物的身体内，且该生物恢复6d8+20生命值。你也可以将无命油泼到虚体不死生物上，此时该生物也能将无命油吸入其中。

Oil of Weightlessness.name: 失重油 Oil of Weightlessness
Oil of Weightlessness.description: 你可以将这种闪亮的油涂在负载Bulk不超过1的物品上，让它的重量消失。在接下来的1小时内，该物品没有负载Bulk。

Olfactory Obfuscator (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶泡沫液体能让饮用者身上渗出能够吸收气味的油脂。喝下灵药后，你所散发的气味在8小时内变得几乎无法被注意到。

具有模糊嗅觉的生物无法侦测到你，除非他们对你进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}，而且你对具有精确嗅觉的生物而言具有隐蔽。你在对抗只拥有嗅觉感官的生物所针对你的搜索检定时获得+4物品加值；如果他们同时可以使用其他感官，那么这个加值不会生效。

Omnidirectional Spear Snare.name: 矛阵圈套 Omnidirectional Spear Snare
Omnidirectional Spear Snare.description: 一旦一个生物进入该圈套的方格，圈套从各个方向突出强力的长矛刺向目标，造成19d8点穿刺伤害（DC 37基础反射Reflex）。

Onyx Panther.name: 缟玛瑙黑豹 Onyx Panther
Onyx Panther.description:
用法 附着到盔甲

启动 F 想象

触发 你使用一个潜行Sneak动作

需求 你在隐秘Stealth中受训

这个小石头是风格化的黑豹形状。当你启动它，你在触发的潜行Sneak动作以及这回合的其他潜行Sneak动作中可以以完整的速度Speed移动（而非一半的速度Speed）。

Orb Shard.name: Orb Shard
Orb Shard.description:
A shard of the Orb of Gold Dragonkind resembles a pointed length of crystal about the size and shape of a shortsword without a hilt. It functions as a +3 striking shortsword that deals 2d6 extra damage to dragons.

Each orb shard within 60 feet of the flawed orb of Gold Dragonkind increases the save DC against the orb by 1; thus, if all 13 remaining orb shards are in this area, the save DC against the flawed orb increases from DC 30 to DC 43. A talented spellcaster or crafter can integrate an orb shard back into the flawed orb to make this DC increase permanent.

Destruction An orb shard is extraordinarily resilient, but it can be damaged or even destroyed by mundane attacks (Hardness 40, HP 50, BT 25). It has weakness 30 to the Breath Weapons and Strikes of gold dragons.

Orb of Dragonkind.name: Orb of Dragonkind
Orb of Dragonkind.description:
Each of the legendary orbs of dragonkind contains the essence and personality of a powerful dragon, with each of the 10 most famous orbs preserving a different type of metallic or chromatic dragon's spirit. It is believed that orbs for other types of true dragons exist, though that theory is yet to be confirmed.

While holding an orb of dragonkind, you are immune to the breath weapon of the dragon variety associated with the orb. An orb of dragonkind also grants a number of additional senses. You can communicate verbally and visually with the bearers of other orbs as if you were in the same room with them. You know if there are any dragons within 10 miles of you at all times; this extends to 100 miles for dragons of the type associated with the orb. If an associated dragon is within 1 mile, you know which direction the dragon is from you and the dragon's age, such as young, adult, or ancient. Each orb grants a 10th-level arcane innate spell that you can cast at will, determined by the specific orb.

The Orb of Gold Dragonkind can convey the innate spells of any of the other orbs, as well as their activated abilities, but it can grant each individual power only once per day. In addition, the bearer of the gold orb can use its 3-action activation to attempt to cast dominate on the bearer of another orb if they are within 1 mile, as if that bearer were a dragon of the associated type within 500 feet. The last reports of the Orb of Gold Dragonkind on Golarion indicate the orb has been destroyed, however. GMs running campaigns in settings other than the Age of Lost Omens might decide the gold orb is still intact for their campaigns.

Bearing an orb of dragonkind earns you the enmity of all dragonkind forever because you profited from the enslavement of the dragon within the orb, even if you later lose the orb.

Spell Granted (DC 40) black dragon (darkness), blue dragon (hallucinatory terrain), brass dragon (speak with animals), bronze dragon (control water), copper dragon (hideous laughter), green dragon (entangle), red dragon (wall of fire), silver dragon (detect alignment [evil only]), white dragon (wall of ice)

Activate T command

Frequency once per round

Effect You cast a 10th-level dominate spell (DC 40) on a dragon of the type associated with the orb within 500 feet, except the effect lasts for 1 month rather than unlimited. The dragon does not receive its status bonus to saving throws against magic. The dragon is then temporarily immune to further domination via the orb for 24 hours.

Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency three times per day

Effect You breathe an elemental blast that deals 25d6 damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save) in either a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] or a @Template[type:line|distance:100] (your choice). The breath's damage type matches the Breath Weapon of the dragon type associated with the orb of dragonkind (acid for the black orb, electricity for the blue orb, and so on).

Destruction An orb of dragonkind violently shatters and explodes when exposed to the Breath Weapon of a dragon who is a descendant of the dragon trapped within. The explosion deals damage as the 2-action activation above to all creatures within 90 feet.

Orc Knuckle Dagger.name: 兽人指匕 Orc Knuckle Dagger
Orc Knuckle Dagger.description: 这种兽人设计的坚固的金属利器有着平行的笼手，每一头都有刃。有时也会像拳刃一样，只有一头有刃。

Orc Necksplitter.name: 兽人斩首斧 Orc Necksplitter
Orc Necksplitter.description: 这把单刃的胡须状斧子有着锯齿状的刃，非常适合将骨头与肌腱和软骨分开。

Orchestral Brooch.name: 管弦胸针 Orchestral Brooch
Orchestral Brooch.description:
用法 附着至护甲

启动 f 想象

触发 你即将尝试一次表演检定，但尚未掷骰

需求 你的表演达到大师熟练度

每当有人触摸这根银胸针时，会有音乐声轻轻回荡。当你将它附着到护甲上时，你可以选择将其变形为任何一种乐器的形状。当你启动该护符时，你的表演会伴随着一系列宏大的背景音乐，按照你表演的情境和意图来强化你的舞台效果。你在表演检定中获得+1状态加值。并且如果你成功，将得到大成功的结果。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.WHAp9cDOqnJ1VCcg]{效果：管弦胸针}

Origin Unguent.description:
启动 1 交互

这种微微发光的紫色软膏能够在含有匹配成分的物质直接创建一种温和的化学联系。你将这种粘合剂涂在两个物体之间，或涂在一个物体和一个生物之间。你可以确认这两者是否共享了同一个源头（例如，确认他们是否是由同一块物体分裂而成的，或着这些毒素样本或肉体碎块是否来自同一个生物）；如果对象之间成功匹配，溯源软膏就会产生粘性。

Ouroboros Flail.description:
这把+2高等强击延展战争连枷（war flail）可以很容易地伸长或收缩回来。当它延展的时候，锁链会凭空变长，当收缩的时候，铁链又凭空变短。

启动 r 命令

频率 每小时一次

触发 当你启动延展符文时，以此连枷打击命中

Owlbear Claw.description:
