效果 你的幻灵专注（Concentrates）于勋章以及和你的联系，迅速变出一大堆自己的分身，以你的幻灵为中心向四面八方冲去，其弥漫范围的半径等同于你幻灵的速度。范围内所有敌人受到[[/r {14d6}[bludgeoning]]]{14d6钝击伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true|name:Eidolon Stampede]豁免。如果豁免大失败，敌人还会被@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{击倒 Prone}。在造成伤害后，分身就如同出现时那样迅速消失。

Stanching.name: 止血 Stanching
Stanching.description: 这种符号能让流血的伤口癒合。刻有止血符文的盔甲能将结束持续流血伤害（persistent bleed damage）的纯骰检定（flat check）DC从15减少到12（如果有特别有效的协助〔particularly effective assistance〕则为7）。

Stanching (Greater).name: 高等止血 Stanching (Greater)
Stanching (Greater).description: 这种符号能让流血的伤口癒合。刻有止血符文的盔甲能将结束持续流血伤害（persistent bleed damage）的纯骰检定（flat check）DC从15减少到10（如果有特别有效的协助〔particularly effective assistance〕则为5）。

Stanching (Major).name: 上等止血 Stanching (Major)
Stanching (Major).description: 这种符号能让流血的伤口癒合。刻有止血符文的盔甲能将结束持续流血伤害（persistent bleed damage）的纯骰检定（flat check）DC从15减少到8（如果有特别有效的协助〔particularly effective assistance〕则为3）。

Stanching (True).name: 真实止血 Stanching (True)
Stanching (True).description: 这种符号能让流血的伤口癒合。刻有止血符文的盔甲能将结束持续流血伤害（persistent bleed damage）的纯骰检定（flat check）DC从15减少到5（如果有特别有效的协助则自动移除持续流血伤害）。

Standard Astrolabe.name: Standard Astrolabe
Standard Astrolabe.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Astrolabes can be used for navigation in unfamiliar or featureless locations.

To use an astrolabe, the holder must be trained in Survival.

By spending 1 minute to measure the height of the stars and planets, a holder who knows the time and date can determine the latitude, and a holder who knows their latitude can determine the date and time.

An astrolabe also grants a +1 item bonus on checks to identify celestial bodies.

A standard astrolabe only functions on steady ground.

Standard Book of Translation (Tien).name: Standard Book of Translation (Tien)
Standard Book of Translation (Tien).description: The book is leather-bound and decorated with the symbol of the Lantern Lodge. Red and gold cords wrap around the book and tie to keep it shut. Each volume offers translation for a different language. When working with a book of translation, you can attempt Diplomacy checks to Gather Information or to Make an Impression with creatures that speak the language featured in the book, even if you do not speak the language. Such checks take 10 times longer to complete and you take a -2 circumstance penalty to the check due to your limited communication capabilities.

Star Chart Tattoo.name: Star Chart Tattoo
Star Chart Tattoo.description:
This tattoo consists of numerous asterisks at regular intervals along the fingers of one hand, perfect for measuring stars against the horizon. When used against a clear night sky, the tattoo grants a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction and counts as a compass for the purpose of that action.

Activate 1 Interact (divination, metamagic)

Frequency once per day

Effect The dots of the tattoo turn to points of light and fly above the head of a creature within 30 feet, where they form a three-star constellation that guides your spells further than they could normally travel. The constellation sheds dim light and remains visible even if the creature hides, aiding in locating it. Furthermore, while the constellation lasts, if you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that has a range and that spell would affect only the marked creature, the spell's range is increased by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet. Each time you use this benefit, one of the stars above the creature's head winks out; when all three have winked out or after 1 minute has passed, the effect ends.

Starknife.name: 星刃 Starknife
Starknife.description: 中间是金属环，四片逐渐变细的刀刃像指南针上的指针一样延伸。当从中间抓住星刃时，使用者可以将它作为近战武器使用。它也可以在短距离内作为投掷武器使用。

Starless Scope.name: 无星望远镜 Starless Scope
Starless Scope.description:
即使是在无星之夜教团仍然存于上古瑟西隆帝国的时代，无星望远镜也是个稀罕物件。

无星望远镜是一种用银和上等木材制作的手持式望远镜。无论什么时候用无星望远镜观察天空，所看到的天空总是呈现为晴朗的夜空。当你使用望远镜观察天空时，你的天文学识和察觉检定获得+2 物品加值，因为那些没有被你视线聚焦的天体都会自动变暗，这样你就能更轻松地观察目标天体。当你以神秘技能辨识魔法时（ IdentifyMagic），获得+2物品加值。

同时，无星望远镜还能作为黛丝娜信徒的法器使用。无星望远镜的魔法需要安装特制的镜片才能发挥作用，如果你在启动望远镜的时候检定失败则可能导致镜片碎裂。

如果没有可用的镜头，无星望远镜就没有作用。你可以用一个具有操作特征的双动作[AA]来替换碎掉的镜头。如果你知道无星望远镜的制造配方，你能以@Check[type:crafting|dc:25|name:Craft New Lens]（大师）检定重新制造一个镜片。

启动 R 交互

频率 每天一次

需求 你信仰黛丝娜

触发 你将无星望远镜作为一件法器使用

效果 当你施放法术时，你试图通过望远镜增强法术的效果。你进行一次宗教检定对抗法术DC，DC由法术环级和稀有度决定。

大成功 你本次施放的法术，法术攻击骰获得+2 状态加值，敌人针对该法术的豁免受到-2 状态减值。如果你正常从法术位施法，而该法术为5 环或更低环级，则你不需要花费任何法术位，而是从无星望远镜施法。

成功 你本次施放的法术，法术攻击骰获得+1 状态加值，敌人针对该法术的豁免受到-1 状态减值。

失败 你本次施放的法术正常施放。尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:11]检定。如果失败，则镜片碎裂。

大失败 法术被打断并且镜片碎裂。

启动 2 (防护系，神术) 交互

频率 每小时一次

效果 你把望远镜举到眼前来观察30 尺内的生物。你可以尝试通过回忆知识来辨识生物，无星望远镜为此次检定提供+2 物品加值。如果生物和黑色支配者（Dominion of theBlack）或古老神话（Elder Mythos）相关，或该生物的行为亵渎了黛丝娜，则该生物必须尝试一 次@Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Starless Scope Recall Knowledge|traits:abjuration]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响，无星望远镜的镜片碎裂。

成功 该生物被耀眼的星光照亮1 轮。在此期间，如果生物是可见的（visible），他就无法获得隐蔽（concealed）。如果生物隐形，则它将从无踪（undetected）变为隐蔽。当生物被星光照耀时，他对抗神术的所有豁免都有-1 状态减值。

失败 类似成功，但生物还要受到额外效果。只要生物被星光照亮，虚体生物会暂时失去虚体特征，而非虚体生物会陷入缓慢1。

大失败 类似失败，但是星光持续1分钟，并且该生物对抗神术的所有豁免检定受到-2 状态减值。

Starless Scope Lens.name: 无星望远镜镜片 Starless Scope Lens
Starless Scope Lens.description:
这个镜片是无星望远镜的备用镜片。如果你知道无星望远镜的 制造配方，能以 DC 25 手艺（大师）检定重新制造一个镜片。

启动 2 交互(操纵); 你可以用完好的镜片替换无星望远镜中已破碎的镜片。

Starshot Arrow (Greater).name: Starshot Arrow (Greater)
Starshot Arrow (Greater).description:
The metal of these arrows is said to have come from a star that ventured too close to Golarion and was shot down by a moonlit archer. When you activate and shoot a starshot arrow, you take no range penalties against any target that you can personally detect. There must be a line of effect between you and the target.

You can fire at any creature you can detect, regardless of range. The arrow travels instantly, hitting your target as soon as you fire the arrow. This is a teleportation effect.

Starshot Arrow (Lesser).name: Starshot Arrow (Lesser)
Starshot Arrow (Lesser).description:
The metal of these arrows is said to have come from a star that ventured too close to Golarion and was shot down by a moonlit archer. When you activate and shoot a starshot arrow, you take no range penalties against any target that you can personally detect. There must be a line of effect between you and the target.

The target must be within the maximum range of your weapon.

Static Snare.name: 静电圈套 Static Snare
Static Snare.description:
你在陷阱里藏了绝缘的水晶或其他类似材料，当第一个生物进入圈套的方格时，圈套会释放出强烈的静电。该生物必须进行一个@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|traits:uncommon|showDC:all]豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标受到[[/r {1}[persistent,electricity] #persistent electricity damage]]{1} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续电击伤害}}，并且在持续电击伤害持续的时间内，对电击效果的豁免上受到-1的环境减值。

大失败 与失败一样，而且目标会吸引附近的泥土和灰尘。如果目标是隐形的或变得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{不可见 Invisible}，对于有视觉精确感官的生物来说它只是@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隐藏 Hidden}的。这个效果的持续时间与持续电击伤害的持续时间相同。

Steam Winch.name: Steam Winch
Steam Winch.description:
This hefty winch is powered by a small steam engine and includes a 100 ft. length of steel cable, which enables you to haul a heavier load than you could with a hand cranked winch or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4QufuSeCbjDD2hMa]{Comealong}. A steam winch allows you to slowly pull a heavy load (usually up to 50 Bulk) along a flat surface or up and down a vertical expanse.

Attaching a steam winch to a device takes three Interact actions, while starting the winch (and getting it warm enough to operate) takes 10 minutes. Once in operation, a steam winch requires regular maintenance to function. Every twenty minutes, the boiler must be refilled and heat levels maintained

Steamflight Pack.name: Steamflight Pack
Steamflight Pack.description:
Activate1 Interact

The steamflight pack allows its user to fly without using magic or wings. Each steamflight pack looks like a large brass backpack with two large nozzles mounted on the sides pointing downward. It also features metal arms reaching around the front that terminate in handles with activation buttons on them. When the user holds down an activation button, a complex series of mechanisms pumps water from the large tank in the backpack and releases it through the nozzles as powerful jets of steam, enabling the user to fly short distances. Tilting the handle adjusts the nozzles' angles, allowing the user to control the direction of their flight.

When active, the steamflight pack gives the user a fly Speed of 20 feet. It carries enough water for 20 minutes of operation and can be refilled in five minutes with a supply of normal water and a funnel.

Activate2 Interact

Effect You turn the steamflight pack on or off.

Steel Shield.name: 钢盾 Steel Shield
Steel Shield.description:
如同木盾，钢盾也有多种形状和尺寸。虽然比木盾昂贵，但也更加耐用。

硬度 HP BT
5 20 10

Stepping Stone Shot.name: Stepping Stone Shot
Stepping Stone Shot.description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 envision, Interact

A series of small stone discs pressed into a single round make up this ammunition. When you fire an activated stepping stone shot, whether you hit or miss your target, the shot creates a series of supports in a line that creatures can walk on as if solid ground. The line can ascend or descend at a 45-degree angle. The discs support any amount of weight, but don't otherwise pose any sort of obstacle; creatures and attacks can move through them if they wish. They crumble to dust if anything attempts to move or otherwise manipulate them. A creature can use a two-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to Stride up to its speed on the stones while causing them to crumble behind it. This ammunition does not work in firearms with the scatter trait.

The stones reach up to 100 feet, and they last up to the end of your next turn if no one collapses them. However, the line also can't extend beyond the maximum distance for a Strike from your firearm (usually six times the firearm's range increment).

Stepping Stone Shot (Greater).name: Stepping Stone Shot (Greater)
Stepping Stone Shot (Greater).description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 envision, Interact

A series of small stone discs pressed into a single round make up this ammunition. When you fire an activated stepping stone shot, whether you hit or miss your target, the shot creates a series of supports in a line that creatures can walk on as if solid ground. The line can ascend or descend at a 45-degree angle. The discs support any amount of weight, but don't otherwise pose any sort of obstacle; creatures and attacks can move through them if they wish. They crumble to dust if anything attempts to move or otherwise manipulate them. A creature can use a two-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to Stride up to its speed on the stones while causing them to crumble behind it. This ammunition does not work in firearms with the scatter trait.

The stones reach up to 250 feet, and they last up to 1 minute if no one collapses them. However, the line also can't extend beyond the maximum distance for a Strike from your firearm (usually six times the firearm's range increment).

Stiletto Pen.name: Stiletto Pen
Stiletto Pen.description: This weapon is a fully functional, lavish ink pen with a clip that can be attached to a pocket or bandoleer and easily retrieved as a free action. Using an action to Interact with the pen allows its wielder to disengage a stiletto blade that slides free of the upper body or reattach the previously removed blade.

Stole of Civility.name: Stole of Civility
Stole of Civility.description:
Woven from swaths of rich brocade silk and embroidered with ancient Azlanti script in golden thread, this stole imparts a noble appearance to even the homeliest of individuals when draped over the shoulders.

While wearing a stole of civility, you receive a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression with humans or Make a Request of humans, and a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks against humans.

The stole also grants you full understanding of the Azlanti language.

Activate A envision

Frequency once per day

Requirements you are a human

Effect You gain 10 temporary Hit Points, which last for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.i0tm2ZHekp7rGGR3]{Effect: Stole of Civility}

Stone Body Mutagen (Greater).name: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater)
Stone Body Mutagen (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone.

Benefit You gain resistance 10 to physical damage (except bludgeoning).

Drawback Your speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.b9DTIJyBT8kvIBpj]{Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater)}

Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser).name: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser)
Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone.

Benefit You gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning).

Drawback Your speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 10 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.PEPOd38VfVzQMKG5]{Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser)}

Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate).name: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate)
Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone.

Benefit You gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning).

Drawback Your speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.1xHHvQlW4pRR89qj]{Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate)}

Stone Bullet.name: 石化弹丸 Stone Bullet
Stone Bullet.description:
启动 A 交互

这颗投石索弹丸像是惊恐的蛇眼。被启动的石化弹丸命中的生物同时受到一个6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone} 的效果（DC 34）。

制作条件： 提供一次石化术Flesh to Stone施法。

Stone Circle.name: 巨石阵 Stone Circle
Stone Circle.description:
巨石阵在启动前的外表是一块拇指大小的灰色矩形石头。

启动 (1 分钟) 想象, 交互

频率 每周一次

效果 当巨石阵放在地面上启动，石头会变成一支高13呎、直径7呎、重25吨的石柱。地面上会长出同样的柱子，围成直径100呎的圆圈，上方有压顶石将柱子连在一起。如果没有足够的空间容纳圆圈，巨石阵就无法启动。在启动时，你可以选择让巨石阵对着一个天文特征（astronomical feature）排列，比如太阳、月亮或某个星座。你可以用一个互动动作推倒原本的石柱，将巨石阵变回原本的状态。当你这么做，整个巨石阵都会戏剧性垮下：石头坠落、裂开、碎成齑粉。如果你在启动的一天内没有在巨石阵中施放仪式，它也会变回原本的状态。

当你在巨石阵中施放一个5级以下的仪式，次要检定（secondary check）的第一次失败会提升一个成功度（大失败变为失败，失败变为成功）。当你在巨石阵内完成一个仪式，无论结果如何，石头都会垮掉，变回原本的型态。

Stone Circle (Greater).name: 高等巨石阵 Stone Circle (Greater)
Stone Circle (Greater).description:
巨石阵在启动前的外表是一块拇指大小的灰色矩形石头。

启动 (1 分钟) 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 当巨石阵放在地面上启动，石头会变成一支高13呎、直径7呎、重25吨的石柱。地面上会长出同样的柱子，围成直径100呎的圆圈，上方有压顶石将柱子连在一起。如果没有足够的空间容纳圆圈，巨石阵就无法启动。在启动时，你可以选择让巨石阵对着一个天文特征（astronomical feature）排列，比如太阳、月亮或某个星座。你可以用一个互动动作推倒原本的石柱，将巨石阵变回原本的状态。当你这么做，整个巨石阵都会戏剧性垮下：石头坠落、裂开、碎成齑粉。如果你在启动的一天内没有在巨石阵中施放仪式，它也会变回原本的状态。

当你在巨石阵中施放一个仪式，次要检定（secondary check）会提升一个成功度（大失败变为失败，失败变为成功，成功变大成功）。当你在巨石阵内完成一个仪式，无论结果如何，石头都会垮掉，变回原本的型态。

Stone Fist Elixir.name: 石拳灵药 Stone Fist Elixir
Stone Fist Elixir.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

你的双拳变得如同石头一般坚硬。1小时内，你的拳头造成1d6点钝击伤害，并且失去非致命特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.AMhUb42NAJ1aisZp]{效果：石拳灵药}

Stone of Weight.name: Stone of Weight
Stone of Weight.description: Also known as a loadstone, this small stone appears nonmagical and has a lovely sheen, giving the impression that it could be a valuable or a notable item or a magic stone of some kind. When you've carried the stone on your person for 1 minute, its curse activates: the stone's size does not change, but it suddenly increases in weight to 5 Bulk. This additional weight does not cause the stone to deal more damage if thrown or used as a weapon. It reappears in your possessions within 1 minute if you discard it, and can't be destroyed or thrown away permanently, or even placed in a container that would reduce or negate its Bulk (like a bag of holding), until it is subject to a remove curse spell or similar magic effect. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the stone fuses to you.

Stoneraiser Javelin.name: Stoneraiser Javelin
Stoneraiser Javelin.description:
This stone-headed +2 striking returning javelin draws forth the power of the earth itself to strike at enemies.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You hurl the stoneraiser javelin at an unoccupied space within 30 feet.

The javelin's power flows into the ground, which erupts in a 5-foot-radius burst of razor-sharp stalagmites. The stalagmites are 10 feet tall.

Everything on each side of the stalagmites has cover from creatures on the opposite side, and the stalagmites' spaces are difficult terrain. A creature takes [[/r 4d4]] piercing damage for every move action it takes that enters at least one of the affected spaces.

Each 5-foot-by-5-foot section has AC 10, Hardness 14, and 30 Hit Points. It's immune to critical hits and precision damage. A destroyed section can be moved through freely. The stalagmites crumble to dust after 1 minute.

Any creature in the area when the stalagmites appear is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space of its choice; this movement is forced movement. Pushed creatures must attempt a DC 28 Reflex saving throw or take [[/r 4d4]] piercing damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is knocked prone.

Stonethroat Ammunition.name: 石喉弹药 Stonethroat Ammunition
Stonethroat Ammunition.description:
弹药 弓箭、弩矢

启动 1 交互

每发石喉弹药的尖端都有一块不寻常的黄色石头。当被启动的石喉弹药击中目标时，目标必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]豁免：

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 弹药松散地扎入目标的喉咙。在1个回合内，目标在用它的下颚或獠牙进行攻击和运动检定时受到-2状态减值

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.AJx8i8QX35vsG5Q4]{效果：石喉弹药（成功）}

失败 弹药嵌入目标的喉咙深处。目标不能使用它的颚或獠牙攻击（如果它有的话）或活吞Swallow Hole的能力，直到它下一回合结束。

大失败 如同失败，且目标@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1回合。

Storm Arrow.name: 风暴箭 Storm Arrow
Storm Arrow.description:
启动 A 交互

这支箭的箭头是用闪烁着的铜制成的。

当一支启动的风暴箭命中目标，目标会被狂风袭扰并受到能造成 [[/r 3d12]] 电击伤害的闪电矢的打击，另外目标还需要通过一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:25] 的反射豁免。

如果这支箭是由一把具有电击Shock性能符文的武器射出，则豁免DC提升至27，但本次攻击并不会从电击Shock性能符文本身得到好处。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标承受一半的伤害，并不受狂风的影响

失败 目标承受完整的伤害，并受到狂风袭扰，在远程攻击骰中承受-2环境罚值并在飞行速度Speed中承受-10尺环境罚值，持续1轮。

大失败 如失败，但目标承受双倍的伤害。

Storm Chair.name: Storm Chair
Storm Chair.description:
This traveler's chair uses magic and Stasian technology, storing up power in its Stasian coils to arc lightning through your foes and grant brief spurts of flight.

Activate 2 Interact (electricity, evocation, magical)

Frequency Once per hour

Effect You create a ball of electricity around the chair, surrounding it in a damaging aura of electricity and using electromagnetism to briefly levitate. For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take [[/r 2d6 #electricity]] damage each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.uC6KjfiWrTBXYtP8]{Effect: Storm Chair}

Storm Flash.name: 雷闪 Storm Flash
Storm Flash.description:
这把+2高等强击电击细剑有着金色的剑刃，在持握它时，细小的电弧会在护手到剑尖之前闪过。若在开阔天空下将其抽出剑鞘，这把剑会缓慢聚集来雨云。

启动 D 命令, 想象

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt} DC33）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每10分钟一次

触发 一个电击效果的目标为你或目标为离你10尺内的一个生物，或你或离你10尺内的一个生物在一个电击效果的范围内；

效果 尝试将引离电击，用雷闪将其吸收。选择一个符合条件的生物进行保护并骰一次近战攻击骰，与电击效果DC比较。若你成功，被选生物不会因触发效果而受到电击伤害。

Storm Flash (Greater).name: 高等雷闪 Storm Flash (Greater)
Storm Flash (Greater).description:
这把+3高等强击高等电击细剑有着金色的剑刃，在持握它时，细小的电弧会在护手到剑尖之前闪过。若在开阔天空下将其抽出剑鞘，这把剑会缓慢聚集来雨云。

启动 D 命令, 想象

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放8环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt}（DC38）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每10分钟一次

触发 一个电击效果的目标为你或目标为离你10尺内的一个生物，或你或离你10尺内的一个生物在一个电击效果的范围内；

效果 尝试将引离电击，用雷闪将其吸收。选择一个符合条件的生物进行保护并骰一次近战攻击骰，与电击效果DC比较。若你成功，被选生物不会因触发效果而受到电击伤害。

Storm Hammer.name: Storm Hammer
Storm Hammer.description:
Sparks of crackling electricity arc from this +1 magic warhammer, and the head thrums with distant thunder. Any hit with this hammer deals [[/r {1}[electricity]]]{1 extra electricity damage}. You can use a special action while holding the hammer to transform the sparks into lightning bolts.

Electrify A (concentrate) Until the end of your turn, the hammer deals [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 extra electricity damage} instead of just 1. After you use this action, you can't use it again for 10 minutes.

Stormbreaker Fulu.name: 辟风符箓 Stormbreaker Fulu
Stormbreaker Fulu.description:
用法附着至护甲

启动 f 命令

触发 你即将被迫移动、即将被传送、或者即将承受寒冷、电击或音波伤害

这张不起眼的纸上铭刻着魔法符号。当你启动符箓时，它会在一律云气中消失，而你会获得对抗寒冷（cold）、电击（electricity）和音波（sonic）的15点抗力，持续至你的下个回合结束为止。在此期间内，你会忽略由于风和气候造成的困难地形（difficult terrain），而且你不会被强迫移动或传送，除非该效果能够反制符箓（DC 40）。这些保护措施适用于对抗触发效果。

Stormfeather.name: 风暴之羽 Stormfeather
Stormfeather.description:
用法 附着至护甲

启动 1 交互

需求 你在特技上达到专家熟练度

一旦附着成功，这根带电的蓝色羽毛会在空中不停摇摆，就好像总是有微风吹拂一般。当启动时，护符对你施放飞行术（fly），持续1分钟。你可以解消（Dismiss）这个效果，如果你如此做，你会受到@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{羽落术 Feather Fall}影响。

Storyteller's Opus.name: 《说书人的寓言》 Storyteller's Opus
Storyteller's Opus.description:
这本镶金边的绿色魔法书讲述了一个男孩因为谎称“狼来了”最后葬身狼腹的故事。当这本书被打开时，封面上的图案似乎在循环移动，生动地上演着这个故事。

启动 r 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 一个生物不相信（disbelieve）你的幻术，并且在检定得到成功的结果，但未能取得大成功的结果，并且该幻术必须是你从魔典中准备的

效果 你迅速撒了个小谎，试图把你的幻术中的瑕疵圆回去。你对触发生物进行一次欺骗检定，对抗他的察觉DC。如果你成功了，该生物就不会再怀疑你的幻术。

Striking.name: 强击 Striking
Striking.description:
强击符文为武器提供破坏性魔力，将武器伤害骰增加为2个替代初始的1个。例如，+1强击匕首造成2d4点伤害而非1d4。

你可以将武器上已蚀刻的强击符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Striking (Greater).name: 高等强击 Striking (Greater)
Striking (Greater).description:
高等强击符文为武器提供破坏性魔力，将武器伤害骰增加为3个替代初始的1个。例如，+1强击匕首造成2d4点伤害而非1d4。

你可以将武器上已蚀刻的强击符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

将武器伤害骰增加为3个

Striking (Major).name: 上等强击 Striking (Major)
Striking (Major).description:
上等强击符文为武器提供破坏性魔力，将武器伤害骰增加为4个替代初始的1个。例如，+1强击匕首造成2d4点伤害而非1d4。

你可以将武器上已蚀刻的强击符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

将武器伤害骰增加为4个

Striking Snare.name: 打击圈套 Striking Snare
Striking Snare.description: 你将绊绳或其他触发器附着到一组石头或木刺上，以对进入圈套格内的生物进行攻击。生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] 豁免。如果你选择石头，圈套造成9d8点钝击伤害；如果你选择木刺，造成9d8点穿刺伤害。

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶嵌皮甲 Studded Leather Armor
Studded Leather Armor.description: 这种皮甲用金属铆钉加固，有时也用小金属板加固，使皮甲保留大部分的柔韧性的同时得到更有力的保护。

Stunning Snare.name: 震撼圈套 Stunning Snare
Stunning Snare.description:
这个圈套会突然发动猛击以击晕一个生物，令它难以进一步保护自己。这个陷阱对第一个进入方格的生物造成6d6点钝击伤害；该生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] 豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物承受一半的伤害，并陷入持续1轮的措手不及Flat-footed以及震慑Stunned 1

失败 该生物承受完整的伤害，并陷入持续1轮的措手不及Flat-footed以及震慑Stunned 2

大失败 该生物承受两倍伤害，并陷入持续1分钟的措手不及Flat-footed以及震慑Stunned 4

Sturdy Satchel.name: Sturdy Satchel
Sturdy Satchel.description:
This heavy backpack of alchemically treated cloth layered over a metal mesh protects its contents from water damage and other harmful effects.

It holds up to 4 Bulk of items, and the first 2 Bulk contained within the sturdy satchel do not count against your Bulk limits.

The bag has Hardness 5 and 20 Hit Points. As long as the bag remains closed and is not broken, water and other liquids can't seep into it.

Sturdy Shield (Greater).name: 高等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Greater)
Sturdy Shield (Greater).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度15，HP120，BT60。

Sturdy Shield (Lesser).name: 次等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Lesser)
Sturdy Shield (Lesser).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度10，HP80，BT40。

Sturdy Shield (Major).name: 上等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Major)
Sturdy Shield (Major).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度17，HP136，BT68。

Sturdy Shield (Minor).name: 下等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Minor)
Sturdy Shield (Minor).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度8，HP64，BT32。

Sturdy Shield (Moderate).name: 中等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Moderate)
Sturdy Shield (Moderate).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度13，HP104，BT52。

Sturdy Shield (Supreme).name: 超等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Supreme)
Sturdy Shield (Supreme).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度20，HP160，BT80。

Sulfur Bomb (Greater).name: Sulfur Bomb (Greater)
Sulfur Bomb (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals [[/r {3d4}[acid]]]{3d4 acid damage} and [[/r {3}[acid]]]{3 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Sulfur Bomb (Lesser).name: Sulfur Bomb (Lesser)
Sulfur Bomb (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. The bomb deals [[/r {1d4}[acid]]]{1d4 acid damage} and [[/r {1}[acid]]]{1 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Sulfur Bomb (Major).name: Sulfur Bomb (Major)
Sulfur Bomb (Major).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals [[/r {4d4}[acid]]]{4d4 acid damage} and [[/r {4}[acid]]]{4 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Sulfur Bomb (Moderate).name: Sulfur Bomb (Moderate)
Sulfur Bomb (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals [[/r {2d4}[acid]]]{2d4 acid damage} and [[/r {2}[acid]]]{2 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Summoning Handscroll.name: 《召唤手卷》 Summoning Handscroll
Summoning Handscroll.description:
经典的召唤法阵被镌刻在这个巨大的纸莎草卷轴两端的轴杆上。

启动 f 想象(超魔)

频率 每天一次

效果 如果你的下个动作是施放一道魔典中准备的咒法系法术，且该法术可以召唤一个或更多的生物，那么你能将法术能量注入其中一个被召唤的生物体内，让它得到10点临时生命值，持续时间最多1分钟。

Sun Orchid Elixir.name: Sun Orchid Elixir
Sun Orchid Elixir.description:
Activate A Interact

When you drink this elixir, you physically become as you were in whatever phase of your youth you desire. Your new body begins in peak health, regardless of what your actual condition was at that age. Any physical or mental imperfections- including scars, lost limbs, and curses, diseases, poisons of 20th level or lower- are removed, and you regain your full Hit Points. You immediately begin to age normally again, with your natural lifespan extended as if you had never aged past your new apparent age. You retain all your memories.

Unlike Crafting most items, brewing the sun orchid elixir takes 1 month's time. While an individual vial of sun orchid elixir isn't unique, the formula is unique, and it's known only to Artokus Kirran of Thuvia.

Sun Shot.name: Sun Shot
Sun Shot.description: Sun slings use small metal bullets covered in sharp spikes known as sun shots. A bundle of 10 sun shots has light bulk and costs 1 sp.

Sun Sling.name: Sun Sling
Sun Sling.description:
A sun sling is a small staff with a head of woven netting. The staff is small enough to hold in a single hand, making it useful for hit-and-run tactics, but once loaded with ammunition, it requires two hands to properly swing and fire. This is a martial ranged weapon.

Sun slings use small metal bullets covered in sharp spikes known as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DKsfWwWZ23PHPIa1]{Sun Shots}. A bundle of 10 sun shots has light bulk and costs 1 sp.

Sun Wheel.name: Sun Wheel
Sun Wheel.description:
Created by the priests of a Qadiran sect of Sarenites, the sun wheels were designed to protect the Dawnflower's followers in their quest to hunt down a dangerous cult trying to raise a spawn of the evil god Rovagug. Once they completed their crusade, these priests disbanded and went on to minister other congregations. They each took their sun wheels with them, handing them down to the next generations.

This copper medallion is etched with a stylized sun, its rays shaped like the spokes of a wagon wheel. It tends to glint brightly when exposed to sunlight. While wearing this pendant, you gain a +1 item bonus to Religion checks. You must be good-aligned to use the sun wheel's true power: the following activation, which provides you a shield of burning force.

Activate A Concentrate

The sun wheel casts a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield} spell benefiting you.

When you use the spell to prevent damage, you prevent 10 damage instead of 5. If the attacker is adjacent to you, you can choose to deal [[/roll 2d6]] fire damage to it, which it gets a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|traits:consumable,talisman] save to resist.

If you choose to deal the fire damage, you can't Activate the sun wheel again until the next morning. If you prevent damage but don't deal the fire damage, you can use it again in 10 minutes, as normal for shield

Sunken Pistol.name: Sunken Pistol
Sunken Pistol.description:
Perception +12; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

Communication speech (Common) Skills Intimidation +19, Navigation Lore +14, Sailing Lore +14

Int +0, Wis +2, Cha +4

Will +16

A sunken pistol is imbued with the unfulfilled desires and insatiable greed of its previous wielder, a notorious pirate drowned at sea. Once a beautiful and artistically wrought weapon, a sunken pistol is coated in a fine layer of dried salt and encrusted with barnacles. Each shot fired from this +1 striking dragon mouth pistol is now coated in a layer of salty ectoplasm and has the effects of a ghost touch rune. You can shoot the sunken pistol underwater, even when using black powder ammunition.

A sunken pistol urges you to amass a horde of treasure even a dragon would be proud of. The methods used to acquire these riches matter not to the greedy pirate pistol, so long as you amass and hoard excessive wealth. Above all else, a sunken pistol desires the return of its own treasure, which might rest in the wreck of its sunken ship's hold or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} on a dangerous island.

In pursuit of treasure, a sunken pistol offers nautical and navigation advice to you, though it refuses such aid during less lucrative ventures. If you prove a profitable partner, the sunken pistol aids you in combat by Demoralizing your opponents (see the first Activation below). If you prove charitable or unwilling to retrieve its treasure, the sunken pistol turns its ire on you, Demoralizing you during combat until you relent. If you repeatedly refuse the sunken pistol, it would be wise to not accept water breathing from it, as it might attempt to drown you to allow a more suitable wielder to acquire it from your corpse. The sunken pistol can use the following activations.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per minute

Effect The sunken pistol curses and insults a creature it can see, attempting an Intimidation check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} that creature.

Activate 3 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The sunken pistol casts water breathing on you as a 3rd-level arcane spell. The sunken pistol can Dismiss this spell, so be sure to keep the gun happy if you're relying on its good graces to breathe!

Sunrod.name: 日光杖 Sunrod
Sunrod.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

这个1尺长，顶端镶金的短杖会在撞击坚硬表面后发光。在接下来的6个小时里，它会在半径20尺的范围内散发出明亮光线（bright light）（并在范围之外的40尺散发出昏暗光线（dim light））。

Support.name: 支撑物 Support
Support.description: 支撑物，通常也被称为支架，可用于以下任何一个主要关节：手腕、肘部、膝盖和脚踝。它们通常绑在所需的部位周围，不仅提供支持还能提供温暖以舒缓疼痛。即使你不穿戴支撑物，你仍然可以使用你的肢体或关节，但你可能会感到比平时更痛，并可能表现为身体上的症状。

Survey Map.name: 导航地图 Survey Map
Survey Map.description:
导航地图并不常见。您可以使用的大多数地图都很简单且功能齐全。而导航地图则详细列出了具体的位置。

如果检定与得到地图上详细说明的位置相关，一张这样的地图会为您在生存（Survival）检定以及回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）的任何技能检定上提供+1物品加值。

GM有权力决定在任何地点能够提供哪些地图。

Survey Map (Atlas).name: 导航地图(地图集) Survey Map (Atlas)
Survey Map (Atlas).description:
导航地图并不常见。您可以使用的大多数地图都很简单且功能齐全。而导航地图则详细列出了具体的位置。

如果检定与得到地图上详细说明的位置相关，一张这样的地图会为您在生存（Survival）检定以及回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）的任何技能检定上提供+1物品加值。

地图有时会出现在地图集中，其中包含许多相同质量的地图，并且通常是类似的主题。阅读地图集的时间是单张地图的五倍，并且需要双手使用。

GM有权力决定在任何地点能够提供哪些地图。

Swarmeater's Clasp.name: 食虫者胸针 Swarmeater's Clasp
Swarmeater's Clasp.description:
这枚小胸针上雕刻着成群的害虫。当你穿戴胸针时，你获得 10 针点对集群生物的物理抗力。

启动2 交互，操作

频率 每天一次

需求 一个集群生物在你的触及范围内

效果 你将双手伸进集群中，抓出一群蠕动着的害虫，然后将其吞下。你将恢复 [[/r 3d10+8]] 生命值，并对蜂群造成等量的钝击伤害。该恢复效果是正能量治疗效果。

Swarmform Collar.name: 集群形态项圈 Swarmform Collar
Swarmform Collar.description:
这款坚固的皮项圈上印着动物图案。当绑定时，动物的外观会变成你动物伙伴的样子。

启动 2 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你触碰项圈，你的动物伙伴分裂成完全相同的几百只超小型个体组成的集群，持续1分钟。该集群的占据为大型，获得@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.KpxhSWRIhG7ns5NA]{蜘蛛群 Spider Swarm}所拥有的抗力和弱点，并且获得集群特征，但它无法获得母巢思维（swarm mind）能力，并且会被针对单个目标的心灵效果影响。它的非武装攻击被替换为一个单动作的集群攻击，对占据空间内的敌人造成1d8伤害，伤害类型一般和动物伙伴的非武装攻击一致，@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Swarm Attack|showDC:all]豁免。在集群形态下，你的动物伙伴能对你进行支援动作，但无法使用进阶战技。它的其他基本数据不变。如果动物伙伴在集群形态下生命值减少至0，除了要遭受通常生命值减少为0时的效果之外，动物伙伴会立即在一个可用的空间内合体为原来的形态。

Swarmsuit.name: Swarmsuit
Swarmsuit.description: These thick, overlapping layers of clothing are coupled with a matching hat, outfitted with mesh netting around its wide brim to keep you safe from insects. You gain resistance 3 to physical damage from swarms. Explorer's clothing altered in this way has a Dexterity cap of +2, check penalty of -1, and Speed penalty of -5 feet regardless of your Strength.

Swarmsuit (Impenetrable).name: Swarmsuit (Impenetrable)
Swarmsuit (Impenetrable).description: An impenetrable swarmsuit is made of expensive, finely crafted mesh designed to completely prevent swarms from getting inside. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage from swarms. Explorer's clothing altered in this way has a Dexterity cap of +2, check penalty of -1, and Speed penalty of -5 feet regardless of your Strength.

Swift Block Cabochon.name: 疾盾宝石 Swift Block Cabochon
Swift Block Cabochon.description:
用法 附着到一面盾牌

启动 F 想象

触发 你在未举起附着的盾牌时承受了一次物理攻击伤害

这颗透明石英制成的凸圆形宝石附着在盾牌的中央位置。

当你启动这颗宝石，你可以使用盾牌格挡Shield Block反应，即使你未举起附着的盾牌（甚至即使在你正常情况下没有这个反应也能使用）。

Swim Fins.name: Swim Fins
Swim Fins.description: These flippers attach to your feet like tight shoes-donning or removing them requires three Interact actions. While worn, you gain a +5-foot item bonus to the distance you move when rolling Athletics to Swim, not when using a swim Speed, and you take a -10-foot item penalty to your Speed.

Sword Cane.name: 剑杖 Sword Cane
Sword Cane.description: 这支纤细的细剑一半的剑能够藏在一根木制或金属制的手杖形剑鞘中。剑杖是一种十分不起眼的武器，能够轻易突破安检或带入上流社交活动中。剑杖在入鞘状态通常长4尺，其剑柄也常常安置着木制或金属制的装饰。

Sylvan Wineskin.name: Sylvan Wineskin
Sylvan Wineskin.description:
A satyr's wineskin magically enchants any alcohol inside.

With an Interact action, a living creature can imbibe the alcohol and gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects for the following hour. When the wineskin is removed from a satyr's person, the magic remains only until the wine spoils. The wineskin holds up to eight drafts of wine.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ImgHXPEbN1mPyNTu]{Effect: Sylvan Wine}

Tack.name: 鞍子 Tack
Tack.description: 鞍子包括配备骑乘动物所需的所有装备，包括座鞍、嚼头和缰绳，以及必要时的脚镫。特别指出的是大型或奇形怪状的动物可能需要特殊的鞍子。根据GM的裁定，这些可能更昂贵或难以找到。给出的负载值是佩戴时的负载。如果你要携带它，负载增加到2B。

Talisman of the Sphere.name: Talisman of the Sphere
Talisman of the Sphere.description:
This loop of adamantine can be slung on a chain to be worn as a necklace, but must be held to convey its benefits. A creature that can't cast either arcane or occult spells takes 8d6 mental damage just from picking up the item, and they take that damage again at the start of each of their turns if they continue to hold it.

If the wielder can cast arcane or occult spells, they can use the talisman of the sphere to more easily control a sphere of annihilation. This reduces the DC of the check to control the sphere or Sustain the Activation by 10.

Destruction The talisman of the sphere is destroyed if touched by a sphere of annihilation.

Taljjae's Mask (The Beast).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Beast)
Taljjae's Mask (The Beast).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

The Beast brings out its wearer's feral nature, granting it a claw melee unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage and has the agile trait, or increasing the damage die of their claw unarmed attack from 1d4 to 1d6 damage if they have a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 damage.

Taljjae's Mask (The General).name: Taljjae's Mask (The General)
Taljjae's Mask (The General).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

Activate 1

Frequency once per day

Effect The General grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with polearms for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.X2ZZgTqanpoCMDmd]{Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General)}

Tamchal Chakram.name: Tamchal Chakram
Tamchal Chakram.description: These circular weapons are among the many strange weapons used by urdefhans. The sharp metal circle contains numerous protruding blades, while an angled central handle provides a decent grip that spins the weapon as it's thrown.

Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).name: 高等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)
Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).description:
绊足包里装满了黏性物质。你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。当你用绊足包命中一名生物时，目标承受-15尺的减值，逃脱的DC为28。

一旦攻击造成重击，与固体表面接触的目标生物将会被定在表面上并陷入持续1分钟的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，如果是通过翅膀飞行的生物则会被缠住翅膀，导致它安全地落在地上并且1轮内不能再度起飞。绊足包对那些身处水中的生物没有效果。

目标能够通过逃脱（Escaping）或花费3个交互（Interact）动作来小心地移除黏性物质，从而结束绊足包的效果。这些交互动作不必是连续的，其他生物也能提供这些交互动作。

Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).name: 次等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)
Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).description:
绊足包里装满了黏性物质。当你用绊足包命中一名生物时，目标承受-10尺的减值，逃脱（Escape）的DC为17。

一旦攻击造成重击，与固体表面接触的目标生物将会被定在表面上并陷入持续1分钟的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，如果是通过翅膀飞行的生物则会被缠住翅膀，导致它安全地落在地上并且1轮内不能再度起飞。绊足包对那些身处水中的生物没有效果。

Tar Rocket Snare.name: Tar Rocket Snare
Tar Rocket Snare.description:
You coat a small firework with a thick layer of resin and tar, so it sticks firmly onto a target. When a creature enters the square, the rocket launches at the creature and potentially sticks to it. You determine the direction the rocket faces when crafting the snare. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is dealt a glancing blow by the rocket and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of its next turn.

Failure The rocket's coating of tar and resin sticks to the creature, and it can't be shaken loose. The creature becomes flat-footed for 1 round, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 20).

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes a direct hit. It takes [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage} and is pushed 10 feet in the direction the rocket faces.

Taw Launcher.name: Taw Launcher
Taw Launcher.description: Designed by conrasu warriors, this complex device is a crossbow and fires small wooden bullets known as taws. A system of blades within the launcher can rapidly reshape a taw as it's loaded, allowing the launcher to fire taws of different shapes, such as fléchettes.

Tear-Away Clothing.name: Tear-Away Clothing
Tear-Away Clothing.description:
Usage modifies existing clothing.

Performers and criminals are both known to use disposable clothing designed to be torn off the body quickly and easily. This garment is loose enough to be worn over another outfit, including light armor. You can remove tear-away clothing with an Interact action. The price for tear-away clothing is to modify an existing outfit. If purchasing a new outfit, add the tear-away clothing's price to the outfit to modify it as part of the purchase.

Tears of Death.name: 死之泪 Tears of Death
Tears of Death.description:
死之泪是最强大的炼金毒素之一，使用其他五种致命毒素以正确的比例蒸馏而成。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:46]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 10 分钟

阶段 1 [[/r {18d6}[poison]]]{18d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {25d6}[poison]]]{25d6 毒素伤害} 和 麻痹paralyzed (1 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {30d6}[poison]]]{30d6 毒素伤害} 和 麻痹paralyzed (1 分钟)

Tekko-kagi.name: Tekko-kagi
Tekko-kagi.description: Four curved blades attached to a sturdy handlebar give the wielder of this close-combat weapon the illusion of having claws that extend from their fist. Adherents of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.zRmAXj7FSlrMfDeA]{Bastet } favor the tekko-kagi for catching their foes off guard.

Temple Sword.name: 仪剑 Temple Sword
Temple Sword.description: 这把沉重的剑受到宗教场所护卫的偏爱。它有着独特的新月形刀刃，似乎是镰刀和剑的混合体。通常会在剑刃或剑柄上钻孔，以便将铃铛或其他神圣的物品附着在武器上，以帮助祈祷或仲裁。

Ten-Foot Pole.name: 十尺长杆 Ten-Foot Pole
Ten-Foot Pole.description: 挥动这个长杆时，你可以使用【搜寻（Seek）】来搜索10尺内的一个方格。长杆不够坚固，无法被用作武器。

Tengu Gale Blade.name: 天狗风刃 Tengu Gale Blade
Tengu Gale Blade.description: 这种如风扇一般的剑是为天狗族裔设计的，包含了五把剑柄互相连接的宽刃。天狗水手也会将风刃当成风向标的替代品来使用，只要将风刃轻轻地在高处悬挂，就可以得知目前的风向。

Terrifying Ammunition.name: 骇人弹药 Terrifying Ammunition
Terrifying Ammunition.description:
启动 1 交互

这种黑灰色的弹药上面雕刻着神秘学的记号以及狞笑着的微小头骨。当启动的骇人弹药伤害了一个生物，它能将失败、悲剧、以及最终的死亡填满该生物的大脑。该生物必须进行一次@Check[type:will|dc:20]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物陷入惊惧1

失败 生物陷入惊惧1且无法降低惊惧的数值，除非其花费一个动作以安抚自己的情绪，该动作具有专注特征

大失败 如失败，但生物陷入惊惧2

Thieves' Tools.name: 盗贼工具包 Thieves' Tools
Thieves' Tools.description:
你需要盗贼工具包来使用贼活技能开锁锁或解除某些类型的装置。

如果你的盗贼工具损坏了，你可以用换上新的适合你工具的 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sw7MBLASN3xK4Y44]{开锁器 Replacement Picks}的方式来修理它们。这不需要使用修复操作。

Thieves' Tools (Concealable Picks).name: 盗贼工具包(隐蔽替换品) Thieves' Tools (Concealable Picks)
Thieves' Tools (Concealable Picks).description: 这是一些 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ejmv9IHGp9Ad9dgu]{盗贼工具包(隐蔽) Thieves' Tools (Concealable)}的替换品。

Thieves' Tools (Concealable).name: 盗贼工具包(隐蔽) Thieves' Tools (Concealable)
Thieves' Tools (Concealable).description:
你需要盗贼工具包来使用贼活技能开锁锁或解除某些类型的装置。 专家级盗贼工具包提供你在开锁(Pick Locks)和解除装置(Disable Devices)的检定+1物品加值。

小巧的结构和结实的材料使得这套盗贼工具包更容易贴身携带而不被发现。你使用隐藏物件(Conceal an Object)隐藏这套盗贼工具包时获得+1物品加值

如果你的盗贼工具损坏了，你可以用换上新的适合你工具的 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TxMFNfkoccirCitP]{开锁器 Replacement Picks}的方式来修理它们。这不需要使用修复操作。

Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks).name: 盗贼工具包(专家替换品)Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks)
Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks).description: 这是一些 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6nrCxNQFycUVFOV2]{盗贼工具包(专家) Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator)}的替换品。

Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator).name: 盗贼工具包(专家) Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator)
Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator).description:
你需要盗贼工具包来使用贼活技能开锁锁或解除某些类型的装置。 专家级盗贼工具包提供你在开锁(Pick Locks)和解除装置(Disable Devices)的检定+1物品加值。

Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks).name: 盗贼工具包(替换品) Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks)
Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks).description: 这是一些 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]{盗贼工具包 Thieves' Tools}的替换备件。

Third Eye.name: 第三只眼 Third Eye
Third Eye.description:
绑定后，这顶华丽的冠冕以及上面闪耀的宝石会融入你的头内，变成纹身的模样。这为你提供超凡的视力，并允许你阅读灵光。当你绑定第三只眼时，只有你可以操作它。你强化后的感官以及能够感知到情感灵光的能力为你在察觉Perception检定上提供+3物品加值。

你持续性地观察到魔法灵光，如果一个9环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic} ，除了你能看到30尺内的所有灵光的位置，而并非只有最强的灵光。如果你使用一个搜索Seek动作来研究一个你可以看到的生物，你可以观察到表现了那个生物健康状态的灵光，包含了它身上的所有状态Condition和苦难Affliction，以及他残留生命值的百分比。

启动 D 想象, 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 你得到8环法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing}的效果。

Thousand-Blade Thesis.name: 千刃兵书 Thousand-Blade Thesis
Thousand-Blade Thesis.description:
这捆裱装在柔韧竹桶上的宣纸卷轴包含了大量关于战争艺术的书法散文和绘画，其中尤其着重描述了各类武器在战争中的使用，以及如何在战术层面用不同武器武装士兵以获得最大的优势。查阅兵书能让你在战争学识（Warfare Lore）检定上获得+2物品加值。和大部分学术期刊（scholarly compendiums）一样，这种用法要求单手持握兵书。

兵书同样能作为一个异次元的武备库和弹药库使用。该兵书拥有5B容积，但只能储存武器或弹药。你和其他人能以一个交互动作向兵书中存放或从兵书中取出武器或弹药，就如同其他容器一样。

启动 1 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 千刃兵书引人注目地在空中展开，里面的武器全部弹射出来，令人印象深刻地一字排开，并悬浮于你触手可及的地方。在1分钟之内，你能以一个自由动作拔取其中一把悬浮的武器。其他人也可以尝试抢夺它们，但要做到这一点，他们必须在缴械（Disarm）检定中得到大成功的结果。在1分钟时间结束前，你无法将武器放回兵书里。

Three Peaked Tree.name: Three Peaked Tree
Three Peaked Tree.description: A recently developed weapon created for an elven champion from Jinin, the three-peaked tree can be used as both a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Trident} and a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qRqGIxcadjjxcij3]{Mithral Tree}. A three-peaked tree has a length of silken rope attached to the butt of its haft, allowing it to be quickly retrieved after thrown.

Thresholds of Truth.name: Thresholds of Truth
Thresholds of Truth.description:
Zarmavdian's spellbook, Thresholds of Truth, was once a straightforward treatise on arcane and occult lore containing several useful spells. It's been so heavily annotated, however, that the original text is hard to read. It's clear that Zarmavdian wanted to prevent eldritch creatures from manipulating innocent minds, but his spellbook is a treasure trove for those seeking dangerous or inscrutable lore. The bookseller Morlibint currently keeps this book in his collection at Odd Stories.

Thrice-Fried Mudwings.name: 三煎泥翼 Thrice-Fried Mudwings
Thrice-Fried Mudwings.description:
启动 1 交互

煎泥翼——在枯败的沼泽中发现的魔法带翼生物的遗骸——需要一种微妙的平衡。如果烹饪时间过长，菜品就会失去效力，但如果煎得时间太短，毒素就会伤到食客。当你吃下一份完美烹饪的餐前小吃时，你的背后会长出两对泥翼，赋予你30尺或等同于你陆地速度的飞行速度，二者以较低的为准，持续10分钟。

启动 r 交互

触发 你即将受到物理攻击伤害

效果 你用其中一对泥翼阻挡攻击。这能让你针对触发的物理攻击获得15点物理伤害抗力，在此过程中这对泥翼会被摧毁。当你第一次启动时，你的飞行速度变为15尺，或陆地速度的一半，二者以较低的为准。当你第二次启动时，泥翼将完全粉碎，效果结束。

Throwing Knife.name: 投掷小刀 Throwing Knife
Throwing Knife.description: 这把轻巧的小刀在平衡设计上可以比普通匕首准确地投掷到更远的地方。虽然代价是损失了切砍用的刀刃，但对于投掷专家来说，这种差异是值得的。

Throwing Knife (Extinction Curse).name: Throwing Knife (Extinction Curse)
Throwing Knife (Extinction Curse).description: This light knife is optimally balanced to be thrown accurately at a greater distance than a common dagger. While this comes at the cost of a significant cutting edge, the difference is worth it for characters focused on thrown weapons.

Thunder Sling.name: Thunder Sling
Thunder Sling.description: Tengu use these specialized slings to fire darts further and with greater force than when thrown by hand, which is particularly effective when attacking from great heights. A thunder sling uses darts as ammunition. It can also hurl blowgun darts as ammunition but deals 1d4 piercing damage instead of 1d6 when used this way.

Thunder Snare.name: Thunder Snare
Thunder Snare.description:
The snare makes a thunderous noise when a creature enters the snare's square, which can be heard up to 1,000 feet away. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is deafened until the end of its next turn.

Failure As success, and the target also takes 1 sonic damage.

Critical Failure As success, and the target also takes 1d4 sonic damage.

Craft Requirements 1 lesser thunderstone

Thunderbird Tuft (Greater).name: 高等雷鸟羽簇 Thunderbird Tuft (Greater)
Thunderbird Tuft (Greater).description:
启动 施放法术(增加一个动作)

这块琥珀中凝结着一簇灰色的羽毛，它会发出电流，让长时间拿着琥珀的人产生一种奇怪的紧张感。当以此触媒强化@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{电爪 Shocking Grasp}法术时，雷鸟羽簇能以一种防御性的灵气（nimbus）将电能传导回施法者体内。在1分钟内，如果一个生物触碰你、以非武装攻击命中你、或以不带长触及特征的近战武器命中你，都会受到[[/r {2d4}[electricity]]]{2d4电击伤害}（当该生物使用金属武器时则受到[[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 电击伤害}）。

Thundering.name: 雷鸣 Thundering
Thundering.description: 该武器命中时爆发出雷鸣之声，成功的打击会造成额外1d6点音波伤害。若重击，目标必须通过 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] 豁免检定，否则耳聋1分钟（大失败则为1小时）。

Thundering (Greater).name: 高等雷鸣 Thundering (Greater)
Thundering (Greater).description: 该武器命中时爆发出雷鸣之声，成功的打击会造成额外1d6点音波伤害。若重击，目标必须通过 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] 豁免检定，否则永久耳聋。该武器造成的音波伤害忽视音波抗力。

Thundermace.name: 雷霆锤 Thundermace
Thundermace.description: 这种貌不惊人的危险武器本质上是一种具有较长锤柄和较大的、通常带有凸缘的头部的硬头锤。

Thunderstone (Greater).name: 高等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Greater)
Thunderstone (Greater).description:
当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Greater Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}。

你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。暴雷石造成3d4点音波伤害和3点音波溅射伤害。

Thunderstone (Lesser).name: 次等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Lesser)
Thunderstone (Lesser).description:

暴雷石造成1d4点音波伤害和1点音波溅射伤害

Thunderstone (Major).description:
当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。 在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须在一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36|name:Major Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 。

你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。暴雷石造成4d4点音波伤害和4点音波溅射伤害。

Thunderstone (Moderate).name: 中等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Moderate)
Thunderstone (Moderate).description:
当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须在一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|name:Moderate Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 。

你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。暴雷石造成2d4点音波伤害和2点音波溅射伤害。

Thurible of Revelation (Greater).name: 高等揭示香炉 Thurible of Revelation (Greater)
Thurible of Revelation (Greater).description:
这只铜炉被挂在一根链子上。大部分启示香炉都饰有旋转着的天界语文字，不过仍有一些地狱语或深渊语版本的铁制香炉存在。

启动 D 交互

消耗 价值至少5gp的熏香

效果 你点燃香炉中的熏香，它能够燃烧1小时。在这段时间内，只要你持握着香炉，你在宗教检定上就可获得+3物品加值，并且当你在用解读文书理解宗教内容时投出的大失败都改为失败。

每日一次，当你启动香炉时，你能够增强它的揭示效果。在启动期间，你能够以一个交互动作将香炉举到你的眼前，透过香炉中升起的烟雾，你在一轮之中获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐形 See Invisibility} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing} 的效果。

Tidal Fishhook.name: Tidal Fishhook
Tidal Fishhook.description:
This +2 greater striking returning @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.3T3ayvgw9HDn05Mz]{Combat Grapnel} takes the form of a fishhook made of scavenged bones and stone with a cord of braided water. Attacks with a tidal fishhook don't take any of the normal penalties for fighting underwater. A broken (but not destroyed) tidal fishhook can be fully repaired by submerging it in an ocean for 1 minute.

Activation 2 Interact (teleportation, water)

Frequency once per hour

Effect A tidal fishhook can travel between bodies of water to strike distant foes. You throw the fishhook into a 5-foot square that's fully covered with water, and it emerges to Strike or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a target from another such square within 60 feet; the squares can be part of the same body of water or different ones. The distance between the bodies of water doesn't count toward the fishhook's range increment. If you successfully Grapple the target as part of this Strike, you can pull yourself along the fishhook's line, teleporting to the secondary body of water.

Tiger Menuki.name: 虎目贯 Tiger Menuki
Tiger Menuki.description:
用法 附着到一件武器

启动 F 想象

触发 你使用附着的武器进行一次打击

这只白锡老虎在你武器的握把上凶狠地低吼。当你启动这只老虎，附着的武器在触发的攻击以及1分钟内的所有其他攻击上都获得横扫特征。

Time Shield Potion.name: 时间护盾药水 Time Shield Potion
Time Shield Potion.description:
启动 1 交互

这种紫色的药水有点苦，而且随着运动似乎变得有点朦胧。当你喝下了一瓶时间护盾药水，你的时间会在在[[/r 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4轮}内冻结。你无法行动，也不会被选为目标，你免疫任何效果，而且你从你的位置上消失了；站在宇宙的视角来看，在这段时间内你就不存在了。你身上的任何具有持续时间的效果也会在这段时间内暂停。

一旦药水的持续时间结束，你回到正常的时间流中，也回到了原来的位置上；如果该空间被占据了，你会被转移到最近的未被占据的空间中。具有持续时间的效果会立刻继续影响你，就像时间没有流逝过一样。如果你在回归时位于某个新创建的效果区域内，你也会立刻受到该效果的影响。GM可以决定当你在时间流外时还发生了什么可能会在你回归时影响你的变化（例如你脚下的地面崩溃了）。

Timeless Salts.name: 永存盐 Timeless Salts
Timeless Salts.description:
启动 1 交互

你将这些盐撒在最大体积为10立方尺的单一物体上，且物体负载不能超过40B，以将其保存1周的时间。该物体不会腐败，需要该物体保持新鲜才能生效的效果也不会消耗持续时间。当撒在尸体上时，这能够延长尸体能够被魔法复活的时间，也能够延长尸体能够被再次施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{死者交谈 Talking Corpse}法术之前的等待时间。永存盐也能阻止原生害兽消化目标物体（例如吃尸体的蛆或吃衣服布料的蛾）。任何生物都可以使用一个交互动作来抹去无主物体上的盐并终止其效果。

Timepiece (Desktop Clock).name: Timepiece (Desktop Clock)
Timepiece (Desktop Clock).description:
Clockwork timepieces come in a variety of sizes and aesthetic styles, but they're all designed to display the accurate time of day down to the second.

Clockwork timepieces have a 24-hour activation cycle, after which they must wound in a process that takes 1 minute to complete.

Desktop clocks have been designed to be small enough to only take up a quarter of a typical writing desk's surface area, but they're still too bulky and heavy to be lugged around casually.

Timepiece (Grand Clock).name: Timepiece (Grand Clock)
Timepiece (Grand Clock).description:
Clockwork timepieces come in a variety of sizes and aesthetic styles, but they're all designed to display the accurate time of day down to the second.

Clockwork timepieces have a 24-hour activation cycle, after which they must wound in a process that takes 1 minute to complete.

These towering, ten-foot-tall clocks have been painstakingly handcrafted by skilled artisans and feature loud chimes that can be heard hourly throughout a manor. Owners of grand clocks usually tend to display them prominently in a study, lounge area, or foyer.

Tin Cobra.name: Tin Cobra
Tin Cobra.description:
This clockwork cobra activates when a creature enters its square, at which point it lashes out and spits venom, dealing [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6 poison damage}. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|traits:poison] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2.

Tindertwig.name: 火柴 Tindertwig
Tindertwig.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

一种撞击粗糙表面时便会燃烧的炼金物质包裹在这根细小木棍一端。用火柴生火远比使用燧石和铁片要快得多。你能够点燃火柴，并作为同一个交互动作的一部分用燃烧的火柴接触一堆易燃物。

Titan's Grasp.name: 泰坦之握 Titan's Grasp
Titan's Grasp.description:
这双青铜手套（gauntlets）的手腕上镶嵌有一颗小红宝石。你的运动检定获得+3物品加值，并且你通过运动检定进行擒抱（Grapple）动作时获得+1环境加值。如果你成功擒抱了一个体型至少比你大一级的敌人，手套会嵌进敌人的身体里，造成等同于你力量调整值的钝击伤害，如果大成功还能额外造成[[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害}。

当你绑定手套时，你可以将你的力量属性提升2点，或提升至18，二者以较高的结果为准。

启动 1 交互(音波)

频率 每天一次

需求 你有两只空闲的手

效果 你双手拍掌，发出雷鸣般的响声，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的所有生物造成[[/r {6d10}[sonic]]]{6d10音波伤害}。该区域内所有生物都必须尝试1次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Titan's Grasp Sonic Clap|traits:sonic|showDC:all]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物受到一半伤害

失败 生物受到完整伤害并且@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1轮

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害，耳聋1分钟，并且陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}

Tlil Mask.name: Tlil Mask
Tlil Mask.description:
Colorful, beaded tlil masks are most commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your vision up to 60 feet sees through small amounts of living plant matter as though it were transparent. While this effect is active, creatures can't be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you due to living plants, such as small trees, vines, and grass. This also prevents them from Hiding or Sneaking past you using only living plants for concealment or cover. Other than the inability to use the cover to Hide or Sneak, this ability doesn't prevent plants from providing cover to creatures or blocking line of effect. It also doesn't allow you to see through dead plant matter, such as the wooden walls of a building, or thick plant matter, such as the walls of a dungeon built entirely inside an enormous living tree.

The effect lasts for 1 minute.

Tlil Mask (Greater).name: Tlil Mask (Greater)
Tlil Mask (Greater).description:
Colorful, beaded till masks are most commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your vision up to 60 feet sees through small amounts of living plant matter as though it were transparent. While this effect is active, creatures can't be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you due to living plants, such as small trees, vines, and grass. This also prevents them from Hiding or Sneaking past you using only living plants for concealment or cover. Other than the inability to use the cover to Hide or Sneak, this ability doesn't prevent plants from providing cover to creatures or blocking line of effect. It also doesn't allow you to see through dead plant matter, such as the wooden walls of a building, or thick plant matter, such as the walls of a dungeon built entirely inside an enormous living tree.

The effect lasts for 10 minutes.

Toad Tears.name: Toad Tears
Toad Tears.description:
Toad tears can be mixed with any other foodstuff or drink, but the poison can also be ingested as is. The process of refining giant toad poison lessens its deadly qualities, and as a result, toad tears are rarely directly fatal. Yet those who are exposed to toad tears often lose control of their actions, making it a dangerous poison nevertheless.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Onset 5 minutes

Maximum Duration 30 minutes

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (10 minutes)

Stage 2 stupefied 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 minute)

Toadskin Salve.name: Toadskin Salve
Toadskin Salve.description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 10 minutes, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d4.success].

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 3 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Toadskin Salve (Greater).name: Toadskin Salve (Greater)
Toadskin Salve (Greater).description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 10 minutes, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison2d4.success].

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 5 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Toadskin Salve (Major).name: Toadskin Salve (Major)
Toadskin Salve (Major).description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 1 hour, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison3d4.success].

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 8 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Tonfa.name: 拐 Tonfa
Tonfa.description: 这些L形的战斗棍棒适合于打击和格挡。持用者握住手柄，旋转棍子或用棍子复盖前臂进行打击。

Tool (Long).name: 工具(长) Tool (Long)
Tool (Long).description: 不是为冒险而设计的一般工具。锄头、铲子或大锤属于长工具，手钻、冰钩或抹子属于短工具。工具通常可被用作临时武器，短工具造成1d4伤害，长工具造成1d6伤害。由GM来决定合适的伤害类型并在需要的时候调整伤害。

Tool (Short).name: 工具(短) Tool (Short)
Tool (Short).description: 不是为冒险而设计的一般工具。锄头、铲子或大锤属于长工具，手钻、冰钩或抹子属于短工具。工具通常可被用作临时武器，短工具造成1d4伤害，长工具造成1d6伤害。由GM来决定合适的伤害类型并在需要的时候调整伤害。

Topology Protoplasm.name: 拓扑原生质 Topology Protoplasm
Topology Protoplasm.description:
启动 1 交互

这种黏糊糊的凝胶一碰就会蠕动，仿佛被许多难以察觉的纤毛复盖着。如果将其涂抹于一个尺寸不超过7尺的生物或物品表面，原生质就会将它转变成一种类似泥怪的形态，持续1分钟，受影响的个体可以被无害地被挤压或延展。在这种状态下的生物如果尝试挤入空间（Squeeze），其检定结果能提高一个成功度级别，并且可以在挤入空间的过程中以全速移动，而该状态下的物品可以挤过一道2尺宽的缝隙。一瓶原生质足够涂抹体型不超过大型的生物或物体，但是由于每瓶原生质都是用特定的软泥制成的，多瓶原生质无法作用于体型更大的生物或物体，因为这种凝胶会彼此抵消。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.vZPyQAt5T2L0Dfmq]{效果：拓扑原生质}

Torag's Silver Anvil.name: Torag's Silver Anvil
Torag's Silver Anvil.description:
This portable silver anvil has a narrow hoop on one end, through which a long, sturdy chain has been strung. Torag's Silver Anvil can be wielded as a +3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RSZwUlCzUX7Nb4UA]{Greater Flaming} greater striking silver meteor hammer.

Outside of combat, the anvil can be used with a hammer as an incredibly effective portable forge, heating up the metal to be forged without a furnace and granting a +3 item bonus to Crafting checks involving metalworking.

When you use the anvil to successfully Repair a metal item, the item recovers an additional 10 Hit Points (or an additional 20 on a critical success).

Torch.name: 火把 Torch
Torch.description: 火把在20尺半径范围内散发出明亮的光芒（昏暗的光线照射到接下来的20尺）。它可以被用作临时武器，造成1d4钝击伤害加1点火焰伤害。

Torrent Snare.name: Torrent Snare
Torrent Snare.description:
You pile waterlogged plants or access a nearby source of water to rain down on a Medium or smaller creature that enters the snare's square. When a creature enters the square, the snare's square and all adjacent squares become slippery difficult terrain, and the triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19] saving throw, with the following effects.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target falls prone.

Critical Failure The target falls prone and is forced into one of the other squares soaked by the snare.

Tower Shield.name: 塔盾 Tower Shield
Tower Shield.description:
这种巨大的盾牌几乎可以复盖整个身体。由于尺寸因素，通常用金属加固的木材制成。

硬度 HP BT
5 20 10

Toy Carriage.name: Toy Carriage
Toy Carriage.description:
A miniature toy carriage is carved from wood and has fully functioning wheels. It can vary in size from 2 to 8 inches long, too small for even Tiny creatures to ride. If pushed or propelled, obstacles and terrain might slow, stop, tip, or divert the carriage's course.

If pushed and released as an Interact action, a toy carriage rolls along the ground up to 20 feet.

Toy Carriage (Windup).name: Toy Carriage (Windup)
Toy Carriage (Windup).description:
A miniature toy carriage is carved from wood and has fully functioning wheels. It can vary in size from 2 to 8 inches long, too small for even Tiny creatures to ride. If pushed or propelled, obstacles and terrain might slow, stop, tip, or divert the carriage's course.

A tiny crank protrudes from the side of this carriage. If the crank is wound and the carriage is released on the ground, the carriage propels in a straight line at a Speed of 10 feet. Each Interact action spent winding the crank propels the carriage for 1 round. A windup toy carriage can be wound for a maximum of 9 actions total, at which point it's too tight to wind further.

Tracker's Goggles.name: 追踪护目镜 Tracker's Goggles
Tracker's Goggles.description:
这对森绿色的目镜被装在用麻绳简单绑住的粗糙皮带上。

穿戴护目镜时，你在用来辨别方向Sense Direction以及追踪Track的生存Survival检定上获得+1加值。

如果你的一次追踪Track检定失败，你只需要等30分钟就可以重新尝试，而非1个小时。

Tracker's Goggles (Greater).name: 高等追踪护目镜 Tracker's Goggles (Greater)
Tracker's Goggles (Greater).description:
这对森绿色的目镜被装在用麻绳简单绑住的粗糙皮带上。

穿戴护目镜时，你在用来辨别方向Sense Direction以及追踪Track的生存Survival检定上获得+2加值。

如果你的一次追踪Track检定失败，你只需要等15分钟就可以重新尝试，而非1个小时。

Tracking Fulu.name: 追踪符箓 Tracking Fulu
Tracking Fulu.description:
用法 附着至生物或物体

启动 f 想象

刺客和间谍经常暗中使用这种符箓，这种成对符箓在制作时会贴在一起，但很容易就可以将两者分开。在启动成对的符箓之前，首先要将其中一张符箓贴在目标身上。在启动符箓后，未被贴上的符箓会向着贴在目标上的符箓以每轮30尺的速度移动，追踪至多1小时，且它距离成对的符箓越近扑动的频率就会越快。未贴上的符箓总是会沿着直线向着贴上的符箓移动；它无法用于破解迷宫，也不能在蜿蜒的路径中找到前路。

Transposition Ammunition.name: 移位弹药 Transposition Ammunition
Transposition Ammunition.description:
弹药 任意

启动 2 交互

移位弹药外观呈乳白色，有时候会微妙地改变它被摆放的位置。当你启动弹药时，不是用它对敌人进行打击，而是对你武器第一个射程增量范围内的某个你能看见且未被占据方格的发射，并且不需要进行攻击骰就能自动成功。当你射出移位弹药时，你拉着你自己穿过星界，带着你所持有的所有物品被传送至目标方格。如果你打算携带任何其他生物（即便是在异次元空间中的生物），则启动将会失败。

Transposition Ammunition (Greater).name: 高等移位弹药 Transposition Ammunition (Greater)
Transposition Ammunition (Greater).description:
Ammunition any

启动 2 交互

移位弹药外观呈乳白色，有时候会微妙地改变它被摆放的位置。当你启动弹药时，不是用它对敌人进行打击，而是对你武器第一个射程增量范围内的某个你能看见且未被占据方格的发射，并且不需要进行攻击骰就能自动成功。当你射出移位弹药时，你拉着你自己穿过星界，带着你所持有的所有物品被传送至目标方格。当你传送时，你能携带最多两个自愿的相邻生物。这些生物必须出现在目标方格相邻的违背占据的空间内；如果没有足够的空间容纳两人，你可以选择哪一个生物被传送。

Traveler's Any-Tool.name: 旅者万用工具 Traveler's Any-Tool
Traveler's Any-Tool.description:
在启动之前，这玩意看起来就是一根两头包铁的烧火棍。

启动 D 交互, 想象

效果 万用工具变成了一件你所想象的特定的简易工具。（通常来说你可以从第六章的工具表中进行选择）。棍子的木头部分会变成工具的柄和握把，金属部分变成铲子、锤头或是别的类似的玩意。它能变成绝大多数的基本工具，但是无法变出任何更复杂的玩意。你可以通过一个交互动作将工具变回原来的棍子。

Traveler's Chair.name: 旅行用椅 Traveler's Chair
Traveler's Chair.description: 这种轮椅是为频繁的冒险和旅行而准备的。设计时尚，能提供出色的舒适性和支持。旅行用椅上装载着小机关，是由相互卡榫的木片、发条或其他装置制成的，使椅子能够在不造成任何额外困难的情况下爬楼梯（上楼仍然视为困难地形，就像对其他角色一样），并在其他常见的冒险地形，如梯子和不平坦的地面上正常移动。

Tri-bladed Katar.name: 三尖拳刃 Tri-bladed Katar
Tri-bladed Katar.description: 这种拳刃类似于标准的拳刃，除了一对刀片可以从中间的刀片伸展出来，将武器变成一个扇形，很适合捕捉敌人的武器。

Tricky Pick.name: Tricky Pick
Tricky Pick.description: This ingenious kobold pick conceals several hidden traps, which the wielder can activate to trick and befuddle foes with a variety of damaging blades and bludgeoning surfaces.

Trident.name: 三叉戟 Trident
Trident.description: 这种三股矛状的武器，通常有4英尺长的柄。像矛一样，它可以单手持用也可以用来投掷。

Trinity Geode.name: 三一晶洞 Trinity Geode
Trinity Geode.description:
这个小型的晶洞被分成了三个大小相同内室。通过启动此物品所施放的法术，法术DC为17。

  • 护甲 如果你通过启动晶洞的方式施放土特征的法术，直到你的下回合结束之前，你获得1点物理抗力（除了精金），如果该法术不是戏法，抗力翻倍
  • 武器 如果你通过启动晶洞的方式施放土特征的法术，直到你的下回合结束之前，你以此武器进行的打击能造成额外1d4钝击伤害

启动 施放法术

效果 你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{堆石术 Scatter Scree}。

Trinity Geode (Greater).name: 高等三一晶洞 Trinity Geode (Greater)
Trinity Geode (Greater).description:
这个小型的晶洞被分成了三个大小相同内室。通过启动此物品所施放的法术，法术DC为24。

  • 护甲 如果你通过启动晶洞的方式施放土特征的法术，直到你的下回合结束之前，你获得3点物理抗力（除了精金），如果该法术不是戏法，抗力翻倍
  • 武器 如果你通过启动晶洞的方式施放土特征的法术，直到你的下回合结束之前，你以此武器进行的打击能造成额外1d6钝击伤害

启动 施放法术

效果 你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{堆石术 Scatter Scree}。

启动 施放法术

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{融身入石 Meld into Stone}。

Trinity Geode (Major).name: 上等三一晶洞 Trinity Geode (Major)
Trinity Geode (Major).description:
这个小型的晶洞被分成了三个大小相同内室。通过启动此物品所施放的法术，法术DC为29。

  • 护甲 如果你通过启动晶洞的方式施放土特征的法术，直到你的下回合结束之前，你获得5点物理抗力（除了精金），如果该法术不是戏法，抗力翻倍
  • 武器 如果你通过启动晶洞的方式施放土特征的法术，直到你的下回合结束之前，你以此武器进行的打击能造成额外1d8钝击伤害

启动 施放法术

效果 你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{堆石术 Scatter Scree}。

启动 施放法术

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放4环级@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{融身入石 Meld into Stone}。

启动 施放法术

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3xD8DYrr8YDVYGg7]{刺石术 Spike Stones}。

Trip Snare.name: 绊足圈套 Trip Snare
Trip Snare.description:
你设置一根巧妙的钢丝以摔绊一个生物。一个进入方格的中型或更小的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] 豁免。

如果你想要创造一个能够摔绊更大生物的绊足圈套，你必须创造一组连续的圈套，其总长度等于该生物占据方格的边长，而且该生物必须完全进入整个圈套。例如，15尺长的三个绊足圈套可以摔绊从走廊经过圈套线上的第一个巨型Huge生物。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物陷入措手不及Flat-footed，直到它的下一个回合开始

失败 该生物倒地Prone

大失败 该生物倒地Prone并受到1d6点钝击伤害

Tripod.name: 枪架 Tripod
Tripod.description: 枪架是为带有反冲（kickback）特征的武器设计的，通过这种方法能让力量不足的枪手通过牺牲机动性来保障在更高精度下使用这种威力更强的武器。通过花费一个单独的交互动作，凭借一只空着的手，它就能被装配到火器上，并展开架设在你所在的方格内。当枪架展开时，即便你的力量不足以抵消反冲武器的减值，你也不会受到-2减值。然而，你必须以一个单独的交互动作收起枪架，才能将火器移动到另外一个不同的位置。在通常情况下，当你@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}时，除了@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}、@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}或快步（Step）动作之外，你进行任何其他动作都会导致你变得可见（observed）。但是，只要你在生物看不到的地方以交互动作部署或收起枪架，这并不会让导致你变得可见（observed）。

Triton's Conch.name: 海神螺 Triton's Conch
Triton's Conch.description:
如果你将这只巨大的、变幻色彩的海螺壳放在耳朵旁，你便能听见大海的怒涛撞击在海岸上的声音。

启动 A 交互 (听觉)

效果 你将海螺举到嘴边往里吹气，发出一阵悠长的隆隆声。在接下来一分钟内，你和启动海螺时距你30尺内的所有盟友在游泳的运动检定中获得+2物品加值，并且可以在水下呼吸。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.9PASRixhNM0ogqmG]{效果：海神螺}

True Name Amulet (Greater).name: 高等真名护符 True Name Amulet (Greater)
True Name Amulet (Greater).description:
这枚护符上带有一个等级不高于物品等级的生物的真名。这些护符通常由黄金雕刻而成，但也可以使用任何东西制作，包括简单的黏土。这个名字是清晰可见的，然而这只针对于你，并且仅在你绑定了这枚护符的时候。

如果你能阅读写出这个名字的语言，该生物总是在对抗你的法术时承受唤用真名的效果（法术环级等同于物品等级的一半，向上取整）。此外，当该生物对你使用任何魔法效果时，你可以立刻尝试使用奥法、自然、神秘、或宗教作为反制检定来进行反制，并且以真名护符的等级来确定反制等级。也许还存在着带有生物等级21+的生物真名的传奇护符。

True Name Amulet (Lesser).description:

Truesight Potion.name: 真视药水 Truesight Potion
Truesight Potion.description: 喝下这瓶清澈干净的药水后，你可以看到事物真实的模样。你获得7环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing} 的效果，反制值为 [[/r 1d20+25]]。

Truth Potion.name: 真实药水 Truth Potion
Truth Potion.description:
喝下这瓶辛辣药水后的10分钟内，你不能故意说谎，并可能被强制说出事实。在喝下药水的时候，尝试一次 @Check[type:will|dc:19] 豁免。你可以自愿达成失败或者大失败。

成功 药水不对你产生影响

失败 当你说话时，你必须说实话

大失败 如同失败，但一旦有人询问你一个问题，你必须进行一次 @Check[type:will|dc:19] 豁免。如果你豁免失败，只要你能，你必须如实回答问题；如果豁免成功，你在药水持续时间内能暂时免疫相同的问题。

Twilight Lantern (Greater).name: Twilight Lantern (Greater)
Twilight Lantern (Greater).description:
This elegant hooded lantern is made from onyx-black metal. In dim light, flecks of white metal speckled within the lantern's housing resemble stars in a night sky. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You concentrate on the lantern's light and reduce or increase its radius. The light can have a minimum radius of 5 feet and a maximum radius equal to triple the light's standard radius.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a beam of powerful moonlight, targeting a darkness effect within 60 feet. The lantern attempts to counteract the effect with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+21} #Twilight Lantern (Greater)]]{+21}.

Twilight Lantern (Lesser).description:

The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a beam of powerful moonlight, targeting a darkness effect within 60 feet. The lantern attempts to counteract the effect with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+10} #Twilight Lantern (Lesser)]]{+10}.

Twining Chains.name: 缠绕锁链 Twining Chains
Twining Chains.description:
这套锁链上布满了尖刺和利刃。缠绕锁链并不适合作为武器，而是缠绕在使用者的身上作为对攻击者的威慑——同时，对某些人来说，也是一种时尚的表现。佩戴缠绕锁链时，你会获得棘刺反应动作。除了危险之外，缠绕链的重量还使你的盔甲负载增加1，力量值增加2，检定罚值增加2。

棘刺 r

触发 你被一次非武装攻击击中

效果 你扭动铁链上的尖刺和刀片来伤害攻击者。用你的徒手攻击调整对触发的攻击者进行一次攻击。一旦命中，攻击者会受到[[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害}。如果盔甲有+1符文，这个伤害会增加到[[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6穿刺伤害}，如果盔甲有+2符文，这个伤害会增加到[[/r {3d6}[piercing]]]{3d6穿刺伤害}，如果盔甲有+3符文，这个伤害会增加到[[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6穿刺伤害}。然而，无论你击中或未击中，你会受到等于你会对你的攻击者造成的D6伤害骰数量的穿刺伤害。

Twining Staff.name: 双缠杖 Twining Staff
Twining Staff.description:
它看起来只手细树藤绕起来的圆盘，但它可以生长或收缩。

启动 A 交互

效果 你让树藤迅速生长或缠绕，变成+1强击木杖、+1强击长棒或圆盘形态。在圆盘形态，它的负载可忽略不计，但必须至少用一只手持才能启动。在其它形态，它有着和对应武器类型相同的负载。作为启动动作的一部分你可以改变其持握方法。

当你让其生长时，可利用其生长之力进行跳高动作或通过将圆盘放在门缝后启动来破拆一扇门。如此做的双缠杖的运动检定调整值为[[/r 1d20+15]]。

Umbrella Injector.name: 雨伞注射器 Umbrella Injector
Umbrella Injector.description: 这把伞的伞尖其实是个3到4寸长的中空的刀头，经常被人忽视为一种装饰。伞轴内的容器可以装载一剂伤口毒药（injury poison），并通过滑动的扳机将其注射到受伤目标的体内。加固的伞骨可以让你用雨伞结实的伞面去抵挡或偏转敌人的攻击。

Underwater firing Mechanism.name: 水下击发装置 Underwater firing Mechanism
Underwater firing Mechanism.description: 这个装置用来替换火器上正常的击发装置（一般来说，本章节中的大部分火器采用燧发或火绳击发装置）。当火器使用者开火时，这个击发装置内的一块石头上蚀刻的小符文会释放出魔法火花，通过击发装置进入火器的枪膛，最后发射出子弹。安装了水下击发装置火器能在水下或其他黑火药无法正常点火的环境条件中射击。将水下击发装置安装到火器上需要花费1小时，但该工作可以与为了防止哑火所进行的标准保养工作同时进行。

Unending Youth.name: Unending Youth
Unending Youth.description:
You cease aging, and if you were older than young adult in age, you become a young adult again. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against death effects and resistance to negative damage equal to half your level.

Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can recite a mandatory appearance clause in your Thrune contract as a 3-action activity to summon you to her side, where you are controlled by Abrogail for 1 minute before you return.

Activate 2 Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You recite a hold harmless provision from your Thrune contract. Reduce your doomed value to 0. Abrogail Thrune II is immediately made aware that you have used this ability.

Unholy.name: 邪恶 Unholy
Unholy.description:
邪恶符文将炼狱之力赋予给武器。拥有该符文的武器对善良目标额外造成1d6点邪恶伤害。若你为善良阵营，你在携带或持握该武器时获得力竭2（enfeebled）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每天一次

触发 你用该武器对一善良生物重击成功

效果 符文蚀刻的武器每有1个武器伤害骰，目标就受到1d点 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。

Unholy Water.name: 邪水 Unholy Water
Unholy Water.description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

一名邪恶神祇的恶意流淌在这瓶水中。你用打击Strike将这瓶邪水扔出去。它视为一个射程增量20尺的简易投掷武器。不像炼金炸弹，它不会将操作特征添加到动作中。

邪水 造成 1d6 邪恶伤害和 1点 邪恶溅射伤害。它只会对天使和其他弱点为负能量的生物造成伤害。

Universal Solvent (Greater).name: 高等全能溶剂 Universal Solvent (Greater)
Universal Solvent (Greater).description:
启动 1 交互

这种强力的溶剂最初制作出来的目的是用来溶解@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{至强胶水 Soverign Glue}。全能溶剂对至强胶水格外有效，能够自动溶解胶水。它也能反制其他粘合物，例如@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{绊足包 Tanglefoot Bags}，反制调整值为[[/r 1d20+19 #Counteract]]{1d20+19}。

Universal Solvent (Major).name: 上等全能溶剂 Universal Solvent (Major)
Universal Solvent (Major).description:
启动 1 交互

这种强力的溶剂最初制作出来的目的是用来溶解@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{至强胶水 Soverign Glue}。全能溶剂对至强胶水格外有效，能够自动溶解胶水。它也能反制其他粘合物，例如@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{绊足包 Tanglefoot Bags}，反制调整值为[[/r 1d20+28 #Counteract]]{1d20+28}。

Universal Solvent (Moderate).name: 中等全能溶剂 Universal Solvent (Moderate)
Universal Solvent (Moderate).description:
启动 1 交互

这种强力的溶剂最初制作出来的目的是用来溶解@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{至强胶水 Soverign Glue}。全能溶剂对至强胶水格外有效，能够自动溶解胶水。它也能反制其他粘合物，例如@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{绊足包 Tanglefoot Bags}，反制调整值为[[/r 1d20+9 #Counteract]]{1d20+9}。

Unmemorable Mantle.name: Unmemorable Mantle
Unmemorable Mantle.description:
This long, shoddy cloak bears a hood and a simple brass clasp. While wearing the cloak, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You are Impersonating someone else

Effect While conversing or otherwise casually interacting with other creatures, you can adjust the mantle's clasp to modify those creatures' recollections of the last 5 minutes of their interaction with you. Each creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

Critical Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly and realizes you were trying to alter their memory.

Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly.

Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter minor details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as the time, place, and whether the interaction was favorable, as determined by the GM.

Critical Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter major details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as believing you to be another individual or that the creature agreed to a favor, as determined by the GM.

Unmemorable Mantle (Greater).name: Unmemorable Mantle (Greater)
Unmemorable Mantle (Greater).description:
This long, shoddy cloak bears a hood and a simple brass clasp. While wearing the cloak, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You are Impersonating someone else

Effect While conversing or otherwise casually interacting with other creatures, you can adjust the mantle's clasp to modify those creatures' recollections of the last 5 minutes of their interaction with you. Each creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28|name:Greater Unmemorable Mantle] save.

Critical Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly and realizes you were trying to alter their memory.

Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly.

Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter minor details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as the time, place, and whether the interaction was favorable, as determined by the GM.

Critical Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter major details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as believing you to be another individual or that the creature agreed to a favor, as determined by the GM.
